90 Caliber Net.description: Caitlyn fires a heavy net to slow her target. The recoil knocks Caitlyn back.
90 Caliber Net.name: 90 Caliber Net
90 Caliber Net.tooltip: Fires a net dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing an enemy by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} second(s). Knocks Caitlyn back.

Absolute Zero.description: Nunu begins to sap the area of heat, slowing all nearby enemies. When the spell ends, he deals massive damage to all enemies caught in the area.
Absolute Zero.name: Absolute Zero
Absolute Zero.tooltip:
Nunu saps the area of heat, channeling up to {{ e4 }} seconds, slowing surrounding enemy units' Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and Attack Speed by {{ e3 }}%.

Enemies caught in the area when the channel ends receive up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, depending on how long the spell was channeled.
(Minimum Damage: {{ f2 }})

Abyssal Voyage.description: Tahm Kench puts the heft of his immense body behind his attacks and abilities, gaining extra damage based on his bonus health. When activated, Tahm Kench teleports across the map, and he may bring one ally champion with him.
Abyssal Voyage.name: Abyssal Voyage
Abyssal Voyage.tooltip:
Passive: Basic attacks and damaging abilities deal an additional {{ f1 }} (20 + {{ e2 }}% of Tahm Kench's bonus health) magic damage.

Active: Begin to channel for up to 15 seconds. During this time, one ally champion can right click Tahm Kench to join in. Alternatively, reactivate this ability to travel alone. On reactivation or once an ally has opted in, Tahm travels to the target location. Incoming champion damage breaks the channel.

'Boy, the world's one river, and I'm its king. Ain't no place I ain't been; ain't no place I can't go again.'

Acceleration Gate.description:
Deploys an Acceleration Gate increasing the Movement Speed of all allied champions who pass through it.
If Shock Blast is fired through the gate the missile speed, range, and damage will increase.
Acceleration Gate.name: Acceleration Gate
Acceleration Gate.tooltip:
Deploys an Acceleration Gate for {{ e2 }} seconds increasing the Movement Speed of all allied champions who pass through it by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds (this bonus fades over the duration).

If Shock Blast is fired through the gate the missile speed and range will be increased, and its damage will increase by {{ e4 }}%.

Ace in the Hole.description: Caitlyn takes time to line up the perfect shot, dealing massive damage to a single target at a huge range. Enemy champions can intercept the bullet for their ally.
Ace in the Hole.name: Ace in the Hole
Ace in the Hole.tooltip: Takes a second to line up the perfect shot, firing a bullet at an enemy Champion dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage at {{ e2 }} range. Other enemy Champions can intercept the bullet.

Acid Hunter.description: Urgot fires an Acid Hunter missile that collides with the first enemy it hits, slowing the target if he has his Terror Capacitor up. Acid Hunter missile-locks on enemies affected by Noxian Corrosive Charge.
Acid Hunter.name: Acid Hunter
Acid Hunter.tooltip:
Urgot fires a missile toward the cursor that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. If Acid Hunter kills a unit half its mana cost is refunded.

Missile-lock can be achieved by holding the cursor over a target afflicted by Noxian Corrosive Charge.

Aegis of Zeonia.description: Pantheon leaps at an enemy and bashes the enemy with his shield, stunning them. After finishing the attack, Pantheon readies himself to block the next attack.
Aegis of Zeonia.name: Aegis of Zeonia
Aegis of Zeonia.tooltip: Pantheon leaps at the target enemy champion, minion or neutral monster and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and stuns them for {{ e2 }} second(s). Pantheon also instantly refreshes his Aegis Protection.

Agony's Embrace.description: Evelynn summons spikes from the ground to deal damage and slow enemies in the area. She then gains a shield based on how many enemy champions were hit.
Agony's Embrace.name: Agony's Embrace
Agony's Embrace.tooltip:
Evelynn impales all enemies in the targeted area, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of their current Health in magic damage and slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Evelynn siphons their pain, gaining a {{ e4 }} health shield for each enemy champion hit which lasts up to 6 seconds.

Alpha Strike.description: Master Yi teleports across the battlefield with blinding speed, dealing physical damage to multiple units in his path, while simultaneously becoming untargetable. Alpha Strike can critically strike and deals bonus physical damage to minions and monsters. Basic attacks reduce Alpha Strike's cooldown.
Alpha Strike.name: Alpha Strike
Alpha Strike.tooltip:
Master Yi teleports to strike up to 4 enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to each and an additional {{ e3 }} damage to minions and monsters, while simultaneously becoming untargetable.

Alpha Strike can critically strike, dealing an additional {{ f1 }} physical damage. Basic attacks lower the cooldown of Alpha Strike by 1 second.

Ambush.description: Twitch becomes invisible for a short duration and, while invisible, he gains Movement Speed. When leaving invisibility, Twitch gains Attack Speed for a short duration.
Ambush.name: Ambush
Ambush.tooltip:
After {{ e4 }} seconds of not taking damage or after {{ e5 }} seconds, Twitch turns invisible for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Twitch gains {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed while invisible and gains {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed for 5 seconds after coming out of invisibility.

Apprehend.description: Darius hones his axe, passively causing his physical damage to ignore a percentage of his target's Armor. When activated, Darius sweeps up his enemies with his axe's hook and pulls them to him.
Apprehend.name: Apprehend
Apprehend.tooltip:
Passive: Darius gains {{ e1 }}% Armor Penetration.

Active: Pulls in all enemies in front of Darius and slows them by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} second.

Aqua Prison.description: Sends a bubble towards a targeted area, dealing damage and stunning all enemies on impact.
Aqua Prison.name: Aqua Prison
Aqua Prison.tooltip: Sends a bubble towards a targeted area, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies, and stunning them for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Arcane Shift.description: Ezreal teleports to a target nearby location and fires a homing bolt which strikes the nearest enemy unit.
Arcane Shift.name: Arcane Shift
Arcane Shift.tooltip: Ezreal teleports to a target nearby location and fires a homing bolt at the nearest enemy unit, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Arcane Smash.description: Maokai knocks back nearby enemies with a shockwave, dealing magic damage and slowing them.
Arcane Smash.name: Arcane Smash
Arcane Smash.tooltip: Maokai releases an arcane shockwave. Nearby enemies are knocked back and all affected enemies take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Arcanopulse.description: Fires a long-range beam of energy, dealing magic damage to all targets hit.
Arcanopulse.name: Arcanopulse
Arcanopulse.tooltip:
First cast: Xerath charges Arcanopulse, gradually decreasing his Movement Speed while increasing the spell's range.

Second cast: Xerath fires Arcanopulse, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in a line.

While charging Arcanopulse, Xerath cannot attack or cast other spells. If Xerath does not fire the spell, half the Mana cost is refunded.

Arctic Assault.description: Charges forward, dealing magic damage and knocking enemies into the air. The charge stops after knocking an enemy champion into the air.
Arctic Assault.name: Arctic Assault
Arctic Assault.tooltip: Charges forward, knocking enemies into the air and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The charge stops after knocking an enemy champion into the air.

Ardent Blaze.description: Lucian shoots a missile that explodes in a star shape, marking enemies. Lucian gains Movement Speed for attacking marked enemies.
Ardent Blaze.name: Ardent Blaze
Ardent Blaze.tooltip:
Fires a shot that explodes upon enemy contact or reaching the end of its path. The explosion deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and marks enemies for 6 seconds.

When Lucian or his allies damage a marked target, Lucian gains {{ e2 }} Movement Speed for 1 second.

Aria of Perseverance.description: Sona plays the Aria of Perseverance, sending out protective melodies, healing Sona and a nearby wounded ally. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone a temporary shield and extends the duration of her aura for each ally she aids.
Aria of Perseverance.name: Aria of Perseverance
Aria of Perseverance.tooltip:
Active: Heals Sona and the most wounded nearby allied Champion for {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}). This heal increases by {{ e5 }}% per {{ e6 }}% missing Health on the target. Sona gains an aura that grants allies a {{ f2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) shield for {{ e9 }} seconds. Sona's aura lasts for {{ e7 }} seconds and is extended by {{ e8 }} seconds for each ally she aids.

Power Chord - Diminuendo: Reduces an enemy's total damage output by {{ e4 }}% (+{{ f1 }}%) for {{ e10 }} seconds.

Arise!.description: Azir summons a Sand Soldier to attack nearby targets for him, replacing his basic attack against targets within the soldier's range. Their attacks deal magic damage to enemies in a line. Arise! also passively grants attack speed to Azir and his Sand Soldiers.
Arise!.name: Arise!
Arise!.tooltip:
Passive: Gains {{ e3 }}% attack speed.

Active: Azir summons a Sand Soldier for {{ e1 }} seconds. When Azir attacks an enemy in a soldier's range, the soldier attacks instead of Azir, dealing {{ f2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in a line. If multiple soldiers strike the same target, each soldier after the first deals 25% damage. Soldiers attack even if Azir himself isn't in basic attack range.

Azir can store up to {{ maxammo }} Sand Soldiers at a time. A new soldier becomes available every {{ f1 }} seconds. Moving too far away from soldiers deactivates them. Sand Soldiers expire twice as fast when near an enemy turret.

Azir can expend a soldier to damage an enemy turret by summoning it on top of the turret. This deals {{ f4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to the turret.

Aspect Of The Cougar.description: Nidalee transforms into a cougar, gaining new abilities.
Aspect Of The Cougar.name: Aspect Of The Cougar
Aspect Of The Cougar.tooltip:
Human: Nidalee transforms into a vicious cougar with the basic abilities Takedown, Pounce, and Swipe.

Cougar: Nidalee transforms back into human form. While in human form, triggering a Hunt resets the cooldown of Aspect of the Cougar.

Assault and Battery.description: Vi runs down an enemy, knocking aside anyone in the way. When she reaches her target she knocks it into the air, jumps after it, and slams it back into the ground.
Assault and Battery.name: Assault and Battery
Assault and Battery.tooltip:
Targets an enemy champion and chases it down, knocking it up for 1.25 seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

While charging, Vi cannot be stopped and will knock aside enemies in the way, dealing 75% damage to them.

Astral Infusion.description: Soraka sacrifices a portion of her own Health to heal another friendly unit. Passively heals Soraka when she lands Starcall on an enemy Champion.
Astral Infusion.name: Astral Infusion
Astral Infusion.tooltip:
Passive: Each enemy Champion hit by Starcall heals Soraka for {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) to {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}), increasing based on how much Health Soraka is missing.

Active: Restores {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health to her target ally. Cannot be cast if Soraka is below 5% Health.

Audacious Charge.description: Xin Zhao charges an enemy, dealing damage and slowing all enemies in the area.
Audacious Charge.name: Audacious Charge
Audacious Charge.tooltip: Xin Zhao charges and challenges an enemy. The charge deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all nearby enemies and slows them by {{ e2 }}% for 2 seconds.

Baleful Strike.description: Veigar unleashes a bolt of dark energy that deals magic damage to the first two enemies hit. Units killed by this bolt grant Veigar some ability power permanently.
Baleful Strike.name: Baleful Strike
Baleful Strike.tooltip:
Active: Unleashes a bolt of dark energy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the first two enemies hit. For each target killed, Veigar gains 1 ability power. This bonus is doubled against Champions, large minions and large monsters.

Passive: Veigar gains {{ e2 }} ability power on champion kills and assists.

Ability power bonus: +{{ f1 }}

Bandage Toss.description: Amumu tosses a sticky bandage at a target, stunning and damaging the target while he pulls himself to them.
Bandage Toss.name: Bandage Toss
Bandage Toss.tooltip: Throws a bandage to target location. If it hits an enemy unit, Amumu will pull himself to the enemy, stun them for 1 second, and deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Barrel Roll.description: Gragas rolls his cask to a location, which can be activated to explode or will explode on its own after 4 seconds. Enemies struck by the blast have their Movement Speed slowed.
Barrel Roll.name: Barrel Roll
Barrel Roll.tooltip:
Gragas rolls his cask to a location, which can be activated again to explode or will explode on its own after 4 seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the area and slowing their movement speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds (deals 70% damage to minions).

The damage, slow amount, and slow duration increase as the cask ferments, up to 150% after 2 seconds.

Battle Cry.description: Xin Zhao passively heals every 3 attacks and can activate this ability to attack faster.
Battle Cry.name: Battle Cry
Battle Cry.tooltip:
Passive: Xin Zhao heals himself for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) every third basic attack.

Active: Xin Zhao unleashes a battle cry, increasing his Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Battle Roar.description:
Rengar lets out a battle roar, damaging enemies and gaining bonus Armor and Magic Resist for a short duration.
Ferocity effect: Rengar heals for a large amount.
Battle Roar.name: Battle Roar
Battle Roar.tooltip:
Deals {{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the area. Rengar's Armor and Magic Resist are increased by {{ e3 }} for {{ e6 }} seconds. The bonus Armor and Magic Resist is increased by {{ e7 }}% for each enemy Champion or large Monster hit.

Ferocity effect: Deals {{ f2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the area, grants the defenses from the normal ability, and restores between {{ f1 }} and {{ f3 }} Health based on missing Health (healing and damage values scale with Rengar's level).

Bear Stance.description: Bear Stance: Activation - Udyr increases Movement Speed for a short duration. Persistent Effect - Udyr's basic attacks stun his target for 1 second. This effect cannot occur on the same target for several seconds.
Bear Stance.name: Bear Stance
Bear Stance.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Basic attacks stun the target for 1 second. This effect cannot occur on the same target again for 5 seconds.

Activation: Increases Movement Speed by {{ e1 }}% and ignores unit collision for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Bio-Arcane Barrage.description: Kog'Maw's attacks gain range and deal a percent of the target's maximum Health as Magic Damage.
Bio-Arcane Barrage.name: Bio-Arcane Barrage
Bio-Arcane Barrage.tooltip: Basic attacks gain {{ e1 }} range and deal additional Magic Damage equal to {{ e2 }}% (+{{ a1 }})% of the enemy's maximum Health (Max: 100 Damage vs Monsters). Lasts {{ e3 }} seconds.

Black Shield.description: Places a protective barrier around an allied champion, absorbing magical damage and disables until penetrated or the shield dissipates.
Black Shield.name: Black Shield
Black Shield.tooltip: Shields an allied Champion for {{ e2 }} seconds. The shield absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and prevents disables until it breaks.

Blade of the Exile.description: Riven empowers her keepsake weapon with energy, and gains Attack Damage and Range. During this time, she also gains the ability to use Wind Slash, a powerful ranged attack, once.
Blade of the Exile.name: Blade of the Exile
Blade of the Exile.tooltip:
Riven's weapon surges with spiritual energy for {{ e4 }} seconds, granting her {{ e5 }}% extra Attack Damage (+{{ f3 }}), increased Range on her damaging spells and attacks, and the ability to use Wind Slash once.

Wind Slash: Riven fires a shockwave that deals from {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) to {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage to all enemies hit, increasing based on how much Health they are missing.

Blades of Torment.description: Aatrox unleashes the power of his blade, dealing damage to all enemies hit and slowing them.
Blades of Torment.name: Blades of Torment
Blades of Torment.tooltip: Aatrox unleashes the power of his blade, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage to all enemies hit and slowing them by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Bladesurge.description: Irelia dashes forward to strike her target. If it kills the target, Bladesurge's cooldown refreshes and refunds 35 Mana.
Bladesurge.name: Bladesurge
Bladesurge.tooltip:
Irelia dashes forward to strike her target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and applying on-hit effects.

If it kills the target, Bladesurge's cooldown refreshes and refunds 35 Mana.

Bladework.description: Fiora has increased attack speed for the next two attacks. The first attack slows the target, and the second attack will critically strike.
Bladework.name: Bladework
Bladework.tooltip: Fiora gains {{ e4 }}% increased attack speed for the next two attacks. The first attack cannot critically strike, but applies a {{ e3 }}% slow for {{ e2 }} second. The second attack is guaranteed to critically strike for {{ f4 }}% damage ({{ f3 }}).

Blighted Quiver.description: Varus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and apply Blight. Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage based on the target's maximum Health.
Blighted Quiver.name: Blighted Quiver
Blighted Quiver.tooltip:
Passive: Varus' basic attacks deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage and apply Blight for {{ e3 }} seconds (stacks {{ e4 }} times).

Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage equal to {{ e2 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) of the target's maximum Health per stack (Max: 360 total damage vs Monsters).

Blinding Assault.description: Quinn calls Valor to blind and damage targets in an area.
Blinding Assault.name: Blinding Assault
Blinding Assault.tooltip:
Valor flies in a line and strikes the first enemy in his path. He then attacks all nearby enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage and blinding them for {{ e2 }} seconds.

As Valor: Performs the same attack at the current location.

Blinding Dart.description: Obscures an enemy's vision with a powerful venom, dealing damage to the target unit and blinding it for the duration.
Blinding Dart.name: Blinding Dart
Blinding Dart.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and blinds the target for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Blood Boil.description: Nunu invigorates himself and an allied unit by heating their blood, increasing their Movement and Attack Speeds.
Blood Boil.name: Blood Boil
Blood Boil.tooltip:
The heat of Nunu and a target ally's blood rises, increasing Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and Attack Speed by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

If Nunu targets himself, Blood Boil will try to target the nearest Ally champion.

Blood Rush.description: Draven gains increased Movement Speed and Attack Speed. The Movement Speed bonus decreases rapidly over its duration. Catching a Spinning Axe will refresh the cooldown of Blood Rush.
Blood Rush.name: Blood Rush
Blood Rush.tooltip:
Draven gains {{ e2 }}% increased Movement Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds and {{ e4 }}% increased Attack Speed for {{ e5 }} seconds. The Movement Speed bonus decreases rapidly over its duration.

Catching a Spinning Axe will refresh the cooldown of Blood Rush.

Blood Scent.description: Warwick passively senses weakened enemy champions around him. The scent of blood sends him into a fury, causing him to move at incredible speeds.
Blood Scent.name: Blood Scent
Blood Scent.tooltip: Toggle: Warwick senses enemy champions under 50% Health within {{ e1 }} distance of him; while he detects a low-health enemy, he reveals them if they are not stealthed and gains {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed.

Blood Thirst / Blood Price.description: While toggled on Aatrox deals bonus damage every third subsequent attack at the expense of his own Health. While toggled off Aatrox restores Health every third subsequent attack.
Blood Thirst / Blood Price.name: Blood Thirst / Blood Price
Blood Thirst / Blood Price.tooltip:
While toggled off Aatrox benefits from Blood Thirst, while toggled on Blood Price is activated and removes Blood Thirst.

Blood Thirst: Every third attack, Aatrox restores {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health, increased by {{ e1 }}% ({{ f5 }}) when below half Health.

Blood Price: Every third attack, Aatrox deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus physical damage and loses {{ f4 }} Health.

Bloodlust.description: Tryndamere thrives on the thrills of combat, increasing his Attack Damage as he is more and more wounded. He can cast Bloodlust to consume his Fury and heal himself.
Bloodlust.name: Bloodlust
Bloodlust.tooltip:
Passive: Tryndamere thirsts for blood, gaining {{ e1 }} Attack Damage plus {{ e2 }} per 1% Health missing.

Active: Tryndamere consumes his Fury, restoring {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health, plus {{ e4 }} (+{{ f2 }}) Health per Fury consumed.

Body Slam.description: Gragas charges to a location and collides with the first enemy unit he comes across, dealing damage to all nearby enemy units and stunning them.
Body Slam.name: Body Slam
Body Slam.tooltip:
Gragas charges forward, colliding with the first enemy unit. He deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the area and bumps them back, stunning them for {{ e2 }} second.

Body Slam's Cooldown is reduced by {{ f1 }} seconds if Gragas collides with a unit.

Bola Strike.description:
Rengar throws a bola, slowing the first target hit for a short duration.
Ferocity effect: Roots the target.
Bola Strike.name: Bola Strike
Bola Strike.tooltip:
Throws a bola dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and slowing an enemy by {{ e3 }}% for 2.5 seconds. This slow diminishes over time.

Ferocity effect: Deals {{ f1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and roots the target for {{ e5 }} seconds on top of the normal slow (damage scales with Rengar's level).

Boomerang Blade.description: Sivir hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, dealing damage each way.
Boomerang Blade.name: Boomerang Blade
Boomerang Blade.tooltip: Sivir hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, which deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the first target hit and {{ e2 }}% reduced damage to each subsequent target down to a minimum of {{ e3 }}%.

Boomerang Throw / Boulder Toss.description:
Gnar throws a boomerang that damages and slows enemies it hits before returning to him. If he catches the boomerang its cooldown is reduced.

Mega Gnar instead throws a boulder that stops on the first unit hit, damaging and slowing everything nearby. It can then be picked up to reduce the cooldown.
Boomerang Throw / Boulder Toss.name: Boomerang Throw / Boulder Toss
Boomerang Throw / Boulder Toss.tooltip:
Mini Gnar: Throws a boomerang that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and slows enemies by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. The boomerang returns towards Gnar after hitting an enemy, dealing {{ e7 }}% damage to subsequent targets. Each enemy can only be hit once. Catching the boomerang reduces its cooldown by {{ f1 }}%.

Mega Gnar: Throws a boulder that stops when it hits an enemy, slowing all nearby enemies and dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage. Picking up the boulder reduces its cooldown by {{ e6 }}%.

Bouncing Blades.description: Katarina throws a dagger that bounces from enemy to enemy, dealing magic damage and marking them. Her next spell or basic attack against a marked target will consume the mark and deal additional magic damage.
Bouncing Blades.name: Bouncing Blades
Bouncing Blades.tooltip:
Throws a dagger dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The dagger bounces to the 4 closest enemies dealing 10% less damage with each bounce.

Enemies hit are marked for 4 seconds. Katarina's basic attacks or spells will consume the mark dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) additional magic damage.

Bouncing Bomb.description: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals magic damage.
Bouncing Bomb.name: Bouncing Bomb
Bouncing Bomb.tooltip: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Broken Wings.description: Riven lashes out in a series of strikes. This ability can be reactivated three times in a short time frame with the third hit knocking back nearby enemies.
Broken Wings.name: Broken Wings
Broken Wings.tooltip:
Riven strikes out in front of her in a short line. This ability may be reactivated {{ e4 }} additional times.

1st and 2nd Use: Slashes forward, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to all units she comes in contact with.
3rd Use: Leaps forward and slams the ground dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and knocking nearby enemies up. This leap can cross unpathable terrain.

Riven will target the unit your cursor is hovering over, or if no targets are present, Riven will simply strike the direction she is currently facing.

Brutal Strikes.description: Malphite starts to hit with such force that his attacks deal damage to all units in front of him. Passively increases his Armor.
Brutal Strikes.name: Brutal Strikes
Brutal Strikes.tooltip:
Passive: Malphite's armor is increased by {{ e1 }}% ({{ f1 }}).

Active: Basic attacks deal an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the target and any nearby units. Lasts {{ e3 }} seconds.

Buckshot.description: Graves fires three bullets in a cone, damaging all enemies in their paths.
Buckshot.name: Buckshot
Buckshot.tooltip: Shoots three bullets in a cone, each dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to all enemies in their path. Enemies hit with multiple bullets take {{ e4 }}% damage from each additional bullet.

Bullet Time.description: Miss Fortune channels a flurry of bullets into a cone in front of her, dealing large amounts of damage to enemies.
Bullet Time.name: Bullet Time
Bullet Time.tooltip:
Miss Fortune channels a barrage of bullets into a cone in front of her for 2 seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }})(+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and applying a stack of Impure Shots with each bullet ({{ f2 }} additional magic damage for each stack already applied to the target).

Passive: The stack limit for Impure Shots is increased by {{ e2 }}.

Bulwark.description: Galio shields an ally Champion, increasing their Armor and Magic Resistance, and restoring Galio's Health each time that Champion suffers damage.
Bulwark.name: Bulwark
Bulwark.tooltip: Galio shields a friendly champion for {{ e4 }} seconds, increasing their Armor and Magic Resistance by {{ e1 }}. Each time the unit suffers damage, Galio is healed for {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}). (-20% healing for each consecutive hit)

Burning Agony.description: Dr. Mundo drains his Health to reduce the duration of disables and deal continual damage to nearby enemies.
Burning Agony.name: Burning Agony
Burning Agony.tooltip: Toggle: Dr. Mundo deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies per second, and reduces the duration of disables on Dr. Mundo by {{ e2 }}%.

Burnout.description:
Shyvana surrounds herself in fire, dealing magic damage per second to nearby enemies and moving faster for 3 seconds, part of this damage is applied again when Shyvana basic attacks an enemy with Burnout active. The Movement Speed reduces over the duration of the spell. Basic attacks extend the duration of Burnout.

Dragon Form: Burnout scorches the ground beneath it, enemies on the scorched earth continue to take damage.
Burnout.name: Burnout
Burnout.tooltip:
Shyvana deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second to nearby enemies ({{ e4 }}% bonus damage to monsters) and moves {{ e2 }}% faster for 3 seconds. {{ e5 }}% of this damage is applied again when Shyvana basic attacks an enemy with Burnout active.

Shyvana's Movement Speed bonus is reduced over time. Basic attacks extend the duration of Burnout by 1 second to a maximum of 4 seconds.

Dragon Form: Burnout scorches the earth, continuing to damage enemies that stand on it.

Burrow / Un-burrow.description:
Rek'Sai burrows into the ground, gaining new abilities and increased Movement Speed. Her vision range is reduced and she cannot use basic attacks.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai may cast Un-burrow to knock up and damage nearby enemies.
Burrow / Un-burrow.name: Burrow / Un-burrow
Burrow / Un-burrow.tooltip:
Un-Burrowed: Burrow into the ground.

Burrowed: Un-burrow, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Physical Damage and knocking up nearby enemies for up to 1 second based on their proximity to Rek'Sai. A unit cannot be hit by Un-burrow more than once every {{ e6 }} seconds.

Burrowed Effects: New abilities, +{{ f1 }} Movement Speed, reduced vision range, disabled basic attacks, and gains Tremor Sense: Nearby enemies that move in Fog of War have their position revealed to Rek'Sai and her allies.

Bushwhack / Pounce.description: In human form, Nidalee lays a trap for unwary opponents that, when sprung, damages and reveals its target. As a cougar, she jumps in a direction, dealing damage in an area where she lands.
Bushwhack / Pounce.name: Bushwhack / Pounce
Bushwhack / Pounce.tooltip:
Human: Nidalee lays a Bushwhack trap lasting up to 2 minutes. When sprung by an enemy, it is revealed and takes {{ e7 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage over 4 seconds.

Cougar: Nidalee lunges toward a target area, dealing damage to nearby enemies.

Buster Shot.description: Tristana loads a massive cannonball into her weapon and fires it at an enemy unit. This deals Magic Damage and knocks the target back.
Buster Shot.name: Buster Shot
Buster Shot.tooltip: Tristana fires a massive cannonball at an enemy unit. This deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and knocks surrounding units back {{ e2 }} distance.

CH-2 Electron Storm Grenade.description: Heimerdinger lobs a grenade at a location, dealing damage to enemy units, as well as stunning anyone directly hit and slowing surrounding units.
CH-2 Electron Storm Grenade.name: CH-2 Electron Storm Grenade
CH-2 Electron Storm Grenade.tooltip: Hurls a grenade that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to enemy units and slows their Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds. Enemies in the center of the blast are also stunned for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Call of the Void.description: Malzahar opens up two portals to the Void. After a short delay, they fire projectiles that deal Magic Damage and silence enemy champions.
Call of the Void.name: Call of the Void
Call of the Void.tooltip: Malzahar opens two portals to the Void. After a short delay, they fire projectiles that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and silence champions for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Cannon Barrage.description: Gangplank signals his ship to bombard an area, slowing and damaging enemies.
Cannon Barrage.name: Cannon Barrage
Cannon Barrage.tooltip:
Passive: Gangplank can hold up to {{ f1 }} Powder Kegs.

Active: Signals Gangplank's ship to fire {{ f3 }} waves of cannonballs at an area over {{ e3 }} seconds. Each wave deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slows enemies by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds.

Collect Silver Serpents with Parrrley to upgrade in the shop.

Caretaker's Shrine.description: Reveals a healing shrine which powers up over a short time, disappearing after healing the first ally that touches it.
Caretaker's Shrine.name: Caretaker's Shrine
Caretaker's Shrine.tooltip:
Bard raises a health shrine that immediately offers {{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }}) health, but restores up to {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}) health as it gathers power for 10 seconds. The shrine's effect also grants {{ e1 }}% decaying movement speed for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Bard can have up to 3 shrines active at once, which remain until visited by an ally champion or crushed by an enemy champion.

Active Shrines: {{ f1 }} / {{ f2 }}

Cataclysm.description: Jarvan IV heroically leaps into battle at a target with such force that he terraforms the surrounding area to create an arena around them.
Cataclysm.name: Cataclysm
Cataclysm.tooltip:
Heroically leaps to an enemy Champion dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and creating an arena of impassable terrain around them for 3.5 seconds.

Activate again to collapse the terrain.

Caustic Spittle.description: Passive: Increases Kog'Maw's Attack Speed. Active: Kog'Maw launches a corrosive projectile which deals Magic Damage and corrodes the target's Armor and Magic Resist for 4 seconds.
Caustic Spittle.name: Caustic Spittle
Caustic Spittle.tooltip:
Passive: Increases Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}%.

Active: Launches a corrosive projectile that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to the first enemy hit and reduces its Armor and Magic Resist by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Chain of Corruption.description: Varus flings out a damaging tendril of corruption that immobilizes the first enemy champion hit and then spreads towards nearby uninfected champions, immobilizing them too on contact.
Chain of Corruption.name: Chain of Corruption
Chain of Corruption.tooltip:
Varus flings out a tendril of corruption that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and immobilizes the first enemy champion hit for 2 seconds.

The corruption then spreads towards nearby uninfected enemy champions, applying the same damage and immobilize if it reaches them.

Chaos Storm.description:
Viktor conjures a singularity on the field which deals magic damage and interrupts enemy channels. The singularity then does magic damage to all nearby enemies every second. Viktor can redirect the singularity.

Augment: The Chaos Storm moves faster.
Chaos Storm.name: Chaos Storm
Chaos Storm.tooltip:
Viktor conjures a singularity at target location, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and interrupting enemy channels.

Viktor can redirect the singularity for {{ e3 }} seconds, causing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage every second to nearby enemies. The singularity will move slower as it attempts to move farther away from Viktor.

Augment - Velocity: Chaos Storm moves 20% faster.

Charm.description: Ahri blows a kiss that damages and charms an enemy it encounters, causing them to walk harmlessly towards her.
Charm.name: Charm
Charm.tooltip: Blows a kiss dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and charms an enemy causing them to walk harmlessly towards Ahri for {{ e2 }} second(s).

Children of the Grave.description: Mordekaiser curses an enemy champion or the Dragon, stealing a percent of their life initially and each second. If the target dies while the spell is active, their soul is enslaved and will follow Mordekaiser as a ghost.
Children of the Grave.name: Children of the Grave
Children of the Grave.tooltip:
Passive - Dragon Force: Damaging the Dragon will Curse it for 10 seconds.

Active: Curse target Champion and steal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of their maximum health (half initially, half over 10 seconds; deals magic damage).

Curse Effect: When killed by Mordekaiser's team, the Cursed unit's soul will follow Mordekaiser for {{ e9 }} seconds.

Mordekaiser gains {{ e7 }}% of their ability power and {{ e8 }}% of their bonus health.

The ghost gains {{ e6 }} attack damage and 15% of Mordekaiser's maximum health.

The ghost can be controlled by holding the alt key and using the right mouse button or by reactivating this ability.

Chomp.description: Trundle bites his opponent, dealing damage, briefly slowing and sapping some of their Attack Damage.
Chomp.name: Chomp
Chomp.tooltip:
Trundle lunges at his opponent with his next basic attack, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and briefly slowing his target.

This attack increases Trundle's Attack Damage by {{ e2 }} for 8 seconds, with his opponent losing half of this amount.

Chronobreak.description: Ekko shatters his timeline, becoming untargetable and rewinding to a more favorable point in time. He returns to whenever he was a few seconds ago, and heals for a percentage of the damage received in that duration. Enemies near his arrival zone take massive damage.
Chronobreak.name: Chronobreak
Chronobreak.tooltip: Makes Ekko invulnerable and untargetable, and teleports him back to wherever he was 4 seconds ago. Ekko heals himself for {{ e3 }} + {{ e2 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) of the damage taken over the last 4 seconds, and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all nearby enemies on arrival.

Chronoshift.description: Zilean places a protective time rune on an allied champion, teleporting the champion back in time if they take lethal damage.
Chronoshift.name: Chronoshift
Chronoshift.tooltip: Zilean marks himself or an allied champion with a protective time rune for {{ e2 }} seconds. If the target would take lethal damage, they are instead transported back in time, regaining {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health.

Chum the Waters.description: Fizz releases a magical fish toward a location that attaches to any champion that touches it, slowing the target  and amplifying all of Fizz's magic damage to them (except for Chum the Waters). After a short delay, a shark erupts from the ground, knocking up the target and knocking any nearby enemies aside. All enemies hit are dealt magic damage and slowed.
Chum the Waters.name: Chum the Waters
Chum the Waters.tooltip:
Fizz releases a magical fish toward a location attaching to any champion that walks over it, slowing their movement by {{ e2 }}% and amplifying magic damage by Fizz (except Chum the Waters) to the target by 20% for 6 seconds.

After {{ e3 }} seconds, a shark erupts from the ground, knocking up the target and knocking other enemies aside dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and reducing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for 1.5 seconds.

Cocoon / Rappel.description:
Human Form: Stuns the first enemy unit hit and reveals them if they are not stealthed.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings ascend into the air and then descend upon target enemy.
Cocoon / Rappel.name: Cocoon / Rappel
Cocoon / Rappel.tooltip: Stuns the first enemy hit for {{ e5 }} seconds and reveals them if they are not stealthed.

Collateral Damage.description: Graves fires an explosive shell dealing heavy damage to the first champion it hits. After hitting a champion or reaching the end of its range, the shell explodes dealing damage in a cone.
Collateral Damage.name: Collateral Damage
Collateral Damage.tooltip: Fires an explosive shell that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to the first enemy hit. After hitting an enemy Champion or reaching the end of its range, the shell explodes, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage in a cone.

Command: Attack.description: Orianna commands her ball to fire toward a target location, dealing magic damage to targets along the way (deals less damage to subsequent targets). Her ball remains at the target location after.
Command: Attack.name: Command: Attack
Command: Attack.tooltip:
Orianna commands her ball to shoot toward a target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to targets along the way. However, it deals {{ e2 }}% less damage for each unit it hits (Minimum {{ e3 }}%).

Her ball remains behind at the target location afterwards.

Command: Dissonance.description: Orianna commands the ball to release a pulse of energy, dealing magic damage around it. This leaves a field behind that speeds up allies and slows enemies.
Command: Dissonance.name: Command: Dissonance
Command: Dissonance.tooltip:
Orianna commands her ball to release an electric pulse, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies.

The pulse leaves behind an energy field for {{ e4 }} seconds, lowering enemy Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and increasing ally Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds. This effect diminishes over time.

Command: Protect.description: Orianna commands her ball to attach to an allied champion, shielding them and dealing magic damage to any enemies it passes through on the way. Additionally, the ball grants additional Armor and Magic Resist to the champion it is attached to.
Command: Protect.name: Command: Protect
Command: Protect.tooltip:
Passive: The ball adds {{ e2 }} Armor and Magic Resist to the allied champion it is attached to.

Active: Orianna commands her ball to travel to and attach onto an allied champion, shielding them for {{ e5 }} seconds from the next {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage. Enemies the ball passes through along the way are damaged for {{ e4 }}% of the shield value: {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}).

Command: Shockwave.description: Orianna commands her ball to unleash a shockwave, dealing magic damage and launching nearby enemies towards the ball after a short delay.
Command: Shockwave.name: Command: Shockwave
Command: Shockwave.tooltip: Orianna commands her ball to unleash a shockwave after a brief delay, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and flinging them into the air a set distance in the direction of the ball.

Condemn.description: Vayne draws a heavy crossbow from her back, and fires a huge bolt at her target, knocking them back and dealing damage. If they collide with terrain, they are impaled, dealing bonus damage and stunning them.
Condemn.name: Condemn
Condemn.tooltip: Fires a bolt that knocks back target enemy and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. Enemies that collide with terrain take {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) additional physical damage and are stunned for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Conflagration.description: Brand conjures a powerful blast at his target, dealing magic damage to them. If the target is ablaze, Conflagration spreads to nearby enemies.
Conflagration.name: Conflagration
Conflagration.tooltip:
Brand conjures a powerful blast at his target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Blaze: If the target is ablaze, Conflagration spreads to nearby enemies.

Conquering Sands.description: Azir sends all Sand Soldiers toward a target location. Sand Soldiers deal magic damage to all targets they pass through and apply a slow for 1 second.
Conquering Sands.name: Conquering Sands
Conquering Sands.tooltip:
Azir sends all Sand Soldiers toward a target location. Sand Soldiers deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies they pass through and apply a {{ e2 }}% slow for 1 second.

Enemies hit by multiple Sand Soldiers will have the slow duration refreshed, but will not take additional damage.

Consume.description: Nunu commands the yeti to take a bite out of a target minion or monster, dealing heavy damage to it and healing himself.
Consume.name: Consume
Consume.tooltip:
Commands the yeti to bite out of a minion or monster, dealing {{ e1 }} true damage to the target and healing himself for {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}).

Nunu gains bonuses for {{ e3 }} seconds based on what he consumed.

Elementals: Increased Size and {{ f3 }}% Maximum Health
Animals or Undead: Killing a unit grants {{ f4 }}% Movement Speed for 3 seconds
Other Monsters: Nunu's attacks and spells deal an additional {{ f5 }}% of his Maximum Health as magic damage.

Contaminate.description: Twitch wreaks further havoc on poisoned enemies with a blast of his vile diseases.
Contaminate.name: Contaminate
Contaminate.tooltip: Deals {{ e2 }} physical damage plus {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) per stack of Deadly Venom to all nearby enemies affected by Deadly Venom.

Cosmic Binding.description: Bard fires a missile which will slow the first enemy struck, and continue onward. If it strikes a wall, it will stun the initial target; if it strikes another enemy, it will stun them both.
Cosmic Binding.name: Cosmic Binding
Cosmic Binding.tooltip:
Bard fires an energy bolt, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to one or two enemies. The first target hit will be slowed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} second(s).

If the bolt hits another enemy or a wall, any enemies hit are stunned for {{ e2 }} second(s).

Counter Strike.description: Jax's combat prowess allows him to dodge all incoming attacks for a short duration and then quickly counterattack, stunning all surrounding enemies.
Counter Strike.name: Counter Strike
Counter Strike.tooltip:
Jax enters a defensive stance for up to 2 seconds, dodging all incoming basic attacks and taking {{ e3 }}% less damage from area of effect abilities.

After 2 seconds or if activated again, Jax stuns surrounding enemies for {{ e2 }} second and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage to them.

Counter Strike deals {{ e5 }}% more damage for each attack Jax dodged (max: {{ e4 }}% increased damage).

Courage.description: Garen passively increases his armor and magic resist by killing enemies. He may also activate this ability to grant himself a shield that reduces incoming damage for a short time.
Courage.name: Courage
Courage.tooltip:
Passive: Killing units permanently grants {{ f2 }} armor and magic resist, up to a maximum of {{ e3 }}. Current Bonus: {{ f1 }}

Active: Garen gains a defensive shield for {{ e4 }} seconds, reducing incoming damage by {{ e2 }}%.

Crescendo.description: Sona plays her ultimate chord, stunning enemy champions and forcing them to dance and dealing magic damage to them. Each rank increases the power of all aura effects.
Crescendo.name: Crescendo
Crescendo.tooltip:
Active: Strikes an irresistible chord, stunning enemy Champions and forcing them to dance for {{ e5 }} seconds and take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Passive: Each rank of Crescendo grants Sona increased power in her auras. Song of Celerity also gains increased power in Sona's self buff.

+{{ e2 }} magic damage for Hymn of Valor
+{{ e3 }} shield power for Aria of Perseverance
+{{ e4 }}% Movement Speed for Song of Celerity

Crescent Slash.description: Akali flourishes her kamas, dealing damage based on her Attack Damage and Ability Power.
Crescent Slash.name: Crescent Slash
Crescent Slash.tooltip: Akali flourishes her kamas, slicing nearby enemy units for {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

Crescent Strike.description: Diana swings her blade to unleash a bolt of lunar energy that deals damage in an arc before exploding. Afflicts enemies struck with the Moonlight debuff, revealing them if they are not stealthed.
Crescent Strike.name: Crescent Strike
Crescent Strike.tooltip:
Unleashes a bolt of lunar energy in an arc dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Afflicts enemies struck with Moonlight, revealing them if they are not stealthed for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Crescent Sweep.description: Xin Zhao deals damage to nearby enemies based on their current Health and knocks non-challenged targets back. Xin Zhao gains bonus Armor and Magic Resist based on number of champions hit.
Crescent Sweep.name: Crescent Sweep
Crescent Sweep.tooltip:
Xin Zhao unleashes a sweep around him that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) plus 15% of target's current Health in physical damage and stuns enemies while knocking them back (max 600 vs minions and monsters). Xin Zhao gains {{ e3 }} Armor and Magic Resist for 6 seconds for each champion hit.

Challenge: If a challenged target is hit by the sweep, it is unaffected by the knockback.

Crippling Strike.description: Darius's next attack strikes an enemy's crucial artery. As they bleed out, their Movement Speed is slowed.
Crippling Strike.name: Crippling Strike
Crippling Strike.tooltip:
Darius's next basic attack deals {{ f1 }} physical damage and slows the target by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e5 }} second.

Crippling Strike refunds its Mana cost and {{ e3 }}% of its cooldown if it kills the target.

Crowstorm.description: A murder of crows flock wildly around Fiddlesticks, dealing damage each second to all enemy units in the area.
Crowstorm.name: Crowstorm
Crowstorm.tooltip: A murder of crows flock wildly around Fiddlesticks for 5 seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each second to all enemy units in the area. This has a 1.5 second channel duration and teleports Fiddlesticks to target location.

Crushing Blow.description: Wukong's next attack deals additional physical damage, gains range, and reduces the enemy's Armor for a short duration.
Crushing Blow.name: Crushing Blow
Crushing Blow.tooltip: Wukong's next attack gains {{ e4 }} Attack Range, deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and reduces the enemy's Armor by {{ e2 }}% for 3 seconds.

Crystal Slash.description: Skarner lashes out with his claws, dealing physical damage to all nearby enemies and charging himself with Crystal Energy for several seconds if a unit is struck. If he casts Crystal Slash again while powered by Crystal Energy, he deals bonus magic damage.
Crystal Slash.name: Crystal Slash
Crystal Slash.tooltip:
Skarner deals {{ f1 }} physical damage to all nearby enemies. If a unit is struck, he charges himself with Crystal Energy for {{ e2 }} seconds.

While Skarner is charged, Crystal Slash deals {{ f1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage.

Basic attacks lower Crystal Slash's cooldown by 0.25 seconds (quadrupled against champions).

Crystalline Exoskeleton.description: Skarner gains a shield and has increased Movement Speed while the shield persists.
Crystalline Exoskeleton.name: Crystalline Exoskeleton
Crystalline Exoskeleton.tooltip: Skarner is shielded for {{ f1 }} ({{ e1 }}% of his maximum health) (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e4 }} seconds. While the shield persists, Skarner gains movement speed that ramps up to {{ e5 }}% over 3 seconds.

Crystallize.description: Anivia condenses the moisture in the air into an impassable wall of ice to block all movement. The wall only lasts a short duration before it melts.
Crystallize.name: Crystallize
Crystallize.tooltip: Anivia summons an impassable wall of ice {{ e2 }} units wide, blocking all movement. The wall lasts for {{ e1 }} seconds before it melts.

Cull the Meek.description: Renekton swings his blade, dealing moderate physical damage to all targets around him, and heals for a small portion of the damage dealt. If he has more than 50 Fury, his damage and heal are increased.
Cull the Meek.name: Cull the Meek
Cull the Meek.tooltip:
Renekton swings his blade, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to nearby enemies and healing himself for {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) Health for each non-champion hit and {{ f2 }} (+{{ f3 }}) Health for each champion hit, up to {{ e4 }} Health.

In addition, he generates 2.5 Fury for each non-champion hit and 10 Fury for each champion hit, up to a maximum of 30 Fury.

50 Fury Bonus: Damage increased to {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}). Heal increased to {{ e7 }} (+{{ f4 }}) per non-champion and {{ f5 }} (+{{ f6 }}) per champion, up to {{ e9 }}. No longer generates Fury.

Curse of the Sad Mummy.description: Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units in bandages, damaging them and rendering them unable to attack or move.
Curse of the Sad Mummy.name: Curse of the Sad Mummy
Curse of the Sad Mummy.tooltip: Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and preventing attacks and movement for 2 seconds.

Cutthroat.description: Talon instantly appears behind his target, briefly slowing them and amplifying his damage against that target.
Cutthroat.name: Cutthroat
Cutthroat.tooltip: Talon teleports to the far side of his target, slowing them by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e1 }} second and amplifying Talon's damage against the target by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Cyclone.description: Wukong's staff grows outward and he spins it around, dealing damage and knocking up enemies. Wukong gains Movement Speed over the duration of the spell.
Cyclone.name: Cyclone
Cyclone.tooltip: Wukong's staff grows outward and he spins it around, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage per second and knocking up enemies he encounters. Wukong gains Movement Speed over the duration of the spell. Lasts 4 seconds.

Dance of Arrows.description: Kindred tumbles and shoots up to three arrows at nearby targets.
Dance of Arrows.name: Dance of Arrows
Dance of Arrows.tooltip:
Lamb vaults, firing up to 3 arrows at nearby enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage.

Casting Wolf's Frenzy or vaulting inside of its effect reduces the cooldown of this spell to {{ e4 }} seconds.

Dark Binding.description: Morgana releases a sphere of dark magic. Upon contact with an enemy unit, the sphere will deal magic damage and force the unit to the ground for a period of time.
Dark Binding.name: Dark Binding
Dark Binding.tooltip: Fires a bolt of dark energy, rooting the first enemy hit for {{ e2 }} seconds and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Dark Flight.description: Aatrox takes flight and slams down at a targeted location, dealing damage and knocking up enemies at the center of impact.
Dark Flight.name: Dark Flight
Dark Flight.tooltip: Aatrox takes flight and slams down at a targeted location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to all nearby enemies and knocking up targets at the center of impact for {{ e5 }} second.

Dark Frenzy.description: Evelynn passively increases her Movement Speed when hitting enemy champions with her spells. Upon activation, Evelynn breaks free from slows affecting her and gains a massive Movement Speed boost for a short duration.
Dark Frenzy.name: Dark Frenzy
Dark Frenzy.tooltip:
Active: Evelynn removes all slows affecting her and gains {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Passive: Evelynn's spell hits on enemy champions reduce Dark Frenzy's cooldown by 1 second.

Champion kills and assists refresh Dark Frenzy's cooldown.

Dark Matter.description: Veigar calls a great mass of dark matter to fall from the sky to the target location, dealing magic damage when it lands.
Dark Matter.name: Dark Matter
Dark Matter.tooltip: After 1.2 seconds, dark matter falls from the sky to the target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Dark Passage.description: Thresh throws out a lantern that shields nearby allied Champions from damage. Allies can click the lantern to dash to Thresh.
Dark Passage.name: Dark Passage
Dark Passage.tooltip:
Thresh creates a shielding lantern that an ally can use to dash to him.
Thresh throws the Lantern to a point. If an ally near the Lantern clicks it, they pick it up, and Thresh pulls both back to him.

Additionally, the Lantern will grant a shield lasting 4 seconds that absorbs up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage to Thresh and up to one ally if they come near the Lantern.

Dark Sphere.description: Syndra conjures a Dark Sphere dealing magic damage. The sphere remains and can be manipulated by her other powers.
Dark Sphere.name: Dark Sphere
Dark Sphere.tooltip:
Conjures a Dark Sphere dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The sphere remains for {{ e2 }} seconds and can be manipulated by Syndra's other abilities.

This spell can be cast while moving.

Dark Wind.description: A wisp of wind strikes an enemy unit and then bounces to nearby enemy units, dealing damage and silencing the victims.
Dark Wind.name: Dark Wind
Dark Wind.tooltip:
Fires a missile at the targeted enemy that deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and silences for 1.25 seconds before bouncing to a new target (deals 150% damage to minions and monsters).

Dark Wind can bounce up to {{ e1 }} times and will prioritize enemies it has not yet hit. Targets can be hit multiple times but will only be silenced once.

Dazzle.description: Taric emits a brilliant ball of prismatic light from his gemmed shield, stunning his target and damaging them based on how close he is to them.
Dazzle.name: Dazzle
Dazzle.tooltip: Taric fires a prismatic sphere at a target enemy, stunning them for {{ e2 }} seconds and dealing between {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) and {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage. Dazzle's damage increases the closer Taric is to the target.

Deadly Bloom.description: Zyra grows a bud at target location. After a brief delay, it explodes, launching damaging thorns at all nearby enemies. If cast upon a seed, Deadly Bloom grows a Thorn Spitter plant, which fires at enemies from afar.
Deadly Bloom.name: Deadly Bloom
Deadly Bloom.tooltip:
Thorns shoot from the ground, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies within the area.

Rampant Growth: If Deadly Bloom hits a seed, a Thorn Spitter grows, dealing {{ f3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage. A Thorn Spitter has 750 range and lasts 10 seconds.

Death Lotus.description: Katarina becomes a flurry of blades, throwing daggers with unrivaled speed at up to three nearby Champions. Daggers deal magic damage and reduce incoming healing on targets hit.
Death Lotus.name: Death Lotus
Death Lotus.tooltip:
Becomes a flurry of blades, throwing daggers at the closest 3 enemy Champions dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds.

Daggers apply Grievous Wounds, reducing incoming healing by 50% for 3 seconds.

Death Mark.description: Zed leaves a shadow behind and dashes to target Champion, marking them for death. After 3 seconds, the mark will trigger, dealing a percentage of the damage Zed has dealt while the mark was active.
Death Mark.name: Death Mark
Death Mark.tooltip:
Zed briefly becomes untargetable and spawns a shadow at his location that lasts for {{ e4 }} seconds.

He then dashes to target champion and marks them for death. After 3 seconds, the mark will trigger, dealing physical damage equal to {{ a1 }} plus {{ e2 }}% of all Magic and Physical Damage dealt to the target by Zed and his shadows while the mark was active.

After 0.5 seconds Zed can reactivate Death Mark, causing Zed to switch positions with this shadow.

Death Ray.description:
Viktor uses his robotic arm to fire a chaos beam that cuts across the field in a line, dealing damage to all enemies in its path.

Augment: An explosion follows the Death Ray's wake, dealing magic damage.
Death Ray.name: Death Ray
Death Ray.tooltip:
Viktor uses his robotic arm to fire a chaos beam that cuts across the field in a line, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to every enemy in its path.

Augment - Aftershock: An explosion follows the Death Ray's wake, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Enemies already hit by the Death Ray will take {{ e2 }}% damage.

Death Sentence.description: Thresh binds an enemy in chains and pulls them toward him. Activating this ability a second time pulls Thresh to the enemy.
Death Sentence.name: Death Sentence
Death Sentence.tooltip:
Thresh grabs an enemy, then pull them to him or leaps to them.
He throws out his scythe, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to the first unit hit and pulling them toward him for 1.5 seconds.

Death Sentence's cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds if it strikes an enemy.

Reactivate this ability to pull Thresh to the bound enemy.

Deceive.description: Shaco becomes invisible and teleports to target location. His next attack is guaranteed to critically strike.
Deceive.name: Deceive
Deceive.tooltip:
Shaco teleports nearby and becomes invisible for 3.5 seconds.

His next basic attack within the next 6 seconds will critically strike, dealing {{ e1 }}% damage (normal critical strikes deal {{ e2 }}% damage).

Decimate.description: Darius winds up and swings his axe in a wide circle. Enemies struck by the blade take more damage than those struck by the handle. Darius heals based on enemy champions hit by the blade.
Decimate.name: Decimate
Decimate.tooltip:
After a short delay, Darius swings his axe around himself, striking enemies in its path. Enemies hit by the axe's blade take {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. Enemies hit by the handle take {{ e6 }}% damage (does not apply Hemorrhage).

Darius heals for {{ e5 }}% of his missing Health per enemy champion hit by the blade (max: {{ e7 }}%).

Decimating Smash.description: Sion charges a powerful swing in an area in front of himself that will deal damage to enemies when released. If he charges for enough time, enemies hit by the swing will also be knocked up and stunned.
Decimating Smash.name: Decimating Smash
Decimating Smash.tooltip:
Sion charges up a heavy blow for up to 2 seconds. When released, he deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) to {{ e4 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage to enemies in the area ({{ e8 }}% damage to minions). Enemies hit are briefly slowed.

If Sion charges for at least 1 second, enemies are knocked up and stunned for 1.25 to 2.25 seconds.

Decisive Strike.description: Garen gains a burst of movement speed, breaking free of all slows affecting him. His next attack strikes a vital area of his foe, dealing bonus damage and silencing them.
Decisive Strike.name: Decisive Strike
Decisive Strike.tooltip:
Garen breaks free from all slows affecting him, and gains {{ e2 }}% movement speed for {{ e5 }} seconds.

His next basic attack within {{ e6 }} seconds deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and silences his target for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Decoy.description: Wukong becomes invisible for 1.5 seconds. An uncontrollable decoy is left behind that will deal Magic Damage to enemies near it after 1.5 seconds.
Decoy.name: Decoy
Decoy.tooltip: Wukong becomes invisible for 1.5 seconds. An uncontrollable decoy is left behind that will deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to enemies near it after 1.5 seconds.

Decrepify.description: Swain sets his raven to cripple an enemy. Over the next 3 seconds, the target is damaged and slowed.
Decrepify.name: Decrepify
Decrepify.tooltip: Swain sets his raven to cripple an enemy. Over the next 3 seconds, the target takes {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second and is slowed by {{ e2 }}%.

Defensive Ball Curl.description: Rammus goes into a defensive formation, vastly increasing his Armor and Magic Resist, while returning damage to attacks.
Defensive Ball Curl.name: Defensive Ball Curl
Defensive Ball Curl.tooltip:
Rammus goes into a defensive formation for {{ e3 }} seconds, increasing his Armor and Magic Resist by {{ e1 }} and returning {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage to attackers.

This ability gains damage equal to {{ e4 }}% of Armor.

Activating Powerball will remove this effect after 1 second.

Defile.description: Karthus passively steals energy from his victims, gaining Mana on each kill. Alternatively, Karthus can surround himself in the souls of his prey, dealing damage to nearby enemies, but quickly draining his own Mana.
Defile.name: Defile
Defile.tooltip:
Toggle Off: When Karthus kills a unit, he restores {{ e2 }} Mana.

Toggle On: Drains {{ cost }} Mana to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies each second.

Demacian Justice.description:
The enemy champion with the most recent kills is the Villain. Garen's attacks deal additional true damage to that champion.

Garen can call upon the might of Demacia to deal a finishing blow to an enemy champion that deals damage based upon how much health his target has missing. This damage is true damage against the Villain.
Demacian Justice.name: Demacian Justice
Demacian Justice.tooltip:
Passive: The enemy champion with the most recent kills is the Villain. Judgment and basic attacks against it deal an additional {{ e3 }}% of its maximum health as true damage.

Active: Garen calls upon the might of Demacia to attempt to execute an enemy champion, dealing {{ e1 }} magic damage plus {{ e2 }}% of the target's missing health. Deals true damage to the Villain.

Demacian Standard.description: Jarvan IV carries the pride of Demacia, passively granting him bonus Attack Speed. Activating Demacian Standard allows Jarvan IV to place a Demacian flag that deals magic damage on impact and grants Attack Speed to nearby allied champions.
Demacian Standard.name: Demacian Standard
Demacian Standard.tooltip:
Passive: Gains {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed.

Active: Throws a Demacian Standard to a nearby area dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies. The Standard lasts for {{ e4 }} seconds and grants surrounding allied champions {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed.

Denting Blows.description: Vi's punches break her opponent's Armor, dealing bonus damage and granting her Attack Speed.
Denting Blows.name: Denting Blows
Denting Blows.tooltip: Every 3rd attack on the same target deals an additional {{ e1 }}% (+{{ f1 }}%) of the target's maximum Health as physical damage, reduces its Armor by 20% and grants Vi {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed for 4 seconds (max 300 damage vs. minions and monsters).

Depth Charge.description: Nautilus fires a shockwave into the earth that chases an opponent. This shockwave rips up the earth above it, knocking enemies into the air. When it reaches the opponent, the shockwave erupts, knocking his target into the air and stunning them.
Depth Charge.name: Depth Charge
Depth Charge.tooltip:
Nautilus fires a shockwave that chases an enemy champion. This deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies it passes through and knocks them into the air.

The shockwave explodes upon hitting its target dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage, launching them into the air and stunning them for {{ e5 }} seconds.

Despair.description: Overcome by anguish, nearby enemies lose a percentage of their maximum Health each second.
Despair.name: Despair
Despair.tooltip: Toggle: Nearby enemies take {{ e2 }} magic damage plus {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of their maximum Health each second.

Desperate Power.description: Ryze channels immense arcane power to gain Movement Speed, Spell Vamp, and area of effect damage on his spells. He also passively gains Cooldown Reduction and increases the duration of Arcane Mastery's supercharged effect.
Desperate Power.name: Desperate Power
Desperate Power.tooltip:
Passive: Ryze gains {{ e8 }}% Cooldown Reduction.

Active: Ryze gains {{ e1 }} Movement Speed and {{ e4 }}% Spell Vamp for {{ e10 }} seconds. During this time, Ryze's spells deal {{ e5 }}% additional damage to enemies near his targets.

Destiny.description: Twisted Fate predicts the fortunes of his foes, revealing all enemy champions and enabling the use of Gate, which teleports Twisted Fate to any target location in 1.5 seconds.
Destiny.name: Destiny
Destiny.tooltip:
Reveals all enemy champions (including stealthed champions) on the map for {{ e1 }} seconds.

While Destiny is active, Twisted Fate can teleport up to {{ e4 }} units away in 1.5 seconds.

Devastating Blow.description: Poppy crushes her opponent, dealing attack damage plus a flat amount and 8% of her target's max Health as bonus damage. The bonus damage cannot exceed a threshold based on rank.
Devastating Blow.name: Devastating Blow
Devastating Blow.tooltip: Poppy crushes her opponent, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) plus 8% of her target's maximum Health as Magic Damage. The base plus percent Health bonus damage cannot exceed {{ e3 }}.

Devastating Charge.description: Hecarim gains increasing Movement Speed for a short duration. His next attack knocks the target back and deals additional physical damage based on the distance he has traveled since activating the ability.
Devastating Charge.name: Devastating Charge
Devastating Charge.tooltip: Hecarim gains increasing Movement Speed for {{ e5 }} seconds. His next attack knocks the target back dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ f1 }}) to {{ e3 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage based on how far Hecarim has traveled during Devastating Charge.

Devour.description: Tahm Kench devours a target, dealing a percentage of their maximum health as magic damage. He can spit devoured minions and monsters out as a skillshot that deals magic damage in an area upon impact.
Devour.name: Devour
Devour.tooltip:
Devour a target for {{ e1 }}s (half that for enemy champions.) Enemies are dealt {{ e3 }}% (+{{ a1 }}%) of their maximum health as magic damage (maximum of {{ e2 }} against neutral monsters).

Enemy Champions: Requires 3 stacks of An Acquired Taste to be devoured. While holding an enemy champion, Tahm Kench is slowed by 95%.

Allied Champions: While holding an allied champion, Tahm Kench gains {{ e4 }}% movement speed toward enemy champions (halved when not moving toward enemy champions).

Minions and Monsters: Reactivate to spit them, dealing {{ e7 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to targets hit.

Diplomatic Immunity.description: Poppy focuses intently on a single enemy champion, dealing increased damage to them. Poppy is immune to any damage and abilities from enemies other than her target.
Diplomatic Immunity.name: Diplomatic Immunity
Diplomatic Immunity.tooltip:
For {{ e1 }} seconds, Poppy is immune to any damage and abilities from enemies other than her target enemy champion.
Poppy deals {{ e2 }}% increased damage to the marked target.

Disintegrate.description: Annie hurls a Mana infused fireball, dealing damage and refunding the Mana cost if it destroys the target.
Disintegrate.name: Disintegrate
Disintegrate.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Mana cost and half the cooldown are refunded if Disintegrate kills the target.

Distortion.description: LeBlanc rapidly dashes to a target location, dealing magic damage to nearby units. In the following 4 seconds, she can activate Distortion again to return to her starting location.
Distortion.name: Distortion
Distortion.tooltip:
Dashes to a target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby units.

For 4 seconds, she can activate Distortion again to return to her starting location.

Divine Blessing.description: Blesses a target friendly champion, granting them increased Movement Speed and healing them.
Divine Blessing.name: Divine Blessing
Divine Blessing.tooltip: Blesses an allied champion, increasing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) for {{ e3 }} seconds and healing them for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health.

Dominus.description: Renekton transforms into the Tyrant form, gaining bonus Health and dealing damage to enemies around him. While in this form, Renekton gains Fury periodically.
Dominus.name: Dominus
Dominus.tooltip: Renekton surrounds himself with dark energies for 15 seconds, gaining {{ e1 }} Health. While active, he deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and gains 5 Fury per second.

Double Up.description: Miss Fortune fires a bullet at an enemy, damaging them and a target behind them.
Double Up.name: Double Up
Double Up.tooltip:
Miss Fortune fires a shot through an enemy to hit another enemy behind them, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the first target and {{ e4 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage to the second.

If the first target is killed, the second hit will critically strike and deal 150% damage instead.

Dragon Strike.description: Jarvan IV extends his lance, dealing physical damage and lowering the Armor of all enemies in its path. Additionally, this will pull Jarvan to his Demacian Standard, knocking up enemies in his path.
Dragon Strike.name: Dragon Strike
Dragon Strike.tooltip:
Extends Jarvan IV's lance dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and lowering the Armor of all enemies hit by {{ e2 }}% for 3 seconds.

If the lance contacts Demacian Standard it will pull Jarvan IV to its location, knocking up enemies in his path.

Dragon's Descent.description:
Shyvana transforms into a dragon and takes flight to a target location. Enemies along her path take damage and are knocked toward her target location.

Shyvana passively gains Fury per second and gains 2 Fury on basic attack.
Dragon's Descent.name: Dragon's Descent
Dragon's Descent.tooltip:
Active: Shyvana transforms into a dragon and takes flight to a target location. Enemies along her path take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are knocked toward her target location.

Passive: Shyvana generates {{ e3 }} Fury every 1.5 seconds. Basic Attacks generate {{ e2 }} Fury.

Dragon's Rage.description: Lee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick launching his target back, dealing physical damage to the target and any enemies they collide with. Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air for a short duration. This technique was taught to him by Jesse Perring, although Lee Sin does not kick players off the map.
Dragon's Rage.name: Dragon's Rage
Dragon's Rage.tooltip: Lee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick launching an enemy champion back, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to the target and any enemies they collide with. Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air for a short duration. Every time the target collides with an enemy champion, the target also deals {{ e3 }}% of their bonus health as physical damage.

Drain.description: Fiddlesticks saps the life force of an enemy, dealing damage to a target over time and healing himself.
Drain.name: Drain
Drain.tooltip:
Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each second to target unit and heals Fiddlesticks for {{ e3 }}% of the damage dealt.
Lasts up to 5 seconds.

Dredge Line.description: Nautilus hurls his anchor forward. If it hits a champion, he drags both himself and the opponent close together. If it hits terrain, Nautilus instead pulls himself to the anchor and the cooldown of Dredge Line is reduced by half.
Dredge Line.name: Dredge Line
Dredge Line.tooltip:
Nautilus hurls his anchor forward. If it hits an enemy unit, Nautilus drags himself and the target together dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and stunning them briefly.

If the anchor hits terrain, Nautilus will drag himself forward and the cooldown is reduced by {{ e3 }}% ({{ f1 }}).

Drunken Rage.description: Gragas guzzles down brew from his cask for 1 second. After finishing, he becomes drunkenly empowered, dealing more damage on his next basic attack and reducing damage received.
Drunken Rage.name: Drunken Rage
Drunken Rage.tooltip: Gragas guzzles down his brew and takes {{ e1 }}% reduced damage for 2.5 seconds. After finishing his drink, his next basic attack deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e2 }}% of the target's maximum Health (max. {{ e4 }} against monsters) as bonus magic damage.

Duskbringer.description: Nocturne throws a shadow blade that deals damage, leaves a Dusk Trail, and causes champions to leave a Dusk Trail. While on the trail, Nocturne can move through units and has increased Movement Speed and Attack Damage.
Duskbringer.name: Duskbringer
Duskbringer.tooltip:
Nocturne throws a shadow blade that deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and leaves a Dusk Trail for {{ e3 }} seconds. Enemy champions hit also leave a Dusk Trail.

While on the trail, Nocturne can move through units and gains {{ e1 }}% Movement Speed and {{ e4 }} Attack Damage.

Ebb and Flow.description: Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allies and enemies, healing allies and damaging enemies.
Ebb and Flow.name: Ebb and Flow
Ebb and Flow.tooltip:
Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allies and enemies.

On Ally Hit: Heals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Health and will bounce to a nearby enemy champion.

On Enemy Hit: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and bounces to a nearby allied champion.

Bounces to each target only once, and hits up to {{ e2 }} targets. The damage and healing value is modified by ({{ f1 }}%) each bounce.

Eclipse.description: Leona raises her shield to gain Armor and Magic Resistance. When the duration first ends, if there are nearby enemies, she will deal magic damage to them and prolong the duration of the effect.
Eclipse.name: Eclipse
Eclipse.tooltip: Gains {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) bonus Armor and {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) Magic Resist for {{ e3 }} seconds. When the effect ends, nearby enemies struck take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and Leona retains her bonus Armor and Magic Resist for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Elastic Slingshot.description: Zac attaches his arms to the ground and stretches back, launching himself forward.
Elastic Slingshot.name: Elastic Slingshot
Elastic Slingshot.tooltip:
Charges up and launches towards a target area, knocking up enemies.
Zac faces the cursor and charges up over {{ e4 }} seconds. Reactivating the ability launches him towards his target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to all enemies hit and knocking them back for {{ e5 }} second.

In addition, Zac will spawn extra chunks if he hits multiple enemy champions.

Can be cancelled by moving, refunding half of the ability's cooldown and cost.

Electrical Surge.description: Kennen passively deals extra damage and adds a Mark of the Storm to his target every few attacks, and he can activate this ability to damage and add another Mark of the Storm to targets who are already marked.
Electrical Surge.name: Electrical Surge
Electrical Surge.tooltip:
Passive: Every 5 attacks, Kennen deals bonus magic damage equal to {{ e2 }}% of his attack damage and adds a Mark of the Storm to his target.

Active: Sends a surge of electricity through all nearby targets caught in Slicing Maelstrom or afflicted by Mark of the Storm, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Electro Harpoon.description: Rumble launches a taser, electrocuting his target with magic damage and slowing their Movement Speed. A second shot can be fired within 3 seconds. While in Danger Zone the damage and slow percentage is increased.
Electro Harpoon.name: Electro Harpoon
Electro Harpoon.tooltip:
Rumble shoots his opponent with up to 2 tasers, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and applying a stacking slow of {{ e2 }}% for 3 seconds.

Danger Zone Bonus: Damage and slow percentage increased by 50%.

After using this ability you may cast it a second time at no cost within 3 seconds.

Emperor's Divide.description: Azir summons a wall of soldiers which charge forward, knocking back and damaging enemies.
Emperor's Divide.name: Emperor's Divide
Emperor's Divide.tooltip:
Azir summons a wall of armored soldiers that charge forward, knocking back enemies and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The soldiers then remain as a wall for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Enemies will be stopped by Emperor's Divide, even if they attempt to dash over the wall, but Azir and his allies can pass freely and gain {{ e5 }}% Movement Speed for 1 second when they pass through the wall.

Emperor's Divide does not interact with Azir's basic attacks or spells.

Empower.description: Jax charges his weapon with energy, causing his next attack to deal additional damage.
Empower.name: Empower
Empower.tooltip: Jax charges his weapon with energy, causing his next basic attack or Leap Strike to deal an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage.

Enchanted Crystal Arrow.description: Ashe fires a missile of ice in a straight line. If the arrow collides with an enemy Champion, it deals damage and stuns the Champion for up to 3.5 seconds, based on how far the arrow has traveled. In addition, surrounding enemy units take damage and are slowed.
Enchanted Crystal Arrow.name: Enchanted Crystal Arrow
Enchanted Crystal Arrow.tooltip: Launches a crystal arrow of ice in a line that stuns an enemy Champion dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The farther the arrow flies, the longer the stun, up to {{ e2 }} seconds. Surrounding enemies take half damage.

Equilibrium Strike.description: Irelia's attack balances the scales, dealing damage and slowing the target. However, if the target has a higher Health % than Irelia, then the blow stuns the target instead of slowing.
Equilibrium Strike.name: Equilibrium Strike
Equilibrium Strike.tooltip:
Irelia pierces her target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing the target by 60% for {{ e2 }} second(s).

If the target has a higher Health % than Irelia, she stuns the target for the duration instead.

Equinox.description: Creates a zone at a location that silences all enemies inside. When the zone expires, all enemies still inside are rooted.
Equinox.name: Equinox
