Equinox.tooltip:
Creates a zone at target location for 1.5 seconds, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemy Champions in the cast radius. Enemy Champions standing in the zone are silenced until they leave.

When the zone disappears, all enemy Champions still standing in the zone are rooted for {{ e1 }} second(s) and are dealt {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Essence Flux.description: Ezreal fires a fluctuating wave of energy, dealing magic damage to enemy champions, while increasing the Attack Speed of allied champions.
Essence Flux.name: Essence Flux
Essence Flux.tooltip: Ezreal fires a wave of energy that damages all enemy champions it passes through for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. If Ezreal or his Allied champions are hit by the wave, their Attack Speed is increased by {{ e2 }}% for 5 seconds.

Ethereal Chains.description: LeBlanc flings illusionary chains towards a target location. If it hits an enemy unit, it will deal initial magic damage and slow their Movement Speed by 25%. If the target remains shackled for 2 seconds, the target takes additional magic damage and is unable to move.
Ethereal Chains.name: Ethereal Chains
Ethereal Chains.tooltip:
Launches a chain that shackles the first unit hit to LeBlanc, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing their Movement Speed by 25%.

If the target remains shackled for {{ e2 }} seconds they take an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are unable to move for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Event Horizon.description: After a brief delay Veigar twists the edges of space around the target location for 3 seconds, stunning enemies who pass through the perimeter.
Event Horizon.name: Event Horizon
Event Horizon.tooltip: After a {{ e2 }} second delay, Veigar twists the edges of space around the target location for 3 seconds, forming a pentagon of walls. Enemies who attempt to pass through the perimeter are stopped and stunned for {{ e1 }} seconds.

Excessive Force.description: Vi's next attack blasts through her target, dealing damage to enemies behind it.
Excessive Force.name: Excessive Force
Excessive Force.tooltip:
Causes next basic attack to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ f3 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the target and enemies behind it.

Vi charges a new punch every {{ f1 }} seconds and can hold 2 charges at once.

Explosive Cask.description: Gragas hurls his cask to a location, dealing damage and knocking back enemies caught in the blast radius.
Explosive Cask.name: Explosive Cask
Explosive Cask.tooltip: Gragas throws his cask, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in the area and knocking them back from the center.

Explosive Charge.description: When Tristana kills a unit, her cannonballs burst into shrapnel, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Can be activated to place a bomb on a target enemy that explodes after a short duration dealing damage to surrounding units.
Explosive Charge.name: Explosive Charge
Explosive Charge.tooltip:
Passive: Enemies explode when slain by Tristana's basic attacks, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage to nearby enemies.

Active: Places a charge on target enemy or turret that explodes after 4 seconds, dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

Tristana's basic attacks against the target increase the charge's damage by {{ e8 }}%, stacking up to 4 times. If Tristana basic attacks a target with 4 stacks, the charge explodes immediately. The detonation radius is twice as large if used on a turret.

Eye Of The Storm.description: Janna conjures a defensive gale that shields an ally champion or turret from incoming damage and increases their Attack Damage.
Eye Of The Storm.name: Eye Of The Storm
Eye Of The Storm.tooltip: Shields an allied Champion or turret for {{ e3 }} seconds. The shield absorbs up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage and grants {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Attack Damage until it breaks.

Eye of Destruction.description: Calls down a barrage of arcane energy, slowing and dealing magic damage to all enemies in an area. Targets in the middle receive additional damage and a stronger slow.
Eye of Destruction.name: Eye of Destruction
Eye of Destruction.tooltip: Xerath calls down a blast of arcane energy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies within the target area, slowing them by 10% for {{ e4 }} seconds. Enemies in the center of the blast take {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}%. This slow decays rapidly.

Fate's Call.description: Kalista teleports the Oathsworn ally to herself. They gain the ability to dash toward a position, knocking enemy champions back.
Fate's Call.name: Fate's Call
Fate's Call.tooltip:
Draw Kalista's Oathsworn to her. For up to 4 seconds, the Oathsworn is untargetable but pacified.

They may mouse click to fly toward target position, stopping at the first enemy champion hit, knocking all enemies in a small radius back and placing the Oathsworn at their maximum attack range from the enemy.

Kalista's Oathsworn must be within 1400 units for her to cast this ability.

Feast.description: Devours an enemy unit, dealing a high amount of true damage. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath grows, gaining maximum Health (maximum 6 stacks). Cho'Gath loses half of his stacks upon death. Half the cooldown and mana cost are refunded if a minion or monster is killed.
Feast.name: Feast
Feast.tooltip:
Ravenously feed on an enemy unit, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) true damage to champions or 1000 (+{{ a1 }}) to minions and monsters. If Feast deals a killing blow, Cho'Gath gains a stack of Feast, which causes him to grow in size and gain {{ e3 }} maximum health, as well as a bonus effect based on the target.

Bonus from champions: gain an additional stack of Feast.
Bonus from minions and monsters: refund 50% of Feast's cooldown and cost.

Cho'Gath cannot have more than 6 stacks of Feast at once and loses half of his stacks upon dying.

Feint.description: Shen shields himself, absorbing incoming damage for a few seconds.
Feint.name: Feint
Feint.tooltip:
Shen shields himself, absorbing the next {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage. Lasts up to {{ e4 }} seconds.

While Feint holds, his attacks reduce Ki Strike's cooldown by an additional {{ e5 }} second.

Feral Scream.description: Cho'Gath unleashes a terrible scream at enemies in a cone, dealing magic damage and Silencing enemies for a few seconds.
Feral Scream.name: Feral Scream
Feral Scream.tooltip: Silences enemies in a cone for {{ e2 }} second(s) and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Final Hour.description: Readying herself for an epic confrontation, Vayne gains increased Attack Damage, invisibility during Tumble, and triple the bonus Movement Speed from Night Hunter.
Final Hour.name: Final Hour
Final Hour.tooltip: Gains {{ e1 }} Bonus Attack Damage for {{ e2 }} seconds. While active, Tumble grants invisibility for {{ e3 }} second, and Night Hunter's bonus Movement Speed is increased to {{ e4 }}.

Final Spark.description: After gathering energy, Lux fires a beam of light that deals damage to all targets in the area. In addition, triggers Lux's passive ability and refreshes the Illumination debuff duration.
Final Spark.name: Final Spark
Final Spark.tooltip: Fires a dazzling ray of light dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in a line. Final Spark ignites and refreshes the Illumination debuff.

Flail of the Northern Winds.description: Sejuani's next basic attack deals bonus magic damage to the target and enemies near it. She then spins her flail, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.
Flail of the Northern Winds.name: Flail of the Northern Winds
Flail of the Northern Winds.tooltip:
Sejuani's next basic attack also affects enemies near her target. All affected units are dealt magic damage equal to {{ e3 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) of their own maximum Health. Sejuani then swings her flail, dealing {{ e5 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies over 4 seconds.

If this ability is reactivated, Sejuani immediately starts swinging her flail.

Flame Breath.description:
Shyvana unleashes a fireball that deals damage to all enemies it encounters and leaves cinders on the target, marking them for 4 seconds. Shyvana's basic attacks on marked targets deal a percentage of their maximum Health as damage on-hit.

Dragon Form: Flame Breath engulfs all units in a cone in front of her.
Flame Breath.name: Flame Breath
Flame Breath.tooltip:
Shyvana unleashes a fireball that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies it passes through, debuffing them for 5 seconds. Shyvana's basic attacks to debuffed targets deal {{ e4 }}% of their maximum Health as magic damage on-hit. (Max: 100 vs monsters)

Dragon Form: Flame Breath engulfs all units in a cone in front of her.

Flame Chompers!.description: Jinx throws out a line of snare grenades that explode after 5 seconds, lighting enemies on fire. Flame Chompers will bite enemy champions who walk over them, rooting them in place.
Flame Chompers!.name: Flame Chompers!
Flame Chompers!.tooltip: Jinx tosses out 3 chompers that, once armed, explode on contact with enemy champions, rooting the target for 1.5 seconds and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage over 1.5 seconds to nearby enemies. Chompers last for 5 seconds.

Flamespitter.description: Rumble torches opponents in front of him, dealing magic damage in a cone for 3 seconds. While in Danger Zone this damage is increased.
Flamespitter.name: Flamespitter
Flamespitter.tooltip:
Rumble torches his opponents, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a cone over 3 seconds. This spell deals half damage to minions and neutral monsters.

Danger Zone Bonus: Deals 50% bonus damage.

Flash Frost.description: Anivia brings her wings together and summons a sphere of ice that flies towards her opponents, chilling and damaging anyone in its path. When the sphere explodes it does moderate damage in a radius, stunning anyone in the area.
Flash Frost.name: Flash Frost
Flash Frost.tooltip:
A massive chunk of ice flies toward target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and chilling targets, slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}%.

At the end of its range or if Anivia activates the spell again, the missile detonates, doing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a small area and stunning units for {{ e4 }} second.

Flay.description: Thresh's attacks wind up, dealing more damage the longer he waits between attacks. When activated, Thresh sweeps his chain, knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blow.
Flay.name: Flay
Flay.tooltip:
Passive: Thresh deals {{ f1 }}-{{ f2 }} Magic Damage on each hit, which builds up when not attacking.
This value is equal to total souls collected plus up to {{ e3 }}% of Attack Damage, based on the amount of time since his last attack.

Active: Thresh knocks nearby enemies in the direction of his choice.
Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage in a line beginning behind him. Enemies hit are pushed in the direction of the swing, then slowed by {{ e2 }}% for 1.5 seconds.

Cast forward to push; cast backward to pull.

Fling.description: Damages target enemy unit and flings them into the air behind Singed. If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted.
Fling.name: Fling
Fling.tooltip:
Singed flings an enemy over his shoulder, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e3 }}% of the target's maximum Health as magic damage. Max 300 bonus damage against minions and monsters.

If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Focused Resolve.description:
Karma creates a tether between herself and a targeted enemy, dealing damage over time and revealing them. If the tether is not broken, the enemy will be rooted.

Mantra Bonus: Karma strengthens the link, healing herself and extending the root duration.
Focused Resolve.name: Focused Resolve
Focused Resolve.tooltip:
Links Karma to target enemy champion or monster, revealing them, and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds, rooting them in place for {{ e2 }} second(s) if the link is not broken.

Mantra Bonus - Renewal: Karma is healed for {{ f1 }}% (+{{ f3 }}%) of her missing health. If the link is not broken, the root duration is increased by {{ f2 }} second(s) and Karma is healed for {{ f1 }}% (+{{ f3 }}%) of her missing health.

Force Pulse.description: Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity. Upon charging up, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to damage and slow enemies in a cone in front of him.
Force Pulse.name: Force Pulse
Force Pulse.tooltip:
Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity, gaining a charge whenever a spell is cast near him.

Upon reaching 6 charges, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slow enemies by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} second in a cone in front of him.

Force of Will.description: Syndra picks up and throws a Dark Sphere or enemy minion dealing magic damage and slowing the Movement Speed of enemies.
Force of Will.name: Force of Will
Force of Will.tooltip:
First Cast: Grabs target Dark Sphere or enemy minion. If no target is selected, grabs nearest Dark Sphere.

Second Cast: Throws the Dark Sphere or enemy minion. Enemies hit take {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e1 }}% for {{ f2 }} seconds.

This spell can be cast while moving.

Fox-Fire.description: Ahri releases three fox-fires, that lock onto and attack nearby enemies.
Fox-Fire.name: Fox-Fire
Fox-Fire.tooltip:
Releases three fox-fires that lock on to nearby enemies (prioritizes Champions) dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Enemies hit with multiple fox-fires take 30% damage from each additional fox-fire beyond the first, for a maximum of {{ f1 }} damage to a single enemy.

Fracture.description: Skarner summons a blast of crystalline energy which deals damage to enemies struck and slows them. Basic attacking these enemies within a short window will stun them.
Fracture.name: Fracture
Fracture.tooltip:
Passive: Crystallizing enemies with Fracture and Impale grants Crystal Charge for the disable duration and reduces the cooldown of Fracture by the same amount.

Active: Skarner summons a blast of crystalline energy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, slowing targets hit by {{ e8 }}% for {{ e7 }} seconds and reducing the blast's speed. A maximum of 6 targets can be hit by Fracture before the blast dissipates entirely.

Enemies hit by Fracture are afflicted with Crystal Venom for {{ e6 }} seconds, causing Skarner's next basic attack against them to deal {{ e2 }} additional physical damage and stun the target for {{ e3 }} second.

Frenzy.description: Volibear's repeated attacks grant him additional Attack Speed. Once Volibear has repeatedly attacked three times, he can perform a vicious bite on his target which deals increased damage based on the target's missing Health.
Frenzy.name: Frenzy
Frenzy.tooltip:
Passive: Volibear gains {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed with each attack. Stacks up to {{ e2 }} times.

Active: When Volibear has {{ e2 }} stacks of Frenzy, he can bite an enemy to deal {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }} [{{ e4 }}% of bonus Health]) physical damage, increased by {{ e5 }}% for each {{ e5 }}% Health the target is missing. If Volibear bites a monster, Frenzy's cooldown is reduced by {{ e6 }}%.

Frostbite.description: With a flap of her wings, Anivia blasts a freezing gust of wind at her target, dealing a medium amount of damage. If the target has been slowed by Flash Frost or Glacial Storm, the damage they take is doubled.
Frostbite.name: Frostbite
Frostbite.tooltip: Anivia blasts her target with a freezing wind, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. If the target has been slowed by Flash Frost or Glacial Storm, they take double damage.

Frozen Domain.description: Trundle turns target location into his domain, gaining Attack Speed, Movement Speed, and increased healing from all sources while on it.
Frozen Domain.name: Frozen Domain
Frozen Domain.tooltip: Trundle coats target location with ice for {{ e4 }} seconds, gaining {{ e1 }}% Movement Speed, {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed and {{ e3 }}% increased healing and regeneration from all sources.

Frozen Tomb.description: If cast on an enemy champion, the target is frozen solid, stunning it. If cast on Lissandra, she encases herself in dark ice, becoming untargetable and invulnerable. Dark ice then emanates from the target dealing magic damage to enemies and slowing Movement Speed.
Frozen Tomb.name: Frozen Tomb
Frozen Tomb.tooltip:
On Enemy Cast: Freezes target champion solid, stunning it for {{ e4 }} seconds.

On Self Cast: Lissandra encases herself in dark ice for {{ e5 }} seconds, healing for {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}), increased for 1% for each 1% Health she is missing, and becoming untargetable and invulnerable but unable to take any actions.

Dark ice then emanates from the target dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies. The ice lasts for {{ e3 }} seconds and slows enemy Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}%.

Furious Bite / Tunnel.description:
Rek'Sai bites her target, dealing increased damage based on her Fury. Deals True Damage at max Fury.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai creates a re-usable, long lasting tunnel. Enemies can destroy it by standing on top of either entrance.
Furious Bite / Tunnel.name: Furious Bite / Tunnel
Furious Bite / Tunnel.tooltip:
Un-Burrowed: Rek'Sai bites a target dealing {{ f1 }} Physical Damage, increasing by up to 100% at maximum Fury. If Rek'Sai has 100 Fury, Furious Bite deals True Damage.

Maximum Damage: {{ f2 }}

Burrowed: Rek'Sai tunnels forward leaving two connected Tunnel Entrances. Clicking a Tunnel Entrance will make Rek'Sai dive to the other entrance.

Tunnel Entrances last for {{ e5 }} minutes and can be destroyed by enemies. Rek'Sai may have {{ e6 }} tunnels at one time. Tunnels have a {{ e8 }} second cooldown on use.

Fury of the Sands.description: Nasus unleashes a mighty sandstorm that batters nearby enemies. While the storm rages, he gains increased Health, Attack Range, and drains nearby enemies' max Health converting into bonus damage for the duration.
Fury of the Sands.name: Fury of the Sands
Fury of the Sands.tooltip:
Nasus becomes empowered in the sandstorm for 15 seconds, increasing his maximum Health by {{ e1 }} and Attack Range by {{ e2 }}.

While the storm rages, he deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of nearby enemies' maximum Health each second ({{ e5 }} damage max per second) as magic damage and converts it into bonus Attack Damage.

GNAR!.description: Mega Gnar throws everything around him in a chosen direction, dealing damage and slowing them.  Any enemy that hits a wall is stunned and takes bonus damage.
GNAR!.name: GNAR!
GNAR!.tooltip:
Mini Gnar: Passive: Increases Boomerang Throw's cooldown reduction on catch to {{ e4 }}% and Hyper's Movement Speed bonus to {{ e2 }}%.

Mega Gnar: Knocks all nearby enemies in the specified direction, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage and slowing them by 45% for {{ e3 }} seconds. Any enemy that hits a wall takes 150% damage and is stunned instead of slowed.

Gatling Gun.description: Corki's gatling gun rapidly fires in a cone in front of him, dealing damage and reducing enemy Armor.
Gatling Gun.name: Gatling Gun
Gatling Gun.tooltip: Corki's gatling gun fires at all targets in front of him for {{ e1 }} seconds, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and reducing {{ e2 }} Armor per second. The Armor reduction stacks and lasts 2 seconds.

Glacial Fissure.description: Braum slams the ground, knocking up enemies nearby and in a line in front of him. A fissure is left along the line that slows enemies.
Glacial Fissure.name: Glacial Fissure
Glacial Fissure.tooltip:
Braum slams the ground, knocking up enemies nearby and in a line in front of him. A fissure is left along the line that slows enemies.

Enemies hit take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The first champion hit is knocked up for {{ e5 }} seconds, subsequent enemies are knocked up briefly.

For the next {{ e3 }} seconds enemies that enter the area are slowed by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds.

Glacial Path.description: Lissandra creates an ice claw that deals magic damage. Reactivating this ability transports Lissandra to the claw's current location.
Glacial Path.name: Glacial Path
Glacial Path.tooltip: Casts an ice claw that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies hit. Reactivating this ability transports Lissandra to the claw's current location.

Glacial Prison.description: Sejuani throws her True Ice bola in a line. If the bola hits an enemy champion, it shatters, stunning the target and nearby enemies. If the bola reaches its maximum range, it shatters and slows nearby enemies.
Glacial Prison.name: Glacial Prison
Glacial Prison.tooltip:
Sejuani throws her True Ice bola in a line. If the bola hits an enemy champion, it shatters, stunning the target and nearby enemies for {{ e2 }} seconds. If the bola reaches its maximum range, it shatters and slows enemies by {{ e5 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds instead.

All enemies in the shatter area take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Glacial Storm.description: Anivia summons a driving rain of ice and hail to damage her enemies and slow their advance.
Glacial Storm.name: Glacial Storm
Glacial Storm.tooltip:
Toggle: Anivia calls forth a driving rain of ice and hail, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second and chilling targets, slowing their Attack and Movement Speed by {{ e4 }}%.

Drains {{ e2 }} Mana per second.

Glitterlance.description: Pix and Lulu each fire a bolt of magical energy that heavily slows all enemies it hits. An enemy can only be damaged by one bolt.
Glitterlance.name: Glitterlance
Glitterlance.tooltip:
Lulu and Pix each fire a piercing bolt dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, slowing enemies hit by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} second(s). This slow decays over time.

An enemy can only be damaged by one bolt.

Golden Aegis.description: Jarvan IV calls upon the ancient kings of Demacia to shield him from harm and slow surrounding enemies.
Golden Aegis.name: Golden Aegis
Golden Aegis.tooltip: Temporarily gains a shield that absorbs up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ e3 }} damage for each nearby enemy champion) damage for 5 seconds, and slows surrounding enemies by {{ e2 }}% for 2 seconds.

Grand Challenge.description: Fiora reveals all four Vitals on the target champion and gains movement speed while near them. If Fiora hits all 4 Vitals or if the target dies after she has hit at least one, Fiora and her allies in the area are healed over the next few seconds.
Grand Challenge.name: Grand Challenge
Grand Challenge.tooltip:
Fiora reveals all four Vitals on the target champion, for a potential {{ f8 }}% max health true damage. In addition, Fiora gains Duelist's Dance's movement speed bonus ({{ f6 }}%) while near the target.

If Fiora hits all 4 Vitals in {{ e1 }} seconds or if the target dies after she has hit at least one, Fiora and her allies in the area are healed for {{ e7 }} (+{{ f9 }}) each second for between {{ e9 }} to {{ e6 }} seconds, scaling with the amount of Vitals hit.

Grand Skyfall.description: Pantheon composes himself then leaps into the air to a target, striking all enemy units in an area. Enemies closer to the impact point take more damage.
Grand Skyfall.name: Grand Skyfall
Grand Skyfall.tooltip: Pantheon gathers his strength and then leaps high into the air, crashing down at the target area a few seconds later. Deals up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to units at the center (down to {{ e3 }}% at the edge) and slows their Movement Speed by {{ e4 }}% for 1 second.

Grandmaster's Might.description: Every third consecutive attack deals additional Magic Damage. Additionally, Jax can activate this ability to strengthen his resolve, increasing his Armor and Magic Resist for a short duration.
Grandmaster's Might.name: Grandmaster's Might
Grandmaster's Might.tooltip:
Passive: Every third consecutive strike Jax deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) additional Magic Damage.

Active: Jax strengthens his resolve, granting him {{ f2 }} Armor and {{ f1 }} Magic Resist for {{ e5 }} seconds.

Armor bonus is equal to {{ e3 }} + {{ e6 }}% bonus Attack Damage.
Magic Resist bonus is equal to {{ e3 }} + {{ e7 }}% Ability Power.

Grasping Roots.description: Zyra sends forth vines through the ground to ensnare her target, dealing damage and rooting enemies they come across. If cast upon a seed, Grasping Roots grows a Vine Lasher, whose short range attacks reduce enemy Movement Speed.
Grasping Roots.name: Grasping Roots
Grasping Roots.tooltip:
Sends forward vines dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and rooting enemies for {{ e5 }} second.

Rampant Growth: If Grasping Roots hits a seed, a Vine Lasher grows dealing {{ f3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage and slowing enemies by 30% for 2 seconds. A Vine Lasher has 400 range and lasts 10 seconds.

Gravity Field.description:
Viktor conjures a heavy gravitational field that slows enemies in its radius. Enemies who stay within the device for too long are stunned.

Augment: Enemies stunned by Gravity Field are dragged to the center.
Gravity Field.name: Gravity Field
Gravity Field.tooltip:
Viktor deploys a gravitational imprisonment device for 4 seconds, slowing enemy units by {{ e4 }}% and adding a stack every 0.5 seconds. At 3 stacks the target is stunned for 1.5 seconds.

Augment - Implosion: Enemies stunned by Gravity Field are dragged to the center.

Ground Slam.description: Malphite slams the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage based on his Armor as damage and reduces the Attack Speed of enemies for a short duration.
Ground Slam.name: Ground Slam
Ground Slam.tooltip:
Malphite slams the ground dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage to surrounding enemies, reducing their Attack Speed by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

This ability gains damage equal to {{ e3 }}% of Malphite's Armor.

H-28G Evolution Turret.description: Heimerdinger lays down a rapid-fire cannon turret equipped with a secondary pass-through beam attack (turrets deal half damage to towers).
H-28G Evolution Turret.name: H-28G Evolution Turret
H-28G Evolution Turret.tooltip:
Places a Turret at target location. Turret attacks prioritize Heimerdinger's targets and enemies attacking Heimerdinger. Their Health increases with Heimerdinger's champion level and they shut down if he moves out of the area. Heimerdinger generates a Turret Kit every {{ f1 }} seconds and can hold {{ e3 }} Kit(s) at once.

H-28G Evolution Turret Stats
Health: {{ f4 }} (+{{ f2 }})
Attack - Cannon: {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and +{{ e9 }}% beam charge each attack.
Attack - Beam: {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage in a line every {{ e6 }} seconds.
Maximum Turrets Placed: 3

Hail of Arrows.description: Varus fires a hail of arrows that deal physical damage and desecrate the ground. Desecrated ground slows enemies' Movement Speed and reduces their healing and regeneration.
Hail of Arrows.name: Hail of Arrows
Hail of Arrows.tooltip:
Varus fires a hail of arrows that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and desecrates the ground for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Desecrated Ground slows enemy Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and reduces healing effects by {{ e4 }}%.

Hallucinate.description: Shaco creates an illusion of himself near him, which can attack nearby enemies. (Deals half damage to turrets.)  Upon death, it explodes, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
Hallucinate.name: Hallucinate
Hallucinate.tooltip:
Shaco vanishes briefly and reappears with a clone that lasts up to 18 seconds. The clone deals 75% of Shaco's damage and receives {{ e2 }}% increased damage.

On death, the clone detonates, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies.

The clone can be controlled by holding the alt key and using the right mouse button or by reactivating this ability.

Harvesters of Sorrow.description: Coats an ally in magnetic metal, increasing each champion's movement speed toward one another. While near to one another, the metal swirls violently dealing damage per second to enemies.
Harvesters of Sorrow.name: Harvesters of Sorrow
Harvesters of Sorrow.tooltip:
Passive: Mordekaiser gains bonus experience for killing Minions near allies (bonus is {{ e9 }}% of the experience lost from sharing).

Bonus Experience Earned: {{ f3 }}

Active: Target an ally champion, linking them to Mordekaiser:

  • Both gain up to {{ e5 }} movement speed toward one another.

    When they touch, they deal {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over 4 seconds to nearby enemies.

    Reactivate to both instantly steal {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}) health from nearby enemies ({{ e7 }}% heal on minions, max {{ e8 }} units; deals magic damage).

Hate Spike.description: Evelynn fires a line of spikes through an enemy, dealing damage to all enemies in its path.
Hate Spike.name: Hate Spike
Hate Spike.tooltip:
Evelynn fires a line of spikes through a nearby enemy dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in its path.

Hate Spike prioritizes the target Evelynn is attacking.

Hawkshot.description: Ashe sends her Hawk Spirit on a scouting mission anywhere on the map.
Hawkshot.name: Hawkshot
Hawkshot.tooltip: Reveals terrain as it flies toward target location anywhere on the map. Grants vision for 5 seconds. Ashe can store up to 2 charges of Hawkshot at a time.

Headbutt.description: Alistar rams a target with his head, dealing damage and knocking the target back.
Headbutt.name: Headbutt
Headbutt.tooltip: Alistar charges at an enemy and rams them, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and stunning them while knocking them back.

Heartseeker Strike.description: Pantheon focuses and unleashes 3 swift strikes to the area in front of him, dealing double damage to champions. Pantheon also becomes more aware of his enemy's vital spots, allowing him to always crit enemies below 15% Health.
Heartseeker Strike.name: Heartseeker Strike
Heartseeker Strike.tooltip:
Passive: Pantheon's basic attacks and Spear Shot gain 100% critical strike chance against targets below {{ e3 }}% Health.

Active: Pantheon focuses and deals {{ e4 }} swift strikes in front of him for {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage per strike. Deals double damage to champions.

Heightened Senses.description: Passively grants Quinn Attack Speed and Movement Speed after she attacks a Vulnerable target. Valor's Attack Speed is permanently increased. Activate to have Valor reveal a large area nearby (does not reveal stealthed units).
Heightened Senses.name: Heightened Senses
Heightened Senses.tooltip:
Passive: Attacking a Vulnerable target will increase Quinn's Attack Speed by {{ e1 }}% and Movement Speed by {{ e6 }} for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Passive as Valor: Gains {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed.

Active: Valor reveals a large area nearby for {{ e5 }} seconds (does not reveal stealthed units).

Help, Pix!.description: If cast on an ally, commands Pix to jump to an ally and shield them. He then follows them and aids their attacks. If cast on an enemy, commands Pix to jump to an enemy and damage them. He then follows them and grants you vision of that enemy.
Help, Pix!.name: Help, Pix!
Help, Pix!.tooltip:
On Ally Cast: Commands Pix to jump to an ally and then follow and aid their attacks instead of Lulu's for {{ e1 }} seconds. If the ally is a champion, Pix shields them from {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e1 }} seconds.

On Enemy Cast: Pix deals {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to target enemy unit. Pix then follows and grants vision of them for {{ e6 }} seconds.

Hemoplague.description: Vladimir infects an area with a virulent plague. Affected enemies take increased damage for the duration. Hemoplague deals additional magic damage after a few seconds to infected enemies.
Hemoplague.name: Hemoplague
Hemoplague.tooltip:
Vladimir infects the target area with a virulent plague, causing {{ e4 }}% increased damage for 5 seconds.

After 5 seconds, infected enemies take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Heroic Charge.description: Poppy charges at an enemy and carries them further. The initial impact deals a small amount of damage, and if they collide with terrain, her target will take a high amount of damage and be stunned.
Heroic Charge.name: Heroic Charge
Heroic Charge.tooltip: Poppy charges at an enemy and carries them for a short distance. The initial impact deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage. If they collide with terrain, her target takes {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and will be stunned for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Hexplosive Minefield.description: Ziggs scatters proximity mines that detonate on enemy contact, dealing magic damage and slowing.
Hexplosive Minefield.name: Hexplosive Minefield
Hexplosive Minefield.tooltip:
Ziggs scatters proximity mines that detonate on enemy contact, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Enemies hit are slowed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Enemies triggering a mine take 40% damage from additional mines. Mines disarm automatically after {{ e3 }} seconds.

Hextech Micro-Rockets.description: Heimerdinger fires long-range rockets that converge on his cursor.
Hextech Micro-Rockets.name: Hextech Micro-Rockets
Hextech Micro-Rockets.tooltip:
Unleashes a barrage of 5 rockets that converge towards your cursor and fan out past it. Each rocket deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage. Units hit multiple times take reduced damage:

Champions and Monsters: {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage, max {{ e6 }} {{ f2 }} total damage
Minions: 60% of base damage

Aiming between Heimerdinger and the target increases the rocket spread.

Highlander.description: Master Yi moves with unparalleled agility, temporarily increasing his Movement and Attack Speeds as well as making him immune to all slowing effects. While active, Champion kills or assists extends Highlander's duration. Passively reduces cooldown for his other abilities on a kill or assist.
Highlander.name: Highlander
Highlander.tooltip:
Passive: Champion kills and assists reduce the remaining cooldown of Master Yi's basic abilities by 70%.

Active: Increases Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}%, Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}%, and grants immunity to all slowing effects for {{ e1 }} seconds. While active, champion kills and assists extend the duration of Highlander by {{ e4 }} seconds.

Hiten Style.description: Irelia is skilled in the art of Hiten, passively giving her physical attacks Health restoration. Activating Hiten Style doubles her Health restoration and gives her basic attacks true damage.
Hiten Style.name: Hiten Style
Hiten Style.tooltip:
Passive: Basic attacks restore {{ e1 }} Health.

Active: Irelia's basic attacks deal {{ e2 }} true damage and doubles Health restored for 6 seconds.

Hop / Crunch.description:
Gnar leaps to a location and bounces off the head of any unit he lands on, traveling further.

Mega Gnar is too large to bounce and instead lands with earth-shattering force, dealing damage in an area around him.
Hop / Crunch.name: Hop / Crunch
Hop / Crunch.tooltip:
Mini Gnar: Leaps to a location, gaining {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds. If Gnar lands on a unit he will bounce off it, traveling further. Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) [6% of Gnar's Max Health] physical damage and slows briefly if the unit landed on was an enemy.

Mega Gnar: Leaps to a location and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) [6% of Gnar's Max Health] physical damage to all nearby enemies on landing. Enemies Gnar lands directly on top of are slowed briefly.

If Crunch is used to transform, Gnar will still be able to bounce.

Howling Gale.description: By creating a localized change in pressure and temperature, Janna is able to create a small storm that grows in size with time. She can activate the spell again to release the storm. On release this storm will fly towards the direction it was cast in, dealing damage and knocking away any enemies in its path.
Howling Gale.name: Howling Gale
Howling Gale.tooltip:
Summons a whirlwind, which deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in its path and knocks them into the air for {{ e4 }} seconds.

The whirlwind can be charged for up to 3 seconds. For each second it charges, it deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus damage, knocks up for an additional {{ e5 }} seconds, and travels {{ e3 }}% further.

Activate again to release the whirlwind early.

Human Form.description: Transforms into Human Form, removing Spider Form bonuses but granting the ability to generate new Spiderlings by casting spells.
Human Form.name: Human Form
Human Form.tooltip:
Elise takes human form, sacrificing 25 movement speed in exchange for 425 attack range and access to mage abilities. All awoken Spiderlings are put into a dormant state.

Spiderlings: Spiderlings deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage and take {{ e4 }}% reduced damage from multi-target abilities.

Hungering Strike.description: Takes a bite out of an enemy unit and heals Warwick.
Hungering Strike.name: Hungering Strike
Hungering Strike.tooltip: Strikes an enemy for the greater value between {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) and {{ e2 }}% (+{{ a1 }}) of the target's maximum Health as magic damage (can only do flat damage to monsters), and heals Warwick for {{ e3 }}% of the damage dealt.

Hunters Call.description: Warwick lets out a howl, increasing all nearby friendly champions' Attack Speed for a short time.
Hunters Call.name: Hunters Call
Hunters Call.tooltip: Warwick lets out a howl that inspires all nearby allied champions, increasing Warwick's Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}% and all nearby friendly champions' Attack Speed by half of that for 6 seconds.

Hymn of Valor.description: Sona plays the Hymn of Valor, sends out bolts of sound, dealing magic damage to two nearby enemies, prioritizing champions and monsters. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone bonus damage on their next attack against enemies and extends the duration of her aura for each ally she aids.
Hymn of Valor.name: Hymn of Valor
Hymn of Valor.tooltip:
Active: Deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the nearest two enemies (prioritizes Champions). Sona gains an aura that grants allies {{ f1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) additional magic damage on their next attack for {{ e4 }} seconds. Sona's aura lasts {{ e3 }} seconds and is extended by {{ e5 }} seconds for each ally she aids.

Power Chord - Staccato: Deals {{ e6 }}% bonus power chord damage.

Hyper / Wallop.description:
Gnar's attacks and spells hype him up, dealing bonus damage and granting him Movement Speed.

Mega Gnar is too enraged to be hyper and instead can rear up on his hind legs and smash down on the area in front of him, stunning enemies in an area.
Hyper / Wallop.name: Hyper / Wallop
Hyper / Wallop.tooltip:
Mini Gnar: Passive: Every 3rd attack or spell on the same target deals an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) + {{ e2 }}% of the target's max Health as magic damage and grants Gnar {{ f1 }}% Movement Speed that decays over 3 seconds (max {{ e4 }} damage vs. monsters).

Mega Gnar: Stuns enemies in an area for 1.25 seconds, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage.

Gnar gains Hyper's Movement Speed bonus when he leaves Mega form.

Hyper Charge.description: Gains a burst of energy increasing Attack Speed to maximum for several attacks.
Hyper Charge.name: Hyper Charge
Hyper Charge.tooltip: Gains a burst of energy increasing Attack Speed to maximum for {{ e1 }} attacks. These attacks deal {{ e4 }}% ({{ f1 }}) damage.

Hyper-Kinetic Position Reverser.description: Urgot charges up his Hyper-Kinetic Position Reverser, swapping positions with the target. His target is suppressed for the duration of the channel. He gains increased Armor and Magic Resist after the swap.
Hyper-Kinetic Position Reverser.name: Hyper-Kinetic Position Reverser
Hyper-Kinetic Position Reverser.tooltip:
Urgot targets an enemy champion and channels his Hyper-Kinetic Position Reverser for 1 second, swapping locations with his target afterward. His target is suppressed for the duration of the channel.

Urgot gains {{ e2 }} Armor and Magic Resist during and after the channel, and his target is slowed by 40% for 3 seconds after being swapped.

Ice Blast.description: Nunu launches a ball of ice at an enemy unit, dealing damage and temporarily slowing their Movement and Attack Speeds.
Ice Blast.name: Ice Blast
Ice Blast.tooltip: Nunu launches a ball of ice at an enemy unit, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and Attack Speed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Ice Shard.description: Throws a spear of ice that shatters when it hits an enemy, dealing magic damage and slowing Movement Speed. Shards pass through the target, dealing the same damage to other enemies hit.
Ice Shard.name: Ice Shard
Ice Shard.tooltip: Throws a spear of ice that shatters when it hits an enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds. Shards then pass through the target, dealing the same damage to other enemies hit.

Idol of Durand.description: Galio assumes the form of a statue, taunting nearby enemies and storing concussive energy as they attack him. Galio then bursts from his statue shell, releasing the stored energy to damage surrounding foes.
Idol of Durand.name: Idol of Durand
Idol of Durand.tooltip:
Galio channels for 2 seconds, taunting nearby foes and blocking {{ e4 }}% of incoming damage.

After channeling, Galio deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding enemies, plus an additional {{ e2 }}% damage for each attack he suffered while channeling, up to a max of {{ e5 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage ({{ e3 }}% bonus damage).

Imbue.description: Taric brings forth earthen energy to heal an ally and himself. This heal is more potent when Taric heals only himself.
Imbue.name: Imbue
Imbue.tooltip: Taric brings forth earthen energy to heal a target ally and himself for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) ({{ e6 }}% of Taric's bonus health). If he targets himself, the heal increases by {{ e4 }}% restoring {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) health.

Impale.description: Skarner suppresses an enemy champion and deals damage to it. During this time, Skarner can move freely and will drag his helpless victim around with him. When the effect ends, the target will be dealt additional damage.
Impale.name: Impale
Impale.tooltip: Skarner suppresses an enemy champion for {{ e1 }} seconds, dealing {{ a2 }} physical damage plus {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Skarner can move freely during this time, and will drag his helpless victim around with him. When the effect ends, Skarner's target will be dealt the same damage again.

Impure Shots.description: Miss Fortune passively increases damage dealt to a target with each strike. This ability can be activated to increase Miss Fortune's Attack Speed and grant her Strut.
Impure Shots.name: Impure Shots
Impure Shots.tooltip:
Passive: Basic attacks deal {{ f1 }} bonus magic damage, stacking cumulatively up to {{ f3 }} times for a maximum of {{ f2 }} bonus magic damage.

Active: Gains {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed for the next {{ e3 }} seconds and automatically grants Strut.

Incinerate.description: Annie casts a blazing cone of fire, dealing damage to all enemies in the area.
Incinerate.name: Incinerate
Incinerate.tooltip: Casts a cone of fire dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in the area.

Infected Cleaver.description: Dr. Mundo hurls his cleaver, dealing damage equal to a portion of his target's current Health and slowing them for a short time. Dr. Mundo delights in the suffering of others, so he is returned half of the Health cost when he successfully lands a cleaver (increased to the full Health cost on killing blows).
Infected Cleaver.name: Infected Cleaver
Infected Cleaver.tooltip:
Dr. Mundo hurls his cleaver, dealing magic damage equal to {{ e2 }}% of the target's current Health ({{ e1 }} damage minimum) and slowing them by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

Half of the Health cost is refunded if the cleaver hits a target (increased to the full Health cost on killing blows).

Infinite Duress.description: Warwick lunges at an enemy champion, suppressing his target and dealing magic damage for a few seconds.
Infinite Duress.name: Infinite Duress
Infinite Duress.tooltip:
Warwick lunges in front of an enemy champion and suppresses them for {{ e2 }} seconds. During this time, Warwick attacks his victim {{ e4 }} times, dealing a total of {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage (triggers on-hit effects {{ e4 }} times).

Warwick gains {{ e3 }}% Life Steal for the duration.

Inner Flame.description:
Karma sends forth a ball of spirit energy that explodes and deals damage upon hitting an enemy unit.

Mantra Bonus: In addition to the explosion, Mantra increases the destructive power of her Inner Flame, creating a cataclysm which deals damage after a short delay.
Inner Flame.name: Inner Flame
Inner Flame.tooltip:
Fires a blast of energy that explodes upon enemy contact, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the area and slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Mantra Bonus - Soulflare: Deals {{ f1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) additional magic damage and leaves a circle of flame at the impact area or upon reaching maximum range, slowing enemies for {{ f3 }}%. After 1.5 seconds the circle erupts, dealing {{ f2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the area.

Insanity Potion.description: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him increased combat stats.
Insanity Potion.name: Insanity Potion
Insanity Potion.tooltip: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him {{ e1 }} Ability Power, Armor, Magic Resist, Movement Speed, Health Regen, and Mana Regen for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Inspire.description:
Karma summons a protective shield that absorbs incoming damage and increases the Movement Speed of the protected ally.

Mantra Bonus: Energy radiates out from her target, strengthening the initial shield and applying Inspire to nearby allied champions.
Inspire.name: Inspire
Inspire.tooltip:
Target ally gains a shield, granting {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e2 }} seconds and absorbing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Mantra Bonus - Defiance: The shield overflows with energy, absorbing an additional {{ f1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) for Karma's target. Allied champions around her target gain shields that absorb up to {{ f2 }}% as much as the initial target's shield. All champions shielded by Defiance gain {{ f3 }}% movement speed for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Intervention.description: Shields Kayle or an ally for a short time, causing them to be immune to damage.
Intervention.name: Intervention
Intervention.tooltip: Bathes Kayle's target in a holy light, rendering them immune to all damage for {{ e1 }} seconds.

Jack In The Box.description: Shaco creates an invisible, animated Jack-in-the-Box, which will fear, and then attack, nearby enemies.
Jack In The Box.name: Jack In The Box
Jack In The Box.tooltip:
Shaco creates a Jack in the Box at the target location. It will become invisible after 2 seconds, and pop out when an enemy comes near, fearing nearby enemies for {{ e3 }} seconds and attacking them.

Its attacks deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and it lasts for {{ e4 }} seconds while invisible or 5 seconds while firing.

Javelin Toss / Takedown.description: In human form, Nidalee throws a spiked javelin at her target that gains damage as it flies.  As a cougar, her next attack will attempt to fatally wound her target, dealing more damage the less life they have.
Javelin Toss / Takedown.name: Javelin Toss / Takedown
Javelin Toss / Takedown.tooltip:
Human: Nidalee tosses her javelin, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage. If it exceeds her basic attack range, it gains damage based on distance flown, up to a potential {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) total damage.

Cougar: Nidalee's next attack deals additional damage, greatly increased on low health targets.

Judgment.description: Garen performs a dance of death with his sword, dealing damage around him for the duration.
Judgment.name: Judgment
Judgment.tooltip:
Garen rapidly spins his sword around his body for {{ e2 }} seconds, dealing {{ f3 }} physical damage to nearby enemies -- {{ e1 }} plus {{ e3 }}% of his attack damage (+{{ f1 }}), {{ f2 }} times (increased by 1 every 3 champion levels) -- over the duration.

Judgment deals {{ e4 }}% increased damage when striking only one enemy.
Cancelling Judgment returns cooldown equal to the remaining duration.
Judgment can critically strike for bonus damage.

Ki Burst.description: Riven emits a Ki Burst, damaging and stunning nearby enemies.
Ki Burst.name: Ki Burst
Ki Burst.tooltip: Riven's sword emits a burst of runic energy that shocks nearby enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and stunning them for {{ e5 }} seconds.

Lamb's Respite.description: Lamb grants all living things inside a zone a respite from death. Until the effect ends, nothing can die. At the end, units are healed.
Lamb's Respite.name: Lamb's Respite
Lamb's Respite.tooltip:
Lamb blesses the ground under a friendly champion for {{ e2 }} seconds, creating an area in which no living things, ally or enemy, can die. Upon reaching 10% Health, units become immune to further damage or healing.

When the blessing ends all living things inside heal for {{ e1 }}.

Last Breath.description: Moves to a unit and strikes them repeatedly for heavy damage. Can only be cast on Airborne targets.
Last Breath.name: Last Breath
Last Breath.tooltip:
Blinks to an Airborne enemy champion, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and holding all Airborne enemies in the area in the air for an additional 1 second. Grants maximum Flow but resets all stacks of Gathering Storm.

For 15 seconds, Yasuo gains {{ e5 }}% Bonus Armor Penetration - this affects Armor from items, buffs, runes and masteries.

Lay Waste.description: Karthus unleashes a delayed blast at a location, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
Lay Waste.name: Lay Waste
Lay Waste.tooltip: Creates a delayed blast at Karthus' cursor position. After 0.5 seconds, deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to each nearby enemy, this deals double damage if it hits only a single unit.

Leap.description: Kha'Zix leaps to an area, dealing physical damage upon landing. If he chooses to Evolve Wings, Leap's range increases dramatically. Also, on champion kill or assist, Leap's cooldown resets.
Leap.name: Leap
Leap.tooltip:
Leaps to a target area, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

Evolved Wings: Increases Leap's range. On champion kill or assist, Leap's cooldown resets.

Leap Strike.description: Jax leaps toward a unit. If they are an enemy, he strikes them with his weapon.
Leap Strike.name: Leap Strike
Leap Strike.tooltip: Jax leaps to a target unit, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage if it is an enemy.

Let's Bounce!.description: Zac launches into the air, gaining Movement Speed, and slams down three times, each time damaging, slowing and knocking up nearby enemies.
Let's Bounce!.name: Let's Bounce!
Let's Bounce!.tooltip:
Zac bounces 4 times, knocking up and slowing enemies.
Each bounce deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to nearby enemies, knocks them up for 1 second, and slows them by {{ e5 }}% for 1 second. Enemies hit more than once take half damage and are not knocked up. Upon activation, Zac removes all slows affecting him and gains an accelerating Movement Speed buff ({{ e3 }}-{{ e4 }}%) for the duration.

Zac can right-click to move and can activate Unstable Matter while in the air.

Life Form Disintegration Ray.description: Vel'Koz unleashes a channelled beam that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds that deals damage and slows enemies.
Life Form Disintegration Ray.name: Life Form Disintegration Ray
Life Form Disintegration Ray.tooltip:
Vel'Koz channels a ray of energy that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds, dealing Magic Damage up to a total of {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}), and slows enemies hit by {{ e3 }}% for 1 second. Adds a stack of Organic Deconstruction every 0.5 seconds.

Can be cancelled by recasting.

Light Binding.description: Lux releases a sphere of light that binds and deals damage to up to two enemy units.
Light Binding.name: Light Binding
Light Binding.tooltip: Fires a ball of light, rooting up to two enemies for {{ e3 }} seconds and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to each.

Lightning Field / Hyper Charge.description:
Hammer Stance: Passive: Restores Mana per strike. Active: Creates a field of lightning damaging nearby enemies for several seconds.

Cannon Stance: Gains a burst of energy, increasing Attack Speed to maximum for several attacks.
Lightning Field / Hyper Charge.name: Lightning Field / Hyper Charge
Lightning Field / Hyper Charge.tooltip:
Passive: Gains {{ e5 }} Mana per strike while in Hammer Stance.

Active: Creates an electric aura dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e2 }} seconds to nearby enemies.

Lightning Rush.description: Kennen morphs into a lightning form, enabling him to pass through units. Any enemy unit he runs through takes damage and gets a Mark of the Storm.
Lightning Rush.name: Lightning Rush
Lightning Rush.tooltip:
Kennen gains 335 movement speed and ignores unit collision for 2 seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to any enemy he passes through. Additionally, Kennen will gain {{ e2 }} Armor and Magic Resist for 4 seconds.

Kennen gains 40 Energy the first time he passes through an enemy.
Lightning Rush deals half damage to minions.

Living Artillery.description: Kog'Maw fires a living artillery shell at a great distance dealing damage and revealing non-stealthed targets. Additionally, multiple Living Artilleries in a short period of time cause them to cost additional Mana.
Living Artillery.name: Living Artillery
Living Artillery.tooltip:
Fires a living artillery shot from a great distance that lands shortly after launch. Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and reveals non-stealthed enemies for 4 seconds (deals {{ e3 }}% bonus base damage to Champions).

Subsequent artillery shots within {{ e4 }} seconds cost 40 additional Mana up to a maximum of {{ e5 }} Mana.

Living Shadow.description: Zed's shadow dashes forward, remaining in place for 4 seconds, and mimicking his spell casts. Zed can reactivate to swap places with the shadow. Zed's Attack Damage is passively increased.
Living Shadow.name: Living Shadow
Living Shadow.tooltip:
Passive: Grants {{ e2 }}% additional bonus Attack Damage (+{{ f3 }}).

Zed's shadow dashes forward, remaining in place for 4 seconds.
Reactivating Living Shadow will cause Zed to switch positions with this shadow.

Zed's shadows mimic his abilities. If an ability strikes any target twice, Zed restores {{ e3 }} energy. Energy can only be restored once per mimicked ability.

Lucent Singularity.description: Fires an anomaly of twisted light to an area, which slows nearby enemies. Lux can detonate it to damage enemies in the area of effect.
Lucent Singularity.name: Lucent Singularity
Lucent Singularity.tooltip:
Creates a zone that slows enemies by {{ e1 }}%. After {{ e3 }} seconds the zone detonates dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Activate again to detonate early.

Lunar Rush.description: Diana dashes to an enemy and deals magic damage. Lunar Rush has no cooldown when used to teleport to a target afflicted with Moonlight.
Lunar Rush.name: Lunar Rush
Lunar Rush.tooltip:
Becomes the living embodiment of the vengeful moon, dashing to an enemy and dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Lunar Rush has no cooldown when used to dash to an enemy afflicted with Moonlight. All other enemies will have the Moonlight debuff removed regardless of whether they were the target of Lunar Rush.

Lunge.description: Fiora lunges in a direction and slashes a nearby enemy, dealing physical damage and applying on-hit effects.
Lunge.name: Lunge
Lunge.tooltip:
Fiora lunges in a direction and slashes a nearby enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and applying on-hit effects. This attack prioritizes Vitals and targets in kill range.

If this ability hits an enemy, {{ e4 }}% of its cooldown is refunded.

Mace of Spades.description: Mordekaiser's next three attacks deal escalating bonus damage.
Mace of Spades.name: Mace of Spades
Mace of Spades.tooltip: Mordekaiser's next three hits are empowered. The first deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) bonus magic damage. Each extra strike deals {{ e9 }} times the bonus damage of the last, up to {{ f5 }} (+{{ f3 }}) (+{{ f4 }}).

Magical Journey.description: Bard opens a portal in nearby terrain. Allies and enemies alike can take a one-way trip through that terrain by moving into the portal.
Magical Journey.name: Magical Journey
Magical Journey.tooltip:
Bard opens a one-way corridor through nearby terrain. Both allies and enemies can use the corridor by right-clicking on any part of it while near its entrance, with allies travelling {{ e6 }}% faster than enemies.

The corridor disappears after {{ e2 }} seconds.

Majestic Roar.description: Volibear lets out a powerful roar that damages and slows enemies. Minions and monsters are feared as well.
Majestic Roar.name: Majestic Roar
Majestic Roar.tooltip:
Volibear deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and slows them by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Minions and monsters are feared as well.

Make It Rain.description: Miss Fortune unleashes a flurry of bullets at a location, dealing waves of damage to opponents and slowing them.
Make It Rain.name: Make It Rain
Make It Rain.tooltip: Miss Fortune fires hundreds of bullets into the air that rain down at a location after 0.5 seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over 2 seconds and slowing enemies hit by {{ e2 }}%.

Malefic Visions.description: Malzahar infects his target's mind with cruel visions of their demise, dealing damage each second. If the target dies while afflicted by the visions, they pass on to a nearby enemy unit and Malzahar gains Mana. Malzahar's Voidlings are attracted to affected units.
Malefic Visions.name: Malefic Visions
Malefic Visions.tooltip:
Malzahar infects his target's mind, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage over 4 seconds.

If the target dies during this time, the visions pass to a nearby enemy and Malzahar gains {{ e2 }} Mana.

Malzahar's Voidlings are attracted to affected units.

Mantra.description: Karma empowers her next ability to do an additional effect. Mantra is available at level 1 and does not require a skill point.
Mantra.name: Mantra
Mantra.tooltip:
Karma empowers her next ability within 8 seconds for an additional effect.

Soulflare: Deals bonus magic damage and leaves behind a circle of flame, heavily slowing enemies and dealing damage after a brief delay.

Renewal: Karma heals for a portion of her missing health. If the target does not break the link, the root duration is extended and Karma is again healed for a portion of her missing health.

Defiance: Karma's target receives an enhanced shield and allied champions around Karma's target become shielded and gain movement speed.

Mark of the Assassin.description: Akali spins her kama at a target enemy to deal Magic Damage and mark the target for 6 seconds. Akali's melee attacks against a marked target will trigger and consume the mark to cause additional damage and restore Energy.
Mark of the Assassin.name: Mark of the Assassin
Mark of the Assassin.tooltip:
Akali throws her kama at a target enemy to deal {{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and mark the target for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Akali's melee attacks against a marked target will consume the mark to cause {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage and restore {{ e2 }} Energy.

Masochism.description: Masochism deals bonus magic damage on Dr. Mundo's next basic attack and increases Attack Damage by a flat amount for 5 seconds. In addition, Dr. Mundo also gains an additional amount of Attack Damage for each percentage of Health he is missing.
Masochism.name: Masochism
Masochism.tooltip: Dr. Mundo deals an additional @f1*0.05@ damage on his next basic attack and increases Attack Damage by {{ e1 }} for {{ e4 }} seconds. Dr. Mundo gains an additional +{{ e3 }} Attack Damage for each percentage of Health he is missing.

Massacre.description: Aatrox draws in the blood of his foes, damaging all nearby enemy champions around him and gaining increased Attack Speed and bonus Attack Range for a short duration.
Massacre.name: Massacre
Massacre.tooltip: Aatrox draws in the blood of his foes, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemy champions around him. Massacre then fills Aatrox's Blood Well by {{ e7 }}% for each champion hit and grants him {{ e3 }}% attack speed and 175 attack range for 12 seconds.

Meditate.description: Master Yi rejuvenates his body by focus of mind, restoring Health and taking reduced damage for a short time.
Meditate.name: Meditate
Meditate.tooltip:
Master Yi channels, restoring {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health per second for 4 seconds. This healing is increased by 1% for every 1% of Master Yi's missing Health.

While channeling, Master Yi reduces incoming damage by {{ e3 }}%. This damage reduction is halved against turrets.

Mega Adhesive.description: Throws a vial of mega adhesive on the ground, slowing enemies who walk on it.
Mega Adhesive.name: Mega Adhesive
Mega Adhesive.tooltip:
Singed leaves a sticky area on the ground for {{ e2 }} seconds, slowing enemies in the area by {{ e1 }}% (lasts {{ e3 }} second after leaving).

If Singed flings a target into the zone, it will root them.

Mega Inferno Bomb.description: Ziggs deploys his ultimate creation, the Mega Inferno Bomb, hurling it an enormous distance. Enemies in the primary blast zone take more damage than those farther away.
Mega Inferno Bomb.name: Mega Inferno Bomb
Mega Inferno Bomb.tooltip: Ziggs deploys his ultimate creation, the Mega Inferno Bomb, hurling it an enormous distance. Enemies in the primary blast zone take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Enemies farther away take {{ e2 }}% damage. Minions take double damage.

Mercury Cannon / Mercury Hammer.description:
Hammer Stance: Transforms the Mercury Hammer into the Mercury Cannon gaining new abilities and increased range. The first attack in this form reduces the target's Armor and Magic Resist.

Cannon Stance: Transforms the Mercury Cannon into the Mercury Hammer gaining new abilities and increasing Armor and Magic Resist. The first attack in this form deals additional magic damage.
Mercury Cannon / Mercury Hammer.name: Mercury Cannon / Mercury Hammer
Mercury Cannon / Mercury Hammer.tooltip:
Active: Transforms the Mercury Hammer into the Mercury Cannon gaining new abilities and ranged attacks.

The next attack in Cannon Stance reduces the enemy's Armor and Magic Resist by {{ f3 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Mercury Hammer.description: Transforms the Mercury Cannon into the Mercury Hammer gaining new abilities and increasing Armor and Magic Resist. The first attack in this form deals additional magic damage.
Mercury Hammer.name: Mercury Hammer
Mercury Hammer.tooltip:
Transforms the Mercury Cannon into the Mercury Hammer gaining new abilities and {{ f1 }} Armor and Magic Resist.

The next attack in Hammer Stance deals an additional {{ f2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Miasma.description: Cassiopeia releases a cloud of poison, lightly damaging and slowing any enemy that happens to pass through it.
Miasma.name: Miasma
Miasma.tooltip:
Cassiopeia releases a toxic cloud that grows in size over {{ e4 }} seconds. Enemies in the cloud are Poisoned for {{ e3 }} seconds, causing them to take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each second and be slowed by {{ e2 }}%.

The cloud continually reapplies this Poison to enemies within it.

Mimic.description: LeBlanc can cast a mimicked version of the previous spell she cast.
Mimic.name: Mimic
Mimic.tooltip:
LeBlanc can cast a mimicked version of the previous spell she cast.

Mimicked Sigil of Malice and Ethereal Chains deal {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage on both instances of their damage.

Mimicked Distortion deals {{ e5 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage.

Missile Barrage.description: Corki fires a missile toward his target location that explodes on impact, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Corki stores missiles over time, up to a maximum. Every 3rd missile fired will be a Big One, dealing extra damage.
Missile Barrage.name: Missile Barrage
Missile Barrage.tooltip:
Corki fires a missile toward his targeted location that will collide with the first enemy it hits. Each missile deals {{ e1 }} {{ f3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) area magic damage.

Corki reloads a missile every {{ f1 }} seconds, up to 7 missiles at any given time.

Every 3rd missile will be a Big One, dealing {{ e3 }}% extra damage.

Mocking Shout.description: Tryndamere lets out an insulting cry, decreasing surrounding champions' Attack Damage. Enemies with their backs turned to Tryndamere also have their Movement Speed reduced.
Mocking Shout.name: Mocking Shout
Mocking Shout.tooltip: Decreases surrounding champions' Attack Damage by {{ e1 }} for {{ e4 }} seconds, and enemies with their backs turned also have their Movement Speed reduced by {{ e2 }}%.

Molten Shield.description: Increases Annie's Armor and Magic Resist and damages enemies who hit Annie with basic attacks.
Molten Shield.name: Molten Shield
Molten Shield.tooltip: Increases Armor and Magic Resist by {{ e1 }} for {{ e3 }} seconds. Deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies who attack Annie with basic attacks.

Monsoon.description: Janna surrounds herself in a magical storm, throwing enemies back. After the storm has settled, soothing winds heal nearby allies while the ability is active.
Monsoon.name: Monsoon
Monsoon.tooltip: Summons forth the might of the wind to knock surrounding enemies back and restores {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health to nearby allies each second for 3 seconds.

Moonfall.description: Diana draws in and slows all nearby enemies.
Moonfall.name: Moonfall
Moonfall.tooltip: Reveals and draws in all nearby enemies and then slows them by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Mounting Dread.description: Lamb fires a carefully placed shot, slowing the target. If Lamb attacks the target two more times, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, savaging them for massive damage.
Mounting Dread.name: Mounting Dread
Mounting Dread.tooltip:
Cripple an enemy, slowing their movement speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e8 }} second.

After Lamb attacks the target twice, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, dealing massive physical damage.

Wolf deals physical damage equal to {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) +{{ e4 }}% of the target's maximum health. [Maximum {{ e10 }} vs. monsters]

Move Quick.description: Teemo scampers around, passively increasing his Movement Speed until he is struck by an enemy champion or turret. Teemo can sprint to gain bonus Movement Speed that isn't stopped by being struck for a short time.
Move Quick.name: Move Quick
Move Quick.tooltip:
Passive: Teemo's Movement Speed is increased by {{ e1 }}% unless he has been damaged by an enemy champion or turret in the last 5 seconds.

Active: Teemo sprints, gaining twice his normal bonus for 3 seconds. This bonus is not lost when struck.

Mystic Shot.description: Ezreal fires a damaging bolt of energy which reduces all of his cooldowns by 1 second if it strikes an enemy unit.
Mystic Shot.name: Mystic Shot
Mystic Shot.tooltip:
Ezreal fires a bolt of energy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f3 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage (applies on-hit effects).

Ezreal's cooldowns are reduced by {{ e2 }} second if Mystic Shot hits a target.

Nether Blade.description: Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. Active: Kassadin's next basic attack deals significant bonus magic damage and restores Mana.
Nether Blade.name: Nether Blade
Nether Blade.tooltip:
Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks draw energy from the void, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage.

Active: Kassadin charges his Nether Blade, causing his next basic attack to deal {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus magic damage and restore {{ e1 }}% of his missing Mana (increases to {{ e4 }}% against champions).

Nether Grasp.description: Malzahar channels the essence of the Void to suppress an enemy champion and deal damage each second.
Nether Grasp.name: Nether Grasp
Nether Grasp.tooltip: Malzahar channels the essence of the Void to suppress target champion, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage over 2.5 seconds.

Neurotoxin / Venomous Bite.description:
Human Form: Deals damage based upon how high the target's Health is.

Spider Form: Lunges at an enemy and deals damage based upon how low their Health is.
Neurotoxin / Venomous Bite.name: Neurotoxin / Venomous Bite
Neurotoxin / Venomous Bite.tooltip: Deals magic damage equal to {{ e1 }} plus {{ e6 }}% (+{{ a1 }}%) of the target's current health. Maximum bonus against monsters: {{ e2 }}.

Nevermove.description: Swain marks a target area. After a short delay, mighty talons grab hold of enemy units, dealing damage and rooting them.
Nevermove.name: Nevermove
Nevermove.tooltip: Swain marks a target area. After a short delay, talons grab hold of enemy units, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and rooting them for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Nimbus Strike.description: Wukong dashes toward a target enemy and sends out images to attack up to 2 additional enemies near his target, dealing physical damage to each enemy struck.
Nimbus Strike.name: Nimbus Strike
Nimbus Strike.tooltip: Wukong dashes toward a target enemy and sends out images to attack up to 2 additional enemies near his target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to each enemy struck. Upon hitting his target, Wukong gains {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Noxian Corrosive Charge.description: Urgot launches a corrosive charge that damages enemies in an area and reduces their Armor.
Noxian Corrosive Charge.name: Noxian Corrosive Charge
Noxian Corrosive Charge.tooltip:
Urgot launches a Corrosive Charge at a target location. Enemies afflicted by the charge have their Armor reduced by {{ e2 }}% and take {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage over {{ e3 }} seconds.

Acid Hunter is able to missile-lock onto targets affected by Noxian Corrosive Charge.

Noxian Diplomacy.description: Talon's next basic attack deals bonus physical damage. If the target is a champion, they will bleed, taking additional physical damage over a period of time and revealing their location for the duration.
Noxian Diplomacy.name: Noxian Diplomacy
Noxian Diplomacy.tooltip: Talon's next basic attack deals an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. If the target is a champion, the target will bleed for {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage over {{ e5 }} seconds, revealing their location for the duration.

Noxian Guillotine.description: Darius leaps to an enemy champion and strikes a lethal blow, dealing true damage. This damage is increased for each stack of Hemorrhage on the target. If Noxian Guillotine is a killing blow, its cooldown is refreshed for a brief duration.
Noxian Guillotine.name: Noxian Guillotine
Noxian Guillotine.tooltip:
Leaps to target enemy champion and strikes a lethal blow, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) true damage. For each stack of Hemorrhage on the target, Noxian Guillotine deals an additional {{ e3 }}% damage.

Maximum Damage: {{ f3 }}

If Noxian Guillotine kills the target, it may be re-cast at no cost within 20 seconds.

At rank 3, Noxian Guillotine unlocks - its cooldown resets entirely on kills and it no longer has a Mana cost.

Noxious Blast.description: Cassiopeia blasts an area with Poison after a brief delay, granting her increased Movement Speed if she hits an enemy champion.
Noxious Blast.name: Noxious Blast
Noxious Blast.tooltip:
Cassiopeia blasts an area after a brief delay. Enemies in the area are Poisoned, taking {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds.

If Noxious Blast hits an enemy champion, Cassiopeia gains {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Noxious Trap.description: Teemo throws an explosive poisonous trap using one of the mushrooms stored in his pack. If an enemy steps on the trap, it will release a poisonous cloud, slowing enemies and damaging them over time.
Noxious Trap.name: Noxious Trap
Noxious Trap.tooltip:
Tosses a stored mushroom as a trap that detonates if an enemy steps on it, spreading poison to nearby enemies that slows Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}%, reveals them and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over 4 seconds.

Traps last {{ e5 }} minutes and take 1.5 seconds to arm and stealth. If a thrown trap lands on another trap, it will bounce up to {{ e6 }} Teemos further before planting.

Teemo forages for a mushroom every {{ f1 }} seconds, but he is only big enough to carry 3 at once.

Null Sphere.description: Kassadin fires an orb of void energy at a target, dealing damage and interrupting channels. The excess energy forms around himself, granting a temporary shield that absorbs magic damage.
Null Sphere.name: Null Sphere
Null Sphere.tooltip:
Kassadin fires an orb of void energy at a target enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and interrupting channels.

The excess energy forms around himself, granting a shield that absorbs {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Null Zone.description: Malzahar creates a zone of negative energy which damages enemies that stand in it.
Null Zone.name: Null Zone
Null Zone.tooltip: Malzahar creates a zone of negative energy for {{ e3 }} seconds. The zone damages nearby enemies for {{ e1 }}% (+{{ a1 }}%) of their max Health each second (damage to monsters is capped at {{ e4 }} damage per second).

Omen of Death.description: Yorick conjures a revenant in the image of one of his allies. If his ally dies while its revenant is alive, the revenant sacrifices itself to reanimate them and give them time to enact vengeance.
Omen of Death.name: Omen of Death
Omen of Death.tooltip:
Yorick conjures a revenant in the image of a target allied champion. Revenants deal {{ e1 }}% of target ally's Attack Damage and last for {{ e4 }} seconds. If his ally dies while its revenant is alive, the revenant sacrifices itself to reanimate them for up to {{ e4 }} seconds.

The revenant can be controlled by holding the alt key and using the right mouse button or by reactivating this ability.

Omen of Famine.description: Yorick steals life from his target and summons a Ravenous Ghoul that heals Yorick for the damage it deals.
Omen of Famine.name: Omen of Famine
Omen of Famine.tooltip: Yorick deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage and heals for up to {{ e5 }}% of the damage dealt. A Ravenous Ghoul is summoned behind his target for up to 5 seconds, healing Yorick for the damage it deals (healing from ghoul damage halved against minions and monsters).

Omen of Pestilence.description: Yorick summons a Decaying Ghoul that arrives with a violent explosion, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies. While the Decaying Ghoul remains alive, nearby enemies continue to be slowed.
Omen of Pestilence.name: Omen of Pestilence
Omen of Pestilence.tooltip: Yorick summons a Decaying Ghoul that arrives with a violent explosion, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing nearby enemies by {{ e1 }}% for 1.5 seconds. While the Decaying Ghoul remains alive, nearby enemies continue to be slowed by {{ e3 }}% for up to 5 seconds.

Omen of War.description: Yorick's next attack will deal bonus physical damage and summon a Spectral Ghoul that deals additional damage and moves faster than Yorick's other ghouls. While the Spectral Ghoul is alive, Yorick moves faster as well.
Omen of War.name: Omen of War
Omen of War.tooltip:
Yorick's next attack will deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and summon a Spectral Ghoul for up to 5 seconds.

The Spectral Ghoul deals {{ e2 }} additional damage per hit and moves {{ e3 }}% faster. While the ghoul is active, Yorick moves {{ e3 }}% faster as well.

On The Hunt.description: Sivir leads her allies in battle, granting them a surge Movement Speed for a period of time. Additionally passively grants Sivir bonus Attack Speed while Ricochet is active.
On The Hunt.name: On The Hunt
On The Hunt.tooltip:
Passive: Sivir gains {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed while Ricochet is active.

Active: Sivir rallies her allies for {{ e3 }} seconds, granting all nearby allies an initial {{ e4 }}% Movement Speed bonus that reduces to {{ e2 }}% after the first {{ e5 }} seconds of On The Hunt elapse.

Onslaught of Shadows.description: Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing magic damage in a line. Hecarim creates a shockwave when he finishes his charge, causing nearby enemies to flee in terror.
Onslaught of Shadows.name: Onslaught of Shadows
Onslaught of Shadows.tooltip:
Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to anyone they strike.

Hecarim releases a shockwave when he finishes his charge, causing nearby enemies to flee from Hecarim for {{ e2 }} second.

Hecarim himself will only move to the targeted location. The riders will always move the full distance.

Orb of Deception.description: Ahri sends out and pulls back her orb, dealing magic damage on the way out and true damage on the way back. Ahri gains movement speed that decays while her orb is traveling.
Orb of Deception.name: Orb of Deception
Orb of Deception.tooltip:
Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage on the way out, and {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) true damage on the way back.

Ahri gains movement speed that decays while her orb is traveling.

Overdrive.description: Blitzcrank super charges himself to get dramatically increased Movement and Attack Speed.
Overdrive.name: Overdrive
Overdrive.tooltip: Blitzcrank supercharges himself to increase Movement Speed by {{ e1 }}% and Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. The Movement Speed bonus decays over the duration. When Overdrive ends, Blitzcrank's Movement Speed is slowed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

Overload.description: Ryze throws a charge of pure energy in a line, dealing damage to the first enemy struck. Additionally, Arcane Mastery's supercharged duration is passively increased.
Overload.name: Overload
Overload.tooltip:
Passive: Arcane Mastery's supercharged duration is increased to {{ e3 }} seconds.

Active: Fires an orb, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage to the first target hit.

Pale Cascade.description: Diana creates three orbiting spheres that detonate on contact with enemies to deal damage in an area. She also gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. If her third sphere detonates, the shield gains additional strength.
Pale Cascade.name: Pale Cascade
Pale Cascade.tooltip:
Creates three orbiting spheres that explode on contact with enemies dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Lasts {{ e1 }} seconds.

Grants a temporary shield that absorbs {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage. If the third sphere detonates, the shield increases by {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}).

Paragon of Demacia.description: Passive: Upon receiving damage from or dealing damage with a basic attack, Poppy's Armor and damage are increased for 5 seconds. This effect can stack 10 times. Active: Poppy gains max stacks of Paragon of Demacia and her Movement Speed is increased for 5 seconds.
Paragon of Demacia.name: Paragon of Demacia
Paragon of Demacia.tooltip:
Passive: Upon receiving damage from or dealing damage with a basic attack, Poppy's Armor and damage are increased by {{ e1 }} for 5 seconds. This effect can stack 10 times.

Active: Poppy gains max stacks of Paragon of Demacia and her Movement Speed is increased by {{ e2 }}% for 5 seconds.
