Parallel Convergence.description: Ekko splits the timeline, creating an anomaly after a few seconds that slows enemies caught inside. If Ekko enters the anomaly, he gains shielding and triggers a detonation, stunning enemies by suspending them in time.
Parallel Convergence.name: Parallel Convergence
Parallel Convergence.tooltip:
Passive: Ekko's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage to enemies under 30% health equal to {{ e3 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) of their missing health (max {{ e5 }} damage vs. minions and monsters).

Active: After a 3 second delay, Ekko creates a short-lived chronosphere at the target location that slows enemies who enter by 40%. If Ekko enters the sphere, he will detonate it, gaining a shield that absorbs up to {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for 2 seconds. Enemies caught inside are stunned for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Paranoia.description: Nocturne reduces the sight radius of all enemy champions and removes their ally vision in the process. He can then launch himself at a nearby enemy champion.
Paranoia.name: Paranoia
Paranoia.tooltip:
Nocturne reduces the sight radius of all enemy champions and removes their ally vision for 4 seconds.

While Paranoia is active, Nocturne can launch himself at an enemy champion, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage.

Parrrley.description: Shoots target, plundering Gold for each enemy unit killed.
Parrrley.name: Parrrley
Parrrley.tooltip:
Fires a bullet that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage (can crit and applies on-hit effects).

If Parrrley kills the target, Gangplank plunders {{ e2 }} bonus Gold.

For each Gold plundered, Gangplank gains a Silver Serpent (trade Silver Serpents at the shop to upgrade Cannon Barrage).

Permafrost.description: Abilities and basic attacks apply Frost to enemies. Activating Permafrost damages and slows all nearby enemies with Frost.
Permafrost.name: Permafrost
Permafrost.tooltip:
Passive: Abilities and basic attacks apply Frost to enemies for 4 seconds.

Active: All nearby enemies with Frost take {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Petrifying Gaze.description: Cassiopeia releases a swirl of magical energy from her eyes, stunning any enemies in front of her that are facing her and slowing any others with their back turned.
Petrifying Gaze.name: Petrifying Gaze
Petrifying Gaze.tooltip: Cassiopeia deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in front of her. Enemies facing her are stunned for {{ e3 }} seconds while enemies facing away are slowed by {{ e2 }}%.

Phase Dive.description: Ekko rolls evasively while charging up his Z-Drive. His next attack deals bonus damage and warps reality, teleporting him to his target.
Phase Dive.name: Phase Dive
Phase Dive.tooltip: Ekko dashes a short distance in the targeted direction. His next attack will deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage and teleport him to his target.

Phoenix Stance.description: Phoenix Stance: Activation - Udyr unleashes pulsing waves of fire, dealing damage to nearby enemies for 5 seconds. Persistent Effect - With the first basic attack and every third attack after, Udyr engulfs enemies in front of him with flames.
Phoenix Stance.name: Phoenix Stance
Phoenix Stance.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Burns enemies in front of Udyr on his first basic attack and every third attack after, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Activation: Unleashes pulsing waves of fire, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage each second to nearby enemies for 5 seconds.

Phosphorus Bomb.description: Corki fires a flash bomb at a target location, dealing magic damage to enemies in the area. This attack additionally reveals units in the area for a duration.
Phosphorus Bomb.name: Phosphorus Bomb
Phosphorus Bomb.tooltip: Corki lobs a bomb, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the target area. In addition, the blast reveals the area and champions hit by the blast for 6 seconds (does not reveal stealth).

Pick A Card.description: Twisted Fate chooses a magic card from his deck, and uses that for his next attack, causing bonus effects.
Pick A Card.name: Pick A Card
Pick A Card.tooltip:
Cast once to shuffle the deck and again to choose your card, enhancing your next attack.

Blue Card deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and restores {{ e6 }} Mana.

Red Card deals {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to units around the target and slows their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for 2.5 seconds.

Gold Card deals {{ e5 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and stuns for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Pierce.description: Throw a fast moving spear that passes through enemies it kills.
Pierce.name: Pierce
Pierce.tooltip:
Hurl a fast but narrow projectile that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. Triggers Martial Poise (P), Sentinel (W), and Rend (E).

If it kills a target, Pierce continues onward, passing all stacks of Rend to the next target.

Piercing Arrow.description: Varus readies and then fires a powerful shot that gains extra range and damage the longer he spends preparing to fire.
Piercing Arrow.name: Piercing Arrow
Piercing Arrow.tooltip:
First Cast: Varus starts drawing back his next shot, gradually increasing its range and damage.

Second Cast: Varus fires, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) to {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage, reduced by {{ e3 }}% per enemy hit (minimum 33%).

While preparing to shoot Varus' Movement Speed is slowed by 20%. After 4 seconds, Piercing Arrow fails but refunds half its Mana cost.

Piercing Light.description: Lucian shoots a bolt of piercing light through a target.
Piercing Light.name: Piercing Light
Piercing Light.tooltip: Shoots a bolt of piercing light through an enemy unit, damaging enemies in a line for {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) ({{ e2 }}% of bonus Attack Damage) physical damage.

Pillar of Flame.description: After a short delay, Brand creates a pillar of flame at a target area, dealing magic damage to enemy units within the area. Units that are ablaze take an additional 25% damage.
Pillar of Flame.name: Pillar of Flame
Pillar of Flame.tooltip:
After a short delay, Brand creates a pillar of flame at a target area, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemy units within the area.

Blaze: Units that are ablaze take an additional 25% damage from Pillar of Flame.

Pillar of Ice.description: Trundle creates an ice pillar at target location, becoming impassable terrain and slowing all nearby enemy units.
Pillar of Ice.name: Pillar of Ice
Pillar of Ice.tooltip: Trundle creates an icy pillar at target location for {{ e1 }} seconds, becoming impassable terrain and slowing all nearby enemy units by {{ e2 }}%.

Piltover Peacemaker.description: Caitlyn revs up her rifle for 1 second to unleash a penetrating shot that deals physical damage (deals less damage to subsequent targets).
Piltover Peacemaker.name: Piltover Peacemaker
Piltover Peacemaker.tooltip: Revs the rifle for {{ e4 }} second to fire a piercing shot dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. Deals {{ e2 }}% less damage to each subsequent target down to a minimum of {{ e3 }}%.

Plasma Fission.description: Vel'Koz shoots a bolt of plasma that splits in two on reactivation or upon hitting an enemy. The bolt slows and damages on hit.
Plasma Fission.name: Plasma Fission
Plasma Fission.tooltip:
Vel'Koz shoots a plasma bolt that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and applies a slow of {{ e5 }}% that decays over {{ e4 }} second(s).

Upon reactivation or upon hitting an enemy, the bolt splits at a 90 degree angle.

Playful / Trickster.description: Fizz hops into the air, landing gracefully upon his spear and becoming untargetable. From this position, Fizz can either slam the ground or choose to jump again before smashing back down.
Playful / Trickster.name: Playful / Trickster
Playful / Trickster.tooltip:
Fizz hops toward your cursor onto his spear, becoming untargetable, and then slams the ground dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and slowing them by {{ e2 }}% for 2 seconds.

Reactivating this ability while Fizz is on top of his spear causes Fizz to jump again towards your cursor and deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a smaller area to enemies nearby, instead of slamming the ground.

Poison Trail.description: Leaves a trail of poison behind Singed, dealing damage to enemies caught in the path.
Poison Trail.name: Poison Trail
Poison Trail.tooltip: Toggle: Singed lays a poisonous trail that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second.

Pounce.description: Nidalee jumps in a direction, dealing damage in an area where she lands.
Pounce.name: Pounce
Pounce.tooltip:
Cougar: Nidalee lunges forward a short distance dealing {{ f1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the area. Killing a unit in Cougar form reduces Pounce's cooldown to {{ f2 }} second(s).

Hunted targets can be Pounced to at up to double the normal range, and the first Pounce to a Hunted target causes it to only incur a {{ f2 }} second cooldown.

Human: Nidalee lays a trap that damages and reveals an enemy.

Powder Keg.description: Gangplank uncovers a powder keg at target location. If he attacks it, it explodes, spreading the attack's damage to enemies in the area, slowing them.
Powder Keg.name: Powder Keg
Powder Keg.tooltip:
Place a powder keg that can be attacked by Gangplank or his enemies at target location for {{ e5 }} seconds.

If Gangplank destroys a keg, it explodes dealing the attack's damage as physical damage (ignores {{ e10 }}% Armor) to enemies and slowing them by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds. Champions take {{ e3 }} bonus physical damage from the explosion.

When a keg explodes, other kegs with overlapping blast zones chain explode (damage does not stack).

Kegs health decays every {{ f5 }} seconds. (Decay rate increases at level 7 and 13)

Keg explosions apply Parrrley's plunder effect.

Power Fist.description: Blitzcrank charges up his fist to make his next attack deal double damage and pop his target up in the air.
Power Fist.name: Power Fist
Power Fist.tooltip: Blitzcrank charges up his fist to make his next attack deal double his total attack damage as physical damage and pop his target up in the air.

Powerball.description: Rammus accelerates in a ball towards his enemies, dealing damage and slowing targets affected by the impact.
Powerball.name: Powerball
Powerball.tooltip:
Rammus accelerates in a ball over {{ e4 }} seconds towards his enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies on impact, knocking them back, and slowing them by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Activating Defensive Ball Curl will remove this effect after 1 second.

Primal Surge / Swipe.description: In human form, Nidalee channels the spirit of the cougar to heal her allies and imbue them with Attack Speed for a short duration. As a cougar, she claws in a direction, dealing damage to enemies in front of her.
Primal Surge / Swipe.name: Primal Surge / Swipe
Primal Surge / Swipe.tooltip:
Human: Nidalee heals a target ally champion for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) and grants them {{ e4 }}% Attack Speed for 7 seconds.

Cougar: Nidalee claws at enemies in a target direction.

Primordial Burst.description: Blasts target enemy champion, dealing a large base amount of magic damage plus 80% of his target's ability power.
Primordial Burst.name: Primordial Burst
Primordial Burst.tooltip: Blasts an enemy champion, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus 80% of his target's ability power in magic damage.

Prismatic Barrier.description: Lux throws her wand and bends the light around any friendly target it touches, protecting them from enemy damage.
Prismatic Barrier.name: Prismatic Barrier
Prismatic Barrier.tooltip: Throws Lux's wand to a target location and back, protecting herself and all allied Champions it touches from {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for 3 seconds.

Pulverize.description: Alistar smashes the ground, dealing damage to all nearby enemies and tossing them into the air for 1.5 seconds. On landing, enemies are stunned.
Pulverize.name: Pulverize
Pulverize.tooltip: Alistar smashes the ground, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and tossing all nearby enemy units into the air, stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

Puncturing Taunt.description: Rammus taunts an enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault against Rammus' hard shell, reducing Armor temporarily.
Puncturing Taunt.name: Puncturing Taunt
Puncturing Taunt.tooltip: Rammus taunts the enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault, reducing their Armor by {{ e2 }} and forcing them to attack Rammus for {{ e1 }} second(s).

Pyroclasm.description: Brand unleashes a devastating torrent of fire, dealing magic damage each time it bounces. If a target is ablaze, Pyroclasm will priotize champions for the next bounce.
Pyroclasm.name: Pyroclasm
Pyroclasm.tooltip:
Brand unleashes a devastating torrent of fire, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each time it bounces up to 5 bounces.

Blaze: If a target is ablaze, Pyroclasm will prioritize champions for the next bounce.

Queen's Wrath / Prey Seeker.description:
Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks deal bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that deals Magic Damage and reveals enemies hit.
Queen's Wrath / Prey Seeker.name: Queen's Wrath / Prey Seeker
Queen's Wrath / Prey Seeker.tooltip:
Un-Burrowed: Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks within 5 seconds deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

Burrowed: Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that explodes on first unit hit, dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage and revealing non-stealthed enemies hit for {{ e6 }} seconds.

Quickdraw.description: Graves dashes forward gaining an Attack Speed boost for several seconds. Hitting enemies with basic attacks lowers the cooldown of this skill.
Quickdraw.name: Quickdraw
Quickdraw.tooltip: Dashes forward, gaining {{ e1 }}% increased Attack Speed for {{ e2 }} seconds. Basic attacks lower the cooldown of Quickdraw by {{ e4 }} second.

Radiance.description: Taric slams his hammer into the ground to deal damage to nearby enemies. For a time after, Taric's gems radiate energy, empowering Taric and his allies with bonus Attack Damage and Ability Power.
Radiance.name: Radiance
Radiance.tooltip:
Taric slams his hammer into the ground, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies.

For the next {{ e2 }} seconds, Taric's gems radiate energy, granting him {{ e3 }} Attack Damage and Ability Power and his nearby allies half of the bonuses.

Ragnarok.description: Olaf temporarily becomes immune to disables.
Ragnarok.name: Ragnarok
Ragnarok.tooltip:
Passive: Olaf gains {{ e1 }} Armor and {{ e1 }} Magic Resist.

Active: Olaf removes all disables from himself and becomes immune to them for the next {{ e2 }} seconds. Olaf also receives a {{ e5 }}% Movement Speed bonus towards enemy champions for {{ e4 }} second. During this time, Olaf loses the passive portion of Ragnarok and gains {{ e3 }} Attack Damage.

Rake.description: Talon sends out a volley of daggers that then return back to him, dealing physical damage every time it passes through an enemy. Additionally the enemy is slowed for a short duration.
Rake.name: Rake
Rake.tooltip: Talon sends out a volley of daggers that then return back to him, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage every time it passes through an enemy. Additionally the enemy is slowed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Rampage.description: Hecarim cleaves nearby enemies dealing physical damage.
Rampage.name: Rampage
Rampage.tooltip:
Hecarim cleaves nearby enemies for {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. ({{ e5 }}% damage to minions)

If Hecarim damages at least one enemy with this attack he gains a stack of Rampage, reducing the base cooldown of this skill by {{ e3 }} second for a short duration. This effect can stack up to {{ e2 }} times.

Rampant Growth.description: Zyra plants a seed, granting vision of an area for up to 30 seconds. Other spells cast on seeds will turn them into plants, who fight for Zyra. Additionally passively grants her Cooldown Reduction.
Rampant Growth.name: Rampant Growth
Rampant Growth.tooltip:
Passive: Grants {{ e2 }}% Cooldown Reduction.

Active: Plants a seed, lasting 30 seconds. If an enemy Champion steps on a seed, it will be destroyed but they will be revealed for 2 seconds.

Zyra stores a seed every {{ f1 }} seconds (Max: 2 seeds stored, 4 seeds planted).

Rampant Growth: Cast spells on seeds to grow plants. Plant damage is based on Zyra's level. Extra plants striking the same target deal 50% less damage.

Ranger's Focus.description: Ashe builds up Focus by attacking. When activated, Ranger's Focus consumes all stacks of Focus to grant Attack Speed and add extra slow to Frost Shot slow for a duration. If enough Focus was consumed, her basic attack is transformed into a powerful flurry attack for the duration.
Ranger's Focus.name: Ranger's Focus
Ranger's Focus.tooltip:
Passive: Hitting a spell or attack grants Focus for {{ e3 }} seconds, stacking up to {{ e2 }} times.

Active: Consumes all Focus to grant {{ e4 }}% Attack Speed and an additional {{ e1 }}% slow to Frost Shot for {{ e3 }} seconds. If {{ e2 }} stacks are consumed, Ashe's basic attacks fire a flurry of arrows resulting in {{ f1 }} physical damage per attack for the duration.

Rapid Fire.description: Tristana fires her weapon rapidly, increasing her Attack Speed for a short time. Shooting enemies marked with Explosive Charge reduces the cooldown by a small amount each hit.
Rapid Fire.name: Rapid Fire
Rapid Fire.tooltip:
Passive: Rapid Fire's cooldown is reduced by {{ e3 }} seconds each time Tristana basic attacks an enemy marked with Explosive Charge.

Explosive Charge's cooldown is reduced by {{ e4 }} seconds each time Tristana basic attacks an enemy when her Rapid Fire is active (doubled effect against champions).

Active: Increases Tristana's Attack Speed by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Rappel / Cocoon.description: Ascends into the air, briefly becoming untargetable, and then descends upon an enemy.
Rappel / Cocoon.name: Rappel / Cocoon
Rappel / Cocoon.tooltip:
On Enemy Cast: Elise and her Spiderlings lift up into the air and then descend upon the target enemy. After descending, the bonus damage and healing from Spider Queen is increased by {{ e6 }}% for 5 seconds.

On Ground Cast: Elise and her Spiderlings lift up into the air, becoming untargetable for 2 seconds. She can then cast Rappel again to descend upon a nearby enemy.

Rat-Ta-Tat-Tat.description: Twitch unleashes the full power of his crossbow, shooting bolts over a great distance that pierce all enemies caught in their path.
Rat-Ta-Tat-Tat.name: Rat-Ta-Tat-Tat
Rat-Ta-Tat-Tat.tooltip: For {{ e2 }} seconds Twitch gains {{ e5 }} Attack Range, {{ e1 }} Attack Damage and his basic attacks become piercing bolts that deal {{ e3 }}% less damage to subsequent targets down to a minimum of {{ e4 }}% damage.

Ravage.description: Evelynn slashes her target twice, dealing damage with each hit. She then gains increased Attack Speed for a short duration.
Ravage.name: Ravage
Ravage.tooltip:
Evelynn swiftly attacks a target {{ e3 }} times (applies on-hit effects), dealing a total of {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage.

Evelynn then gains {{ e4 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Ravenous Flock.description: Swain inspires dread in his enemies by temporarily taking the form of a raven. During this time ravens strike out at up to 3 nearby enemies. Each raven deals damage and heals Swain for half of the damage dealt.
Ravenous Flock.name: Ravenous Flock
Ravenous Flock.tooltip:
Toggle: Swain transforms into the form of a raven. During this time, up to 3 lesser ravens strike out at nearby enemies each second, prioritizing champions. Each raven deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and heals Swain for {{ e3 }}% of the damage dealt against champions, and {{ e5 }}% against minions.

The cost to sustain Ravenous Flock increases by {{ e4 }} Mana each second.

Razor Shuriken.description: Zed and his shadow both throw their spinning blades forward, dealing damage to any targets they pass through.
Razor Shuriken.name: Razor Shuriken
Razor Shuriken.tooltip:
Zed and his shadows throw their shurikens, each dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the first enemy they pass through, and {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage to each additional enemy.

Additional shurikens that hit the same enemy deal 50% less damage than the previous shuriken.

Reckless Swing.description: Olaf attacks with such force that it deals true damage to his target and himself, refunding the Health cost if he destroys the target.
Reckless Swing.name: Reckless Swing
Reckless Swing.tooltip:
Olaf ferociously swings his axes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) true damage to his target. This ability's cost is equal to {{ e2 }}% of the total damage dealt, but the cost is refunded if it kills the target.

Basic attacks lower the cooldown of Reckless Swing by 1 second.

Reckoning.description: Blasts an enemy unit with angelic force, dealing damage, slowing Movement Speed, and applying Holy Fervor.
Reckoning.name: Reckoning
Reckoning.tooltip: Blasts a target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds, and applying a stack of Holy Fervor.

Relentless Pursuit.description: Lucian quickly dashes a short distance. Lightslinger attacks reduce Relentless Pursuit's cooldown.
Relentless Pursuit.name: Relentless Pursuit
Relentless Pursuit.tooltip:
Quickly dashes a short distance.

Whenever Lightslinger hits an enemy, Relentless Pursuit's cooldown is reduced by {{ e1 }} second (doubles to {{ e2 }} seconds against champions).

Remove Scurvy.description: Eats citrus to cure crowd control effects and restore Health.
Remove Scurvy.name: Remove Scurvy
Remove Scurvy.tooltip: Gangplank consumes a large quantity of citrus fruit, curing all disabling effects and healing him for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) + {{ e2 }}% of his missing Health.

Rend.description: Attacks impale their targets with spears. Activate to rip the spears out, slowing and dealing escalating damage.
Rend.name: Rend
Rend.tooltip:
While off cooldown, Kalista's spears pierce their target, lingering for 4 seconds.

Active: Rip the spears from nearby targets, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds. Each extra spear increases Rend's damage.

If it kills a target, Rend's cooldown is reset and Kalista regains {{ e8 }} mana (up to twice per cast).

Requiem.description: After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus deals damage to all enemy champions.
Requiem.name: Requiem
Requiem.tooltip: After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemy champions (regardless of distance).

Resolute Smite.description: Galio fires a concussive blast from his eyes, slowing and dealing damage to enemies caught near the impact point.
Resolute Smite.name: Resolute Smite
Resolute Smite.tooltip: Galio fires a concussive blast from his eyes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies near the impact location, and reducing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Rewind.description: Zilean can prepare himself for future confrontations, reducing the cooldowns of his other basic abilities.
Rewind.name: Rewind
Rewind.tooltip: Reduces Zilean's other basic spell cooldowns by {{ e2 }} seconds.

Ricochet.description: Sivir's next few basic attacks will bounce to nearby targets, dealing reduced damage to secondary targets.
Ricochet.name: Ricochet
Ricochet.tooltip:
Sivir's next {{ e4 }} basic attacks bounce to nearby targets, dealing {{ f1 }} physical damage to the first target and {{ f2 }} ({{ e3 }}% of total Attack Damage) physical damage to each subsequent target.

Only the first target is affected by on-hit effects. Each target may only be hit once by each Ricochet.

Riftwalk.description: Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing damage to nearby enemy units. Multiple Riftwalks in a short period of time cost additional Mana but also deal additional damage.
Riftwalk.name: Riftwalk
Riftwalk.tooltip:
Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding enemy units.

Each subsequent Riftwalk within the next {{ e2 }} seconds doubles the Mana cost and deals an additional {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ f3 }}) magic damage per stack, stacks up to {{ e6 }} times.

Righteous Fury.description: Passive: Grants Kayle on Hit magic Damage.  Activate: Ignite Kayle's sword with a holy flame, granting Kayle a ranged splash attack and bonus magic damage.
Righteous Fury.name: Righteous Fury
Righteous Fury.tooltip:
Passive: Kayle's Basic Attacks deal an additional {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage on hit.

Active: Kayle increases her Attack Range by 400 for 10 seconds and the passive bonus is increased to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage on hit.

In addition, enemies near her target take {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage on attack.

Righteous Gust.description: Galio claps his wings, unleashing a gust of concussive wind that damages enemies and leaves a directional draft in its wake that increases ally Movement Speed.
Righteous Gust.name: Righteous Gust
Righteous Gust.tooltip: Galio unleashes a gust of concussive wind that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in its path. A directional draft remains for 5 seconds, increasing the Movement Speed of allies passing through it by {{ e2 }}%.

Ring of Frost.description: Freezes nearby enemies in ice, dealing magic damage and rooting them.
Ring of Frost.name: Ring of Frost
Ring of Frost.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and roots them for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Riposte.description: Fiora parries all incoming damage and disables for a short time, then stabs in a direction. This stab slows the first enemy champion hit, or stuns them if Fiora blocked an immobilizing disable with this ability.
Riposte.name: Riposte
Riposte.tooltip:
Fiora parries all incoming damage, debuffs, and disables for the next {{ e2 }} seconds and then stabs in the target direction.

The stab deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage to the first enemy champion and slows their movement and attack speed by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

If Fiora parries an immobilizing disable, Riposte stuns instead of slowing.

Riptide.description: Nautilus slams the ground, causing the earth to explode around him in a set of three explosions. Each explosion damages and slows enemies.
Riptide.name: Riptide
Riptide.tooltip:
Nautilus slams the ground, causing the earth to explode around him. Each explosion deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to units in the area and slows them by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. This slow diminishes over time.

A unit can be hit by more than one explosion, but they take {{ e3 }}% less damage from additional explosions.

Rite of the Arcane.description: Xerath immobilizes himself and gains three shots of a long-range attack.
Rite of the Arcane.name: Rite of the Arcane
Rite of the Arcane.tooltip:
Xerath ascends to his true form, becoming rooted in place and gaining {{ e2 }} Arcane Barrages. This magic artillery deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies hit.

The root ends after {{ e1 }} seconds, when all shots have been fired or when manually deactivated by issuing a move command. If Xerath does not fire off a single Arcane Barrage, half of the cooldown of Rite of the Arcane is refunded.

Roar of the Slayer.description: Sion fires a short range shockwave that damages and slows and reduces the Armor of the first enemy hit. If the shockwave hits a minion or monster, it will be knocked back, damaging and slowing all enemies that it passes through.
Roar of the Slayer.name: Roar of the Slayer
Roar of the Slayer.tooltip:
Sion fires a short range shockwave, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the first target hit, slowing it by {{ e2 }}%, and reducing its Armor by {{ e5 }}% for 2.5 seconds.

If the target is not a champion, they will be knocked back. All enemies that the knocked back unit passes through will take {{ e6 }}% bonus damage and be slowed by {{ e2 }}%.

Rocket Grab.description: Blitzcrank fires his right hand to grab an opponent on its path, dealing damage and dragging it back to him.
Rocket Grab.name: Rocket Grab
Rocket Grab.tooltip: Blitzcrank fires his right hand, if it encounters an enemy unit it will stun them and deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage while he pulls them to himself.

Rocket Jump.description: Tristana fires at the ground to propel her to a distant location, dealing damage and slowing surrounding units for a brief period where she lands.
Rocket Jump.name: Rocket Jump
Rocket Jump.tooltip:
Tristana fires at the ground to propel her to target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and slowing surrounding enemy units by 60% for {{ e3 }} second(s).

Rocket Jump's damage is increased if Tristana lands on an enemy unit affected with Explosive Charge (25% bonus per stack), and explodes the Explosive Charge immediately if it has 4 stacks.

On a champion kill or assist, Rocket Jump's cooldown resets.

Rolling Thunder.description: Volibear drops to all fours and runs faster. This bonus speed increases when chasing enemy champions. The first enemy he attacks is thrown backwards over Volibear.
Rolling Thunder.name: Rolling Thunder
Rolling Thunder.tooltip:
Volibear drops to all fours to hunt his enemies, gaining {{ e4 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds. This bonus is enhanced to {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed while moving toward enemy champions.

Volibear's next attack during this time deals an additional {{ e1 }} physical damage and flings the target behind him.

Rune Prison.description: Ryze traps a target enemy unit in a cage of runes, damaging them and preventing them from moving.
Rune Prison.name: Rune Prison
Rune Prison.tooltip: Instantly roots a target for {{ e1 }} second(s), dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage.

Rupture.description: Ruptures the ground at target location, popping enemy units into the air, dealing damage and slowing them.
Rupture.name: Rupture
Rupture.tooltip: Ruptures the ground at target location. Enemies caught in the rupture are launched into the air for 1 second, take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, and are slowed by 60% for 1.5 seconds.

Ruthless Predator.description: Renekton slashes his target twice, dealing moderate physical damage and stuns them for 0.75 seconds. If Renekton has more than 50 Fury, he slashes his target three times, dealing high physical damage and stuns them for 1.5 seconds.
Ruthless Predator.name: Ruthless Predator
Ruthless Predator.tooltip:
Renekton's next attack strikes twice, stunning his target for {{ e3 }} second and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage per hit ({{ e5 }} (+{{ f2 }}) total damage).

Each hit applies on-hit effects and generates Fury. Renekton generates an additional {{ e7 }} Fury for hitting a champion.

50 Fury Bonus: Renekton attacks three times, stunning his target for {{ e4 }} seconds and dealing a total of {{ e6 }} (+{{ f3 }}) damage. No longer generates Fury.

Sadism.description: Dr. Mundo sacrifices a portion of his Health for increased Movement Speed and drastically increased Health Regeneration.
Sadism.name: Sadism
Sadism.tooltip: Dr. Mundo regenerates {{ f1 }} health ({{ e1 }}% of max health) over {{ e2 }} seconds. Additionally, he gains {{ e3 }}% movement speed during this time.

Safeguard / Iron Will.description:
Safeguard: Lee Sin rushes towards a target ally, shielding himself from damage. If the ally is a champion, they are also shielded. After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will for the next 3 seconds.
Iron Will: Lee Sin's intense training allows him to thrive in battle. For 5 seconds, Lee Sin gains Life Steal and Spell Vamp.
Safeguard / Iron Will.name: Safeguard / Iron Will
Safeguard / Iron Will.tooltip:
Safeguard: Lee Sin rushes towards a target ally. If the ally is a champion, Lee Sin shields the ally and himself for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e3 }} seconds and Safeguard's cooldown is reduced by {{ e6 }}%. After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will for the next 3 seconds.

Iron Will: Lee Sin's intense training allows him to thrive in battle. For 4 seconds, Lee Sin gains {{ e2 }}% Life Steal and Spell Vamp.

Sanguine Pool.description: Vladimir sinks into a pool of blood, becoming untargetable for 2 seconds. Additionally, enemies on the pool are slowed and Vladimir siphons life from them.
Sanguine Pool.name: Sanguine Pool
Sanguine Pool.tooltip:
Vladimir sinks into a pool of blood for 2 seconds, becoming untargetable and slowing enemies above him by 40%.

Vladimir deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }} [15% of bonus Health]) magic damage over the duration and heals himself for 15% of that amount.

Sapling Toss.description: Maokai flings a sapling that deals area damage on impact. The sapling then wards the nearby area. When enemies approach, the sapling attacks enemies with an arcane blast.
Sapling Toss.name: Sapling Toss
Sapling Toss.tooltip:
Maokai flings a sapling that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage on impact.

The sapling wards the nearby area, and will chase enemies that approach, exploding to deal {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage and slow enemies hit by {{ e5 }}% for {{ e3 }} second(s). Saplings last for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Satchel Charge.description: Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after 4 seconds, or when this ability is activated again. The explosion deals magic damage to enemies, knocking them away. Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage.
Satchel Charge.name: Satchel Charge
Satchel Charge.tooltip:
Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after {{ e2 }} seconds, or when this ability is activated again. The explosion deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies, knocking them away.

Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage.

Savagery.description:
Rengar's next basic attack deals bonus damage.
Ferocity effect: Rengar deals enhanced damage and grants him Attack Speed and Attack Damage.
Savagery.name: Savagery
Savagery.tooltip:
The next basic attack within 3 seconds deals {{ e4 }}% ({{ f3 }}) of Rengar's Attack Damage plus {{ e1 }} physical damage.

Ferocity effect: The next basic attack within 3 seconds deals 150% {{ f1 }} of Rengar's Attack Damage plus {{ f2 }} physical damage and grants {{ f4 }}% Attack Speed and {{ e6 }}% Attack Damage for {{ e3 }} seconds (Damage and Attack Speed scale with Rengar's level).

Scatter the Weak.description: Syndra knocks enemies and Dark Spheres back dealing magic damage. Enemies hit by Dark Spheres become stunned.
Scatter the Weak.name: Scatter the Weak
Scatter the Weak.tooltip:
Knocks enemies and Dark Spheres back dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to them and any enemies they collide with.

Dark Spheres that are knocked back stun all enemies in their path for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Scrap Shield.description: Rumble pulls up a shield, protecting him from damage and granting him a quick burst of speed. While in Danger Zone, the shield strength and speed bonus is increased.
Scrap Shield.name: Scrap Shield
Scrap Shield.tooltip:
Rumble tosses up a shield for 2 seconds that absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage. Rumble also gains an additional {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed for 1 second.

Danger Zone Bonus: 50% increase in shield health and Movement Speed.

Sear.description: Brand launches a ball of fire forward that deals magic damage. If the target is ablaze, Sear will stun the target for 2 seconds.
Sear.name: Sear
Sear.tooltip:
Brand launches a ball of fire forward that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Blaze: If the target is ablaze, Sear will stun the target for {{ f1 }} seconds.

Seastone Trident.description: Fizz's attacks passively rend his enemies, dealing magic damage over several seconds based on the target's missing Health. When activated, for a short duration, Fizz's attacks deal additional magic damage.
Seastone Trident.name: Seastone Trident
Seastone Trident.tooltip:
Passive: Fizz's attacks rend his enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e2 }}% of the target's missing Health as magic damage over {{ e4 }} seconds.

Active: For {{ e6 }} seconds, Fizz's attacks deal an additional {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage on hit.

Seismic Shard.description: Using his primal elemental magic, Malphite sends a shard of the earth through the ground at his foe, dealing damage upon impact and stealing Movement Speed for 4 seconds.
Seismic Shard.name: Seismic Shard
Seismic Shard.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and steals {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed from the target for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Sentinel.description:
Passively deal bonus damage when striking the same target as the Oathsworn ally.

Activate to send a soul to patrol a path, revealing the area in front of it.
Sentinel.name: Sentinel
Sentinel.tooltip:
Passive: When Kalista and her Oathsworn both basic attack the same target, she deals {{ e2 }}% of their max health as magic damage. {{ e7 }} second cooldown per target.

Active: Send a soul Sentinel to patrol an unseen area. Champions they see are revealed for 4 seconds. Sentinels last 7 laps.

Kalista gains a charge of Sentinel every {{ e4 }} seconds.

Shadow Assault.description: Talon disperses a ring of blades and becomes invisible while gaining additional Movement Speed. When Talon emerges from invisibility, the blades converge on his location. Each time the blades move, Shadow Assault deals physical damage to enemies hit by at least one blade.
Shadow Assault.name: Shadow Assault
Shadow Assault.tooltip: Talon disperses a ring of blades and becomes invisible for up to {{ e5 }} seconds, gaining {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed. When Talon emerges from invisibility, the blades converge on his location. Each time the blades move, Shadow Assault deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to enemies they pass through.

Shadow Dance.description: Akali moves through shadows to quickly strike through her target, dealing damage and consuming an Essence of Shadow charge. Akali recharges Essence of Shadow charges both periodically and upon kills and assists, max 3 stacks.
Shadow Dance.name: Shadow Dance
Shadow Dance.tooltip:
Akali moves through shadows to quickly strike through her target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage.

Akali stores an Essence of Shadow on kills and assists as well as every {{ f1 }} seconds up to {{ e4 }} total.

Shadow Dash.description: Shen dashes rapidly toward a target location, taunting enemy champions he encounters and dealing minor damage.
Shadow Dash.name: Shadow Dash
Shadow Dash.tooltip:
Shen dashes in a direction, dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to champions and taunting champions he collides with for {{ e1 }} second(s).

Taunted enemies are forced to attack Shen and their basic attacks deal {{ e3 }}% reduced damage.

Restores {{ e2 }} Energy per champion affected.

Shadow Slash.description: Zed and his shadow spin their blades, creating a burst of shadow energy.  The shadow's spin slows.
Shadow Slash.name: Shadow Slash
Shadow Slash.tooltip:
Zed and his shadow slash, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to nearby enemies.

Each enemy champion hit by Zed's Shadow Slash reduces Living Shadow's cooldown by 2 seconds.
Each enemy hit by a mimicked Shadow Slash will be slowed by {{ e2 }}% for 1.5 seconds.

Enemies hit by both Shadow Slashes will be slowed by {{ e3 }}% but will not take additional damage.

Shatter.description: Taric is protected by a hardening aura, increasing the Armor of himself and nearby allied champions. He may choose to splinter the enchanted rocks surrounding him to deal damage and decrease the Armor of nearby enemies at the cost of some Armor for a short time.
Shatter.name: Shatter
Shatter.tooltip:
Passive: Taric's gemstones increase his Armor by {{ e3 }}. Additionally, nearby allied champions gain {{ f1 }} Armor ({{ e4 }}% of Taric's Armor).

Active: Taric shatters his armor, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and reducing their Armor by {{ e2 }} (+{{ f3 }}) for {{ e5 }} seconds. Taric loses {{ e3 }} Armor while Shatter is on cooldown.

Shield of Daybreak.description: Leona uses her shield to perform her next basic attack, dealing bonus magic damage and stunning the target.
Shield of Daybreak.name: Shield of Daybreak
Shield of Daybreak.tooltip: The next basic attack deals an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and stuns an enemy for {{ e1 }} seconds.

Shifting Sands.description: Azir dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, damaging enemies. If he hits an enemy champion, he gains a shield.
Shifting Sands.name: Shifting Sands
Shifting Sands.tooltip: Azir dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, damaging enemies hit for {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. If Azir hits an enemy champion, he stops and gains a {{ e6 }} second shield that absorbs {{ e4 }} (+{{ f1 }}) [15% of bonus Health] damage.

Shock Blast.description: Fires an orb of electricity that detonates upon hitting an enemy (or reaching the end of its path) dealing physical damage to all enemies in the area of the explosion.
Shock Blast.name: Shock Blast
Shock Blast.tooltip: Fires an orb of electricity that detonates upon hitting an enemy or reaching the end of its path dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to all enemies in the area of the explosion.

Shocking Orb.description: Deals magic damage to an enemy and stuns them.
Shocking Orb.name: Shocking Orb
Shocking Orb.tooltip: Xerath fires an orb of raw magic. The first enemy hit takes {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and is stunned for between {{ e8 }} and {{ e2 }} seconds. The stun duration lengthens based on how far the orb travels.

Shroud of Darkness.description: Nocturne empowers his blades, passively gaining Attack Speed. Activating Shroud of Darkness allows Nocturne to fade into the shadows, creating a magical barrier which blocks a single enemy ability and doubles his passive Attack Speed if successful.
Shroud of Darkness.name: Shroud of Darkness
Shroud of Darkness.tooltip:
Passive: Nocturne has {{ e1 }}% bonus Attack Speed.

Active: Nocturne creates a magical barrier for 1.5 seconds, which blocks the next enemy ability.

If an ability is blocked by the shield, Nocturne's passive Attack Speed bonus doubles for 5 seconds.

Shunpo.description: Katarina instantly teleports to her target's location and takes reduced damage from enemies for a few seconds. If the target is an enemy, she deals damage.
Shunpo.name: Shunpo
Shunpo.tooltip:
Teleports to a target's location. Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage if the target is an enemy.

After using Shunpo, Katarina takes {{ e2 }}% reduced damage for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Sigil of Malice.description: LeBlanc projects an orb towards her target, dealing magic damage and marking the target for 3.5 seconds. If the target takes damage from one of LeBlanc's abilities, the sigil will trigger, dealing damage.
Sigil of Malice.name: Sigil of Malice
Sigil of Malice.tooltip:
Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and marks the target for 3.5 seconds.

If the target takes damage from one of LeBlanc's abilities, the mark will trigger, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage.

Silver Bolts.description: Vayne tips her bolts with a rare metal, toxic to evil things. The third consecutive attack or ability against the same target deals a percentage of the target's maximum Health as bonus true damage. (Max: 200 damage vs. Monsters)
Silver Bolts.name: Silver Bolts
Silver Bolts.tooltip: Every third consecutive attack or ability against an enemy deals an additional {{ e2 }} plus {{ e1 }}% of the enemy's maximum Health as true damage. (Max: 200 damage vs. Monsters)

Sinister Steel.description: Katarina whirls her daggers around her, dealing magic damage to all enemies in the area. If she hits an enemy Champion, Katarina gains a burst of speed for a short duration.
Sinister Steel.name: Sinister Steel
Sinister Steel.tooltip: Whirls daggers in a circle dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. If she hits an enemy Champion, Katarina gains {{ e2 }}% movement speed for 1 second.

Siphon Power.description:
Viktor blasts an enemy unit dealing magic damage, gaining a shield and empowering his next basic attack.

Augment: Viktor gains bonus Movement Speed after casting.
Siphon Power.name: Siphon Power
Siphon Power.tooltip:
Viktor blasts an enemy unit for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, granting Viktor a {{ e4 }} (+{{ f3 }}) damage shield for {{ e2 }} seconds. Viktor's next basic attack deals {{ f2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus magic damage. (The bonus damage scales with Viktor's level).

Augment - Turbocharge: Viktor gains {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Siphon of Destruction.description: Mordekaiser deals damage to enemies in a cone in front of him. For each unit hit, Mordekaiser's shield absorbs energy.
Siphon of Destruction.name: Siphon of Destruction
Siphon of Destruction.tooltip:
Mordekaiser deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a cone.

For each Champion hit, he gains {{ e5 }}% maximum shield.

Siphoning Strike.description: Nasus strikes his foe, dealing damage and increasing the power of his future Siphoning Strikes if he slays his target.
Siphoning Strike.name: Siphoning Strike
Siphoning Strike.tooltip:
Active: Nasus's next basic attack has {{ e3 }} additional Attack Range (does not stack with range from Fury of the Sands) and will deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage.

Passive: Siphoning Strike permanently gains {{ e2 }} damage if it kills an enemy unit. This bonus is doubled against Champions, large minions and large monsters.

Skittering Frenzy / Volatile Spiderling.description: Elise and her Spiderlings gain a burst of Attack Speed.
Skittering Frenzy / Volatile Spiderling.name: Skittering Frenzy / Volatile Spiderling
Skittering Frenzy / Volatile Spiderling.tooltip:
Passive: Spiderlings gain {{ e5 }}% Attack Speed.

Active: Increases Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}% for Elise and her Spiderlings for 3 seconds.

Slice and Dice.description: Renekton dashes, dealing damage to units along the way. Empowered, Renekton deals bonus damage and reduces the Armor of units hit.
Slice and Dice.name: Slice and Dice
Slice and Dice.tooltip:
Slice: Renekton dashes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. Hitting an enemy grants the ability to use Dice for 4 seconds.

Dice: Renekton dashes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. In addition, he generates {{ e4 }} Fury for each non-champion hit and {{ e5 }} Fury for each champion hit, up to a maximum of 30 Fury.

Dice - 50 Fury Bonus: Damage increased to {{ e3 }} (+{{ f2 }}). Enemies hit have {{ e2 }}% reduced Armor for 4 seconds. No longer generates Fury.

Slicing Maelstrom.description: Kennen summons a storm that strikes at random nearby enemy champions for magical damage.
Slicing Maelstrom.name: Slicing Maelstrom
Slicing Maelstrom.tooltip:
Summons a magical storm for {{ e3 }} seconds that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to a random enemy champion near Kennen every .25 seconds.

Slicing Maelstrom can only hit the same champion once every .5 seconds and no more than 3 times in total.

Smoke Screen.description: Graves fires a smoke canister at the target area creating a cloud of smoke. Enemies inside the smoke cloud have reduced sight range and Movement Speed.
Smoke Screen.name: Smoke Screen
Smoke Screen.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage on impact and creates a smoke cloud that lasts {{ e4 }} seconds. Enemies inside the cloud are slowed by {{ e2 }}% and have their sight radius reduced.

Solar Flare.description: Leona calls down a beam of solar energy, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Enemies in the center of the area are stunned, while enemies on the outside are slowed.
Solar Flare.name: Solar Flare
Solar Flare.tooltip: Calls down a radiant beam of solar energy dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing enemies by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds. Enemies in the center of the flare are stunned instead of slowed.

Song of Celerity.description: Sona plays the Song of Celerity, granting herself bonus Movement Speed that decays over time. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants nearby allied champions bonus Movement Speed and extends the duration of her aura for each ally she aids.
Song of Celerity.name: Song of Celerity
Song of Celerity.tooltip:
Active: Grants Sona {{ f3 }}% (+{{ f2 }}%) Movement Speed that decays over time and creates an aura of Celerity around her that lasts {{ e5 }} seconds. Tagging an ally with the zone grants the ally {{ f4 }}% (+{{ f5 }}%) Movement Speed for {{ e7 }} seconds, and Sona increases the duration of her aura and her own Movement Speed buff by {{ e6 }} seconds.

Power Chord - Tempo: Slows an enemy by {{ e4 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) for {{ e8 }} seconds.

Sonic Wave / Resonating Strike.description:
Sonic Wave: Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing physical damage to the first enemy it encounters. If Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast Resonating Strike for the next 3 seconds.
Resonating Strike: Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by Sonic Wave, dealing physical damage plus 8% of their missing Health.
Sonic Wave / Resonating Strike.name: Sonic Wave / Resonating Strike
Sonic Wave / Resonating Strike.tooltip:
Sonic Wave: Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to the first enemy it encounters. If Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast Resonating Strike for the next 3 seconds.

Resonating Strike: Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by Sonic Wave, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage plus 8% of their missing Health (Max: 400 Damage vs. Monsters).

Soul Furnace.description: Sion shields himself and can reactivate after 3 seconds to deal Magic Damage to enemies nearby. When Sion kills enemies, he passively gains maximum Health.
Soul Furnace.name: Soul Furnace
Soul Furnace.tooltip:
Passive: Sion gains {{ e5 }} maximum Health whenever he kills a unit ({{ e6 }} for large monster and champion kill or assist). Current Bonus: {{ f1 }}

Active: Sion shields himself for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) ({{ e3 }}% of maximum Health) for 6 seconds. After {{ e7 }} seconds, while the shield holds, Sion can reactivate to deal {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e4 }}% of the target's maximum Health as magic damage to enemies around himself. Max 400 bonus damage against minions and monsters.

Soul Shackles.description: Latches chains of energy onto nearby enemy champions, dealing initial damage to them and slowing their Movement Speed, and then echoing the pain a few seconds later and stunning them if they remain close to Morgana.
Soul Shackles.name: Soul Shackles
Soul Shackles.tooltip:
Dark chains latch onto nearby enemy Champions dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing them by 20% for 3 seconds. After 3 seconds, they are dealt an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are stunned for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Enemy Champions can break the chains by moving away from Morgana.

Spear Shot.description: Pantheon hurls his spear at an opponent, dealing damage.
Spear Shot.name: Spear Shot
Spear Shot.tooltip: Pantheon hurls his spear at an opponent, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage.

Spell Flux.description: Ryze releases an orb of pure magical power that bounces from the initial target to nearby enemies and Ryze before bouncing back to the initial target. Enemies hit are damaged and have their Magic Resist reduced.
Spell Flux.name: Spell Flux
Spell Flux.tooltip:
Unleashes an orb that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage and reduces the Magic Resist of its target by {{ e2 }}% for 5 seconds, stacking up to 3 times.

After hitting, Spell Flux bounces to nearby enemies and Ryze (up to {{ e6 }} secondary targets) before returning to the original target. Instances of damage on the original target after the first deal {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) damage.

Spell Shield.description: Creates a magical barrier that blocks a single enemy ability cast on Sivir. She receives Mana back if a spell is blocked.
Spell Shield.name: Spell Shield
Spell Shield.tooltip:
Sivir creates a magical barrier for {{ e1 }} seconds that blocks the next incoming enemy ability.

If an ability is blocked by the shield, Sivir regains {{ e2 }} Mana.

Spider Form.description: Transforms into a menacing spider, reducing her attack range in exchange for movement speed, new abilities, and a Spiderling swarm that will attack her foes.
Spider Form.name: Spider Form
Spider Form.tooltip:
Elise transforms into a menacing spider, sacrificing 425 attack range in exchange for {{ e3 }} movement speed and access to arachnid abilities. All dormant Spiderlings are awakened and will attack nearby foes.

Spiderlings: Spiderlings deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage and take {{ e4 }}% reduced damage from multi-target abilities.

Spinning Axe.description: Draven's next attack will deal bonus physical damage. This axe will ricochet off the target high up into the air. If Draven catches it, he automatically readies another Spinning Axe. Draven can have two Spinning Axes at once.
Spinning Axe.name: Spinning Axe
Spinning Axe.tooltip:
Draven's next attack will deal {{ f1 }} bonus physical damage. The bonus is equal to {{ e2 }}% of his total Attack Damage.

This axe will ricochet off the target high up into the air. If Draven catches it, he automatically readies another Spinning Axe.

Draven can have two Spinning Axes at once.

Spinning Slash.description: Tryndamere slices toward a target unit, dealing damage to enemies in his path.
Spinning Slash.name: Spinning Slash
Spinning Slash.tooltip:
Tryndamere spins through his enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to enemies in his path and generating Fury.

Spinning Slash's cooldown is reduced by 1 second whenever Tryndamere critically strikes. This effect is doubled against champions.

Spirit Fire.description: Nasus unleashes a spirit flame at a location, dealing damage and reducing the Armor of enemies who stand on it.
Spirit Fire.name: Spirit Fire
Spirit Fire.tooltip:
Nasus unleashes a spirit flame at a target location, dealing an initial {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage.

For the next {{ e3 }} seconds, enemies in the area have their Armor reduced by {{ e2 }} and are dealt an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each second.

Spirit Rush.description: Ahri dashes forward and fires essence bolts, damaging 3 nearby enemies (prioritizes Champions). Spirit Rush can be cast up to three times before going on cooldown.
Spirit Rush.name: Spirit Rush
Spirit Rush.tooltip: Nimbly dashes forward firing 3 essence bolts at nearby enemies (prioritizes Champions) dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Can be cast up to three times within 10 seconds before going on cooldown.

Spirit of Dread.description: Hecarim deals magic damage to nearby enemies for a short duration. Hecarim gains Health equal to a percentage of any damage those enemies suffer.
Spirit of Dread.name: Spirit of Dread
Spirit of Dread.tooltip:
Hecarim deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds to all nearby enemies. Hecarim is healed for {{ e1 }}% of the damage these enemies take from any source.

Hecarim cannot heal more than {{ e4 }} Health from minions or monsters.

Stacked Deck.description: Every 4 attacks, Twisted Fate deals bonus damage. In addition, his Attack Speed is increased.
Stacked Deck.name: Stacked Deck
Stacked Deck.tooltip:
Passive: Every {{ e4 }} attacks, Twisted Fate deals an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage.

In addition, his Attack Speed is increased by {{ e3 }}%.

Stand Aside.description: Draven throws his axes, dealing physical damage to targets hit and knocking them aside. Targets hit are slowed.
Stand Aside.name: Stand Aside
Stand Aside.tooltip: Draven throws his axes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to targets hit and knocking them aside. Targets hit are slowed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Stand Behind Me.description: Braum leaps to a target allied champion or minion. On arrival, Braum and the ally gain Armor and Magic Resist for a few seconds.
Stand Behind Me.name: Stand Behind Me
Stand Behind Me.tooltip:
Braum leaps to a target allied champion or minion.

On arrival, Braum and the ally gain {{ f3 }} Armor and {{ f4 }} Magic Resist ({{ e4 }} plus {{ e3 }}% of Braum's bonus Armor/Magic Resist) for {{ e1 }} seconds.

Stand United.description: Shen shields target allied champion from incoming damage, and soon after teleports to their location.
Stand United.name: Stand United
Stand United.tooltip: Places a shield on target allied champion, absorbing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for 5 seconds. After channeling for {{ e3 }} seconds, Shen teleports to the target's location.

Starcall.description: A star falls from the sky at the target location dealing magic damage and slowing enemies in the center of effect.
Starcall.name: Starcall
Starcall.tooltip:
Calls down a star from Soraka to a target location. Enemies standing in the explosion radius take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Enemies standing in the center take 150% damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}% for 2 seconds.

Static Field.description: Passively causes lightning bolts to damage a nearby enemy. Additionally, Blitzcrank can activate this ability to damage nearby enemies and silence them for 0.5 seconds, but doing so removes the passive lightning until Static Field becomes available again.
Static Field.name: Static Field
Static Field.tooltip:
Passive: Lightning arcs off of Blitzcrank to hit a random nearby enemy for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage every 2.5 seconds.

Active: Deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage and silences surrounding enemy units for 0.5 seconds. The passive is not in effect during the cooldown.

Steel Tempest.description: A skillshot basic attack. After two successful Steel Tempests, the next fires a tornado that knocks enemies Airborne.
Steel Tempest.name: Steel Tempest
Steel Tempest.tooltip:
Thrusts forward, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

On hit, Steel Tempest grants a stack of Gathering Storm for 10 seconds. At 2 stacks, Steel Tempest fires a whirlwind that knocks Airborne.

Steel Tempest is treated as a basic attack: It can critically strike, applies on-hit effects, and its cooldown and cast time are reduced by Attack Speed.

If cast while dashing, Steel Tempest will strike as a circle.

Stranglethorns.description: Zyra summons a twisted thicket at her target location, dealing damage to enemies as it expands and knocking them airborne as it contracts.
Stranglethorns.name: Stranglethorns
Stranglethorns.tooltip:
Summons the fury of nature, growing a twisted thicket at target location which deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in the area as it expands. After 2 seconds, the vines snap upward knocking enemies into the air for {{ e1 }} second.

Rampant Growth: Plants within the thicket are enraged, increasing their Attack Speed by 50%.

Stretching Strike.description: Zac extends his arms, slowing and dealing damage to nearby enemies.
Stretching Strike.name: Stretching Strike
Stretching Strike.tooltip: Smacks enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and slowing them by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

Subjugate.description: Trundle immediately steals a percent of his target's Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. Over the next 4 seconds the amount of Health, Armor, and Magic Resistance stolen is doubled.
Subjugate.name: Subjugate
Subjugate.tooltip: Trundle drains {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of an enemy champion's maximum Health as Magic Damage and {{ e2 }}% of their Armor and Magic Resist, half immediately and half over {{ e3 }} seconds. The Armor and Magic Resist is returned {{ e3 }} seconds after the drain ends.

Summon: Tibbers.description: Annie wills her bear Tibbers to life, dealing damage to units in the area. Tibbers can attack and also burns enemies that stand near him.
Summon: Tibbers.name: Summon: Tibbers
Summon: Tibbers.tooltip:
Tibbers appears in a burst of flame dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the target area.

For the next {{ e6 }} seconds, Tibbers chases down enemies and deals {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage each second to nearby foes. If Annie casts Molten Shield while Tibbers is active he will receive the shield and a short decaying speed boost.

Tibbers can be controlled by holding the alt key and using the right mouse button or by reactivating this ability.

Super Mega Death Rocket!.description: Jinx fires a super rocket across the map that gains damage as it travels. The rocket will explode upon colliding with an enemy champion, dealing damage to it and surrounding enemies based on their missing Health.
Super Mega Death Rocket!.name: Super Mega Death Rocket!
Super Mega Death Rocket!.tooltip: Jinx fires a rocket that gains damage over the first second it travels. It explodes on the first enemy champion hit, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Physical Damage plus {{ e3 }}% of the target's missing Health. Nearby enemies take 80% Damage.

Sweeping Blade.description: Dashes through a unit, dealing escalating Magic Damage with each cast.
Sweeping Blade.name: Sweeping Blade
Sweeping Blade.tooltip:
Dashes through target enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage. Each cast increases your next dash's base Damage by 25%, up to {{ e6 }}%.

Cannot be re-cast on the same enemy for {{ e2 }} seconds.

If cast while dashing, Steel Tempest will strike as a circle.

Swipe.description: Nidalee claws in a direction, dealing damage to enemies in front of her.
Swipe.name: Swipe
Swipe.tooltip:
Cougar: Nidalee claws at enemies in front of her, dealing {{ f1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage.

Human: Nidalee heals an ally and grants them an Attack Speed bonus.

Switcheroo!.description: Jinx modifies her basic attacks by swapping between Pow-Pow, her minigun and Fishbones, her rocket launcher. Attacks with Pow-Pow grant Attack Speed, while attacks with Fishbones deal area of effect damage, gain increased range, and drain Mana.
Switcheroo!.name: Switcheroo!
Switcheroo!.tooltip:
Jinx swaps weapons.

Fishbones, the Rocket Launcher: Basic attacks deal 110% Damage to Jinx's target and all nearby enemies, gain {{ e3 }} range, and drain Mana.

Pow-Pow, the Minigun: Basic attacks grant additional Attack Speed for 2.5 seconds. This effect stacks up to 3 times for a total bonus of {{ f4 }}% (bonus scales with spell rank and Jinx's level). Stacks fall off one at a time and only benefit Jinx's first attack after switching to Rocket Launcher.

Tag Team.description: Valor replaces Quinn on the battlefield as a mobile melee attacker. When ready, Quinn returns in a hail of arrows, dealing physical damage to all nearby enemies.
Tag Team.name: Tag Team
Tag Team.tooltip:
First Cast: Valor replaces Quinn on the battlefield as a mobile melee attacker for {{ e4 }} seconds. Valor can move through units and gains +{{ e3 }}% Movement Speed, decreased gradually to +{{ e5 }}% when in combat.

Second Cast: Quinn returns to perform Skystrike, dealing from {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage to all enemies in a large area, increasing based on how much health they are missing.

If Skystrike has not been cast before this ability ends, it will be cast automatically.

Takedown.description: Nidalee executes a powerful attack that deals increased damage to low Health and Hunted targets.
Takedown.name: Takedown
Takedown.tooltip:
Cougar: Nidalee's next attack deals {{ f2 }} (+{{ f3 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage. Takedown deals 2.5% additional damage for each 1% Health the target is missing, up to {{ f4 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) (250% total damage).

Hunted targets take 33% additional damage from Takedown.

Human: Nidalee tosses her javelin, dealing increased damage the farther the enemy hit is from Nidalee.

Tantrum.description: Permanently reduces the physical damage Amumu would take. Amumu can unleash his rage, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Each time Amumu is hit, the cooldown on Tantrum is reduced by 0.5 seconds.
Tantrum.name: Tantrum
Tantrum.tooltip:
Passive: Amumu takes {{ e1 }} reduced damage from physical attacks.

Active: Amumu deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding units. Each time Amumu is hit, the cooldown on Tantrum is reduced by 0.5 seconds.

Taste Their Fear.description: Kha'Zix passively marks enemies that are isolated from nearby allies. Taste Their Fear deals physical damage to a single target. Damage increased on isolated targets. If he chooses to Evolve Enlarged Claws, this deals extra bonus damage against isolated targets. Kha'Zix also gains increased range on his basic attacks and Taste Their Fear.
Taste Their Fear.name: Taste Their Fear
Taste Their Fear.tooltip:
Passive: Marks enemies who are isolated from nearby allies.

Active: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. If the target is isolated, the damage is increased to {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}).

Evolved Enlarged Claws: If target is isolated, the damage is increased to {{ f3 }} (+{{ f2 }}). Increases the range of Taste Their Fear and Kha'Zix's basic attacks by {{ e5 }}.

Tectonic Disruption.description: Vel'Koz causes an area to explode, knocking up enemies, and knocking close enemies slightly away.
Tectonic Disruption.name: Tectonic Disruption
Tectonic Disruption.tooltip:
Vel'Koz disrupts a nearby area which, after a delay, deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and knocks up enemies hit for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Any enemies hit that are close to Vel'Koz will be pushed slightly in the direction the ability was cast.

Tempered Fate.description: Bard sends spirit energy arcing to a location, putting all champions, minions, monsters, and turrets hit into stasis for a brief time.
Tempered Fate.name: Tempered Fate
Tempered Fate.tooltip:
Bard sends magical energy arcing to a target location. On impact, all champions, minions, monsters, and turrets in the target area are put in stasis, becoming invincible, untargetable, and unable to act for {{ e1 }} seconds.

Epic monsters are also put into stasis, despite normally being immune to disables.

Tempest / Cripple.description:
Tempest: Lee Sin smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage and reveals enemy units hit. If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast cripple for the next 3 seconds.
Cripple: Lee Sin cripples nearby enemies revealed by Tempest, reducing their Movement Speed for 4 seconds. Movement Speed recovers gradually over the duration.
Tempest / Cripple.name: Tempest / Cripple
Tempest / Cripple.tooltip:
Tempest: Lee Sin smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage and reveals enemy units hit for 4 seconds. If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast Cripple for the next 3 seconds.

Cripple: Lee Sin cripples nearby enemies revealed by Tempest for 4 seconds, reducing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}%. Movement Speed recovers gradually over the duration.

Terrify.description: Strikes a target unit with fear, causing it to flee in terror for a duration.
Terrify.name: Terrify
Terrify.tooltip: Strikes a target enemy unit with fear, applying Dread and causing it to flee in terror for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Terror Capacitor.description: Urgot charges up his capacitor to gain a shield. While the shield is active, Urgot gains slowing attacks.
Terror Capacitor.name: Terror Capacitor
Terror Capacitor.tooltip: Urgot charges up his terror capacitor to gain a shield that absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e4 }}% of his maximum mana (+{{ f1 }}) damage for 7 seconds. While the shield is active, Urgot's attacks and missiles slow targets by {{ e2 }}%.

The Box.description: A prison of walls that slow and deal damage if broken.
The Box.name: The Box
The Box.tooltip:
Thresh traps enemies inside walls that slow and deal damage if broken.
He creates a prison of spectral walls around himself. Enemy Champions who walk through a wall suffer {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}% for 2 seconds, but break that wall.

Once one wall is broken, remaining walls deal no damage and apply half slow duration. An enemy cannot be affected by multiple walls simultaneously.

The Culling.description: Lucian unleashes a torrent of shots from his weapons.
The Culling.name: The Culling
The Culling.tooltip:
Lucian moves freely while firing rapidly in a single direction for {{ e1 }} seconds. His shots collide with the first enemy they hit and each do {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage. The number of shots scales with his Attack Speed. The Culling does 400% damage to minions.

Lucian may use Relentless Pursuit during The Culling.

Reactivate The Culling to cancel early.

The Equalizer.description: Rumble fires off a group of rockets, creating a wall of flames that damages and slows enemies.
The Equalizer.name: The Equalizer
The Equalizer.tooltip:
Rumble launches a line of rockets that creates a burning trail for 5 seconds. Enemies in the area have their Movement Speed slowed by {{ e3 }}% and take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage each second.

You can control the placement of this attack by clicking and dragging your mouse in a line.

Thick Skin.description: Tahm Kench turns incoming damage into gray health. As gray health decays, Tahm Kench is healed for a percentage of the gray health amount. When activated, this ability turns all gray health into a shield.
Thick Skin.name: Thick Skin
Thick Skin.tooltip:
Passive: Damage taken while this ability is not cooling down is converted to gray health. If allowed to decay, {{ e2 }}% of gray health will turn back into health.

Active: Convert all of your gray health into a shield that lasts {{ e1 }} seconds, but falls off gradually over that time.

Three Talon Strike.description: Xin Zhao's next 3 standard attacks deal increased damage that reduce his other ability cooldowns, with the third attack knocking an opponent into the air.
Three Talon Strike.name: Three Talon Strike
Three Talon Strike.tooltip: Xin Zhao's next 3 basic attacks deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) bonus physical damage and reduce his other abilities' cooldowns by 1 second. The final strike also knocks the target into the air.

Thrill of the Hunt.description: Rengar activates his predatory instincts, stealthing himself and revealing all enemy Champions in a large radius around him. While stealthed, he gains Movement Speed when he moves towards enemies and his next attack will cause him to leap. He gains Movement Speed and rapidly generates Ferocity after he breaks stealth.
Thrill of the Hunt.name: Thrill of the Hunt
Thrill of the Hunt.tooltip:
Rengar stealths himself for {{ e5 }} seconds after a 1 second (delayed to 3 seconds if taking damage) delay and reveals enemy Champions within {{ e3 }} range. While stealthed, Rengar gains {{ e4 }}% Movement Speed when moving toward enemy champions and his next attack will cause him to leap.

After breaking stealth, Rengar gains {{ e1 }}% Movement Speed and generates 5 Ferocity over {{ e7 }} seconds.

Thunder Claws.description: Volibear channels the power of the storm causing his attacks to blast his targets with lightning that bounces to other nearby enemies.
Thunder Claws.name: Thunder Claws
Thunder Claws.tooltip:
Volibear channels the storm and erupts chain lightning from his body, striking up to 4 nearby enemies with {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

For the next {{ e3 }} seconds, the storm empowers Volibear, causing his basic attacks to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage that chains to {{ e4 }} nearby enemies.

Thundering Blow / Acceleration Gate.description:
Hammer Stance: Deals magic damage to an enemy and knocks them back a short distance.

Cannon Stance: Deploys an Acceleration Gate increasing the Movement Speed of all allied champions who pass through it. If Shock Blast is fired through the gate the missile speed, range, and damage will increase.
Thundering Blow / Acceleration Gate.name: Thundering Blow / Acceleration Gate
Thundering Blow / Acceleration Gate.tooltip: Deals {{ e4 }}% of the enemy's maximum health (+{{ a1 }}) as magic damage and knocks them back a short distance. ({{ e1 }} Maximum Damage against monsters)

Thundering Shuriken.description: Kennen throws a fast moving shuriken towards a location, causing damage and adding a Mark of the Storm to any opponent that it hits.
Thundering Shuriken.name: Thundering Shuriken
Thundering Shuriken.tooltip: Throws a shuriken that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the first enemy it hits.

Tidal Wave.description: Summons a massive Tidal Wave that knocks up, slows, and damages enemies. Allies hit gain double the effect of Surging Tides.
Tidal Wave.name: Tidal Wave
Tidal Wave.tooltip:
Summons a Tidal Wave from Nami's position. The wave knocks up enemies and slows them by {{ e4 }}%, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The duration of the slow increases based on how far the Tidal Wave has traveled, with a minimum duration of 2 seconds and a maximum of {{ e5 }} seconds.

Allies hit by the wave gain double the effect of Surging Tides.

Tidecaller's Blessing.description: Empowers an allied champion for a short duration. The ally's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and slow the target.
Tidecaller's Blessing.name: Tidecaller's Blessing
Tidecaller's Blessing.tooltip: Empowers an allied champion for {{ e5 }} seconds or {{ e4 }} basic attacks. The ally's basic attacks deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage and slow the target by {{ e2 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) for {{ e3 }} second.

Tides of Blood.description: Vladimir unleashes a torrent of blood, damaging surrounding enemies. Additionally, multiple Tides of Blood in a short period of time cause them to cost additional Health and deal additional damage, and increases his healing and regeneration.
Tides of Blood.name: Tides of Blood
Tides of Blood.tooltip:
Vladimir unleashes a torrent of blood, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all nearby enemies.

Each cast gives him an Empowered stack (max 4), increasing his healing and regeneration by {{ e4 }}% each for 10 seconds. Additionally, Tides of Blood cost and base damage increases by 25% per stack.

Tiger Stance.description: Tiger Stance: Activation - Udyr's Attack Speed is increased for a few seconds, and his first basic attack will deal a high amount of damage over 2 seconds. Persistent Effect - Udyr's basic attacks deal extra damage.
Tiger Stance.name: Tiger Stance
Tiger Stance.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Basic attacks deal {{ f1 }} bonus physical damage, and Udyr will perform a Tiger Strike with his first basic attack, dealing bonus {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage over 2 seconds.

Activation: Increases Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}% for 5 seconds.

Time Bomb.description: Tosses a bomb to target area that sticks to units that come near it (prioritizes Champions). It detonates after 3 seconds, dealing area of effect damage. If a Time Bomb is detonated early by another Time Bomb, it also stuns enemies.
Time Bomb.name: Time Bomb
Time Bomb.tooltip:
Zilean tosses a time-delayed bomb to a location. The bomb sticks to the first unit which comes within a small area around it (prioritizes Champions). After {{ e2 }} seconds it detonates, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all surrounding enemies.

Placing two bombs on a unit detonates the first bomb early, stunning all enemies in the blast for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Time Warp.description: Zilean bends time around any unit, decreasing an enemy's Movement Speed or increasing an ally's Movement Speed for a short time.
Time Warp.name: Time Warp
Time Warp.tooltip: Zilean increases an allied champion's Movement Speed, or slows an enemy champion, by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e1 }} seconds.

Timewinder.description: Ekko throws a temporal grenade that expands into a time-distortion field upon hitting an enemy champion, slowing and damaging anyone caught inside. After a delay, the grenade rewinds back to Ekko, dealing damage on its return.
Timewinder.name: Timewinder
Timewinder.tooltip: Ekko throws a device that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies it passes through. It expands into a slowing field on the first champion hit, slowing everything inside by {{ e2 }}%. It then returns to him after a delay, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to all targets hit upon return.

Titan's Wrath.description: Nautilus surrounds himself with dark energies, gaining a shield that blocks incoming damage. While the shield persists, his attacks apply a damage over time effect to enemies around his target.
Titan's Wrath.name: Titan's Wrath
Titan's Wrath.tooltip:
Nautilus surrounds himself with dark energies for {{ e3 }} seconds, shielding him from the next {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) ({{ e2 }}% of his max Health) damage.

While the shield persists, Nautilus' basic attacks deal {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage over 2 seconds to all units around his target.

To the Skies! / Shock Blast.description:
Hammer Stance: Leaps to an enemy dealing physical damage and slowing enemies.

Cannon Stance: Fires an orb of electricity that detonates upon hitting an enemy (or reaching the end of its path) dealing physical damage to all enemies in the area of the explosion.
To the Skies! / Shock Blast.name: To the Skies! / Shock Blast
To the Skies! / Shock Blast.tooltip: Leaps to an enemy dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to enemies and slowing them by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

Tongue Lash.description: Tahm Kench lashes out with his tongue, damaging and slowing the first unit hit. This ability gains a stun after three stacks of An Acquired Taste.
Tongue Lash.name: Tongue Lash
Tongue Lash.tooltip:
Damage the first enemy hit for {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slow them by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e5 }}s. Champions with 3 stacks of An Acquired Taste will additionally be stunned for {{ e6 }}s.

Activate Devour while your tongue is in midair to devour monsters/minions from a distance.

Torment.description: Swain afflicts his target, dealing damage to them over time and causing them to take increased damage from Swain.
Torment.name: Torment
Torment.tooltip: Swain afflicts his target for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over 4 seconds. Swain deals {{ e2 }}% increased damage to the afflicted target.

Tormented Soil.description: Infects an area with desecrated soil, causing enemy units who stand on the location to take continual damage.
Tormented Soil.name: Tormented Soil
Tormented Soil.tooltip:
Curses an area for 5 seconds. Enemies on the cursed ground are dealt
from {{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage every second based on the enemy's missing Health.

Toxic Shot.description: Each of Teemo's attacks will poison the target, dealing damage on impact and each second after for 4 seconds.
Toxic Shot.name: Toxic Shot
Toxic Shot.tooltip: Teemo's basic attacks poison their target, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magical damage upon impact and {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magical damage each second for 4 seconds.

Transcendent Blades.description: Irelia summons 4 spirit blades that she can fling to deal physical damage and siphon life from enemies they pass through.
Transcendent Blades.name: Transcendent Blades
Transcendent Blades.tooltip: Irelia summons 4 spirit blades that she can fling to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to enemies they pass through. She heals for 25% of the damage dealt against champions and 10% against minions and monsters.

Transfusion.description: Vladimir drains life from his target.
Transfusion.name: Transfusion
