Transfusion.tooltip: Vladimir drains the lifeforce of his target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and healing himself for {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}).

Tremors.description: Rammus creates waves of destruction pulsing through the ground, causing damage to units and structures near him.
Tremors.name: Tremors
Tremors.tooltip: Rammus creates tremors beneath him, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage every second to nearby units and structures for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Triumphant Roar.description: Alistar lets out a commanding war cry, restoring Health to himself and nearby friendly units for half the amount. Can be cast more often if nearby enemies are dying.
Triumphant Roar.name: Triumphant Roar
Triumphant Roar.tooltip: Restores {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health to Alistar and half as much to nearby allies. Cooldown is reduced by {{ e1 }} seconds each time a nearby enemy unit dies.

Trueshot Barrage.description: Ezreal winds up for 1 second to fire a powerful barrage of energy missiles which do massive damage to each unit they pass through (deals 10% less damage to each unit it passes through).
Trueshot Barrage.name: Trueshot Barrage
Trueshot Barrage.tooltip: Ezreal winds up for 1 second to fire a barrage of missiles dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to each unit it passes through. However, it deals {{ e2 }}% less damage for each unit it hits (minimum {{ e3 }}%).

Tumble.description: Vayne tumbles, maneuvering to carefully place her next shot. Her next attack deals bonus damage.
Tumble.name: Tumble
Tumble.tooltip: Rolls a short distance. The next basic attack within {{ e3 }} seconds deals {{ f1 }} bonus physical damage, equal to {{ e2 }}% of total Attack Damage.

Turtle Stance.description: Turtle Stance: Activation - Udyr gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. Persistent Effect - Udyr gains Life Steal.
Turtle Stance.name: Turtle Stance
Turtle Stance.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Gains {{ e2 }}% Life Steal.

Activation: Gains a shield that absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for 5 seconds.

Twilight Shroud.description: Akali throws down a cover of smoke. While inside the area, Akali becomes invisible and gains a short burst of Movement Speed. Attacking or using abilities will briefly reveal her. Enemies inside the smoke have their Movement Speed reduced.
Twilight Shroud.name: Twilight Shroud
Twilight Shroud.tooltip:
Akali throws down a cover of smoke that lasts for {{ e1 }} seconds. While inside the area, Akali becomes invisible and gains a {{ e2 }}% burst of Movement Speed which decays over 1 second. Attacking or using abilities will briefly reveal her.

Enemies inside the smoke are slowed by {{ e3 }}%.

Twin Bite.description:
Shyvana strikes twice on her next attack. Basic attacks reduce the cooldown of Twin Bite by 0.5 seconds.

Dragon Form: Twin Bite cleaves all units in front Shyvana.
Twin Bite.name: Twin Bite
Twin Bite.tooltip:
Shyvana strikes twice on her next attack, dealing (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage on the second attack. The bonus damage is equal to {{ e1 }}% of Shyvana's Attack Damage. Basic attacks reduce the cooldown of Twin Bite by 0.5 seconds.

Dragon Form: Twin Bite cleaves all units in front Shyvana.

Twin Fang.description: Cassiopeia lets loose a damaging attack at her target, increasing further Poison damage dealt to the target. If the target dies, Cassiopeia regains Mana. If the target is poisoned, the cooldown of this spell is refreshed.
Twin Fang.name: Twin Fang
Twin Fang.tooltip:
Cassiopeia deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage to her target. If Twin Fang kills the target, Cassiopeia refunds its cost and restores {{ e10 }}% of her maximum Mana ({{ f3 }}). If the target is Poisoned, then Twin Fang's cooldown is reduced to 0.5 seconds.

Hitting an enemy with Twin Fang increases Cassiopeia's Poison damage dealt to the target by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e9 }} seconds. This effect stacks up to two times.

Twisted Advance.description: Maokai dissolves into a cloud of arcane energies. He regrows near a target enemy, dealing damage and rooting it in place.
Twisted Advance.name: Twisted Advance
Twisted Advance.tooltip: Maokai transforms into a cloud of arcane energy that quickly travels to a target enemy, roots it for {{ e2 }} second(s) and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of the target's maximum health as magic damage (Max: {{ e3 }} to minions and monsters).

Two-Shiv Poison.description: Shaco's Shivs passively poison targets on hit, slowing them and applying a miss chance to minions and monsters. He can throw his Shivs to deal damage and poison the target.
Two-Shiv Poison.name: Two-Shiv Poison
Two-Shiv Poison.tooltip:
Passive: While Two-Shiv Poison is ready to cast, Shaco's basic attacks reduce the target's Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. Also reduces minions' and monsters' chance to hit by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Active: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to target enemy and reduces their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

UPGRADE!!!.description: Heimerdinger invents an upgrade, causing his next spell to have increased effects.
UPGRADE!!!.name: UPGRADE!!!
UPGRADE!!!.tooltip:
Makes next basic ability free and gives it bonus effects. Reactivate to cancel.

H-28Q Apex Turret: Places a Turret that deals {{ e7 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage with its cannon and {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage with its beam for 8 seconds. It has splash damage, immunity to disables, its attacks slow targets by 25% for 2 seconds, it receives 20% of a beam charge per attack, and it doesn't count toward the Turret limit.

Hextech Rocket Swarm: Fires 4 waves of rockets that deal {{ e8 }} {{ f1 }} Magic Damage each. Champions and Monsters hit by multiple rockets take reduced damage, max {{ e5 }} {{ f2 }}.

CH-3X Lightning Grenade: Throws a bouncing grenade that discharges three times, dealing {{ e10 }} {{ f4 }} Magic Damage. Both the stun and slow areas are larger and the slow is improved to 80%.

Unbreakable.description: Braum raises his shield in a direction for several seconds, intercepting all projectiles causing them to hit him and be destroyed. He negates the damage of the first attack completely and reduces the damage of all subsequent attacks from this direction.
Unbreakable.name: Unbreakable
Unbreakable.tooltip:
Braum reduces incoming damage and blocks for allies behind him.
Braum raises his shield in a direction for {{ e2 }} seconds negating the damage of the next attack from this direction. Subsequent attacks deal {{ e3 }}% reduced damage.

Braum intercepts projectiles, causing them to hit him and be destroyed.

Braum gains {{ e4 }}% Movement Speed for the duration.

Unbreakable Will.description: Alistar lets out a wild roar, gaining bonus damage, removing all crowd control effects on himself, and reducing incoming physical and magical damage for the duration.
Unbreakable Will.name: Unbreakable Will
Unbreakable Will.tooltip: Removes disables from Alistar, and Alistar gains {{ e3 }} Attack Damage and takes {{ e4 }}% reduced physical and magic damage for {{ e1 }} seconds.

Undertow.description: Olaf throws an axe into the ground at a target location, dealing damage to units it passes through and slowing their Movement Speed. If Olaf picks up the axe, the ability's cooldown is reduced by 4.5 seconds.
Undertow.name: Undertow
Undertow.tooltip:
Olaf throws an axe to a target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to units it passes through and slowing them by {{ e2 }}% for up to {{ e3 }} seconds. The further the Axe flies, the longer the slow lasts, but it is never less than {{ e4 }} second.

If Olaf picks up the axe, the ability's cooldown is reduced by 4.5 seconds.

Undying Rage.description: Tryndamere's lust for battle becomes so strong that he is unable to die, no matter how wounded he becomes.
Undying Rage.name: Undying Rage
Undying Rage.tooltip: Tryndamere becomes completely immune to death for {{ e3 }} seconds, refusing to be reduced below {{ e2 }} Health and instantly gaining {{ e1 }} Fury.

Unleashed Power.description: Syndra bombards an enemy Champion with all of her Dark Spheres.
Unleashed Power.name: Unleashed Power
Unleashed Power.tooltip:
Draws upon Syndra's full cataclysmic power, harnessing all Dark Spheres to deal magic damage to target enemy Champion. Unleashed Power manipulates the three Dark Spheres orbiting Syndra, in addition to Dark Spheres previously created.

Damage per sphere: {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}).
Minimum total damage: {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}).

Unspeakable Horror.description: Nocturne plants a nightmare into his target's mind, dealing damage each second and terrifying the target if they do not get out of range by the end of the duration.
Unspeakable Horror.name: Unspeakable Horror
Unspeakable Horror.tooltip:
Passive: Nocturne gains massively increased Movement Speed toward terrified enemies.

Active: Nocturne plants a nightmare into his target's mind, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds. If Nocturne stays within range of the target for the full duration, the target becomes terrified for {{ e2 }} second(s).

Unstable Matter.description: Zac's body erupts, damaging nearby enemies.
Unstable Matter.name: Unstable Matter
Unstable Matter.tooltip:
Zac's body erupts, dealing {{ e1 }} Magic Damage +{{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of the enemy's maximum Health as Magic Damage to all nearby enemies (Max: {{ e5 }} damage against minions and monsters).

When Zac reabsorbes a piece of himself, Unstable Matter's cooldown is reduced by 1 second.

Unstoppable Force.description: Malphite ferociously charges to a location, damaging enemies and knocking them into the air.
Unstoppable Force.name: Unstoppable Force
Unstoppable Force.tooltip: Malphite charges toward the target area, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and knocking enemies into the air for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Unstoppable Onslaught.description: Sion charges in a direction, ramping up speed over time. He can steer his charge slightly with the mouse cursor location. When he collides with an enemy he deals damage and knocks them up based on the distance he has charged.
Unstoppable Onslaught.name: Unstoppable Onslaught
Unstoppable Onslaught.tooltip:
Sion charges in a direction for 8 seconds and can steer slowly towards the mouse cursor. While charging, Sion is immune to all Crowd Control. Reactivating will cancel Sion's charge early.

When Sion collides with an enemy champion or wall, he deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and knocks up and stuns enemies in a small area for {{ e5 }} seconds. Enemies in a larger area take the same damage and have their Movement Speed slowed by {{ e3 }}% for 3 seconds.

The damage increases to {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) and the stun duration increases to {{ e6 }} seconds as Sion charges farther.

Urchin Strike.description: Fizz strikes his target and runs them through, dealing magic damage and applying on hit effects.
Urchin Strike.name: Urchin Strike
Urchin Strike.tooltip: Fizz dashes through his target, dealing normal attack damage plus {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. This ability can trigger on-hit effects.

Valkyrie.description: Corki surges to target location, dropping bombs that create a trail of destruction for opponents who remain in the fire.
Valkyrie.name: Valkyrie
Valkyrie.tooltip: Corki surges to target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second to enemies in the fire left along his path.

Valor.description: Riven steps forward a short distance and blocks incoming damage.
Valor.name: Valor
Valor.tooltip: Riven does a quick dash in the direction of your cursor and becomes shielded, blocking up to {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) incoming damage for 1.5 seconds.

Vault.description: Quinn dashes to an enemy, dealing physical damage and slowing the target's Movement Speed. Upon reaching the target, she leaps off the target, briefly interrupting it, and lands near her maximum Attack Range away from the target. Valor will immediately mark this enemy as Vulnerable.
Vault.name: Vault
Vault.tooltip:
Quinn dashes to an enemy, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and slowing the target's Movement Speed by {{ e1 }}% (this effect diminishes over {{ e3 }} seconds).

Upon reaching the target, she leaps off the target, briefly interrupting it, and lands near her maximum Attack Range from the target. Valor will immediately mark this enemy as Vulnerable.

As Valor: Performs the same attack but does not mark or leap off the target.

Vault Breaker.description: Vi charges her gauntlets and unleashes a vault shattering punch, carrying her forward. Enemies she hits are knocked back and receive a stack of Denting Blows.
Vault Breaker.name: Vault Breaker
Vault Breaker.tooltip:
Charges a powerful punch that carries Vi forward.

First Cast: Slows Movement Speed by 15% while increasing damage and dash range over 1.25 seconds.

Second Cast: Dashes forward dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and applying Denting Blows to all enemies hit (deals 75% damage to minions and monsters). Stops upon colliding with an enemy champion, knocking it back.

Vengeful Maelstrom.description: Maokai shields his allies by drawing power from hostile spells and attacks, reducing non-tower damage done to allied champions in the area. When Maokai ends the effect, he unleashes the absorbed energy to deal damage to enemies within the vortex.
Vengeful Maelstrom.name: Vengeful Maelstrom
Vengeful Maelstrom.tooltip:
Toggle: Maokai surrounds himself with a magical vortex that protects him and allied champions by reducing damage from non-turret sources by {{ e1 }}% for up to {{ e2 }} seconds.

Maokai can end the effect to release the stored energy, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+2 per damage absorbed) magic damage to enemies within the vortex. Maokai can store up to {{ e5 }} bonus damage.

Venom Cask.description: Twitch hurls a cask of venom that explodes in an area, slowing targets and applying deadly venom to the target.
Venom Cask.name: Venom Cask
Venom Cask.tooltip: Twitch hurls a cask of venom that explodes in an area adding {{ e1 }} stacks of Deadly Venom and slowing targets by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Venomous Bite / Neurotoxin.description:
Spider Form: Lunges at an enemy and deals damage based upon how low their Health is.

Human Form: Deals damage based upon how high the target's Health is.
Venomous Bite / Neurotoxin.name: Venomous Bite / Neurotoxin
Venomous Bite / Neurotoxin.tooltip: Lunges to a target with a poisonous bite that deals Magic Damage equal to {{ e1 }} plus 8% (+{{ a1 }}%) of the target's missing Health. Max {{ e2 }} bonus damage to monsters.

Vicious Strikes.description: Olaf's Attack Speed is increased, he gains Life Steal and has increased healing from all sources based on how much Health he is missing.
Vicious Strikes.name: Vicious Strikes
Vicious Strikes.tooltip:
For 6 seconds, Olaf gains {{ e2 }}% Life Steal and Attack Speed is increased by {{ e1 }}%.

During this time, Olaf also receives 1% increased healing from all sources for every {{ e3 }}% of Health he is missing.

Void Assault.description: Each rank allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, giving it a unique additional effect. When activated, Void Assault stealths Kha'Zix, triggers Unseen Threat, and increases Movement Speed. If he chooses to Evolve Active Camouflage, Void Assault can be cast three times and stealth duration increased.
Void Assault.name: Void Assault
Void Assault.tooltip:
Passive: Ranking up Void Assault allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities.

Active: Stealths for {{ e1 }} second. Activates Unseen Threat and increases Kha'Zix's Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}%. Additionally, Kha'Zix ignores unit collision while stealthed. Void Assault can be cast a second time within {{ e2 }} seconds.

Evolved Active Camouflage: Void Assault can be cast three times and its duration increases to {{ e4 }} seconds.

Void Ooze.description: Kog'Maw launches a peculiar ooze which damages all enemies it passes through and leaves a trail which slows enemies who stand on it.
Void Ooze.name: Void Ooze
Void Ooze.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to enemies it passes through and leaves a trail which slows enemies by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Void Rift.description: Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals an initial burst of damage, then explodes for a second burst of damage after a delay.
Void Rift.name: Void Rift
Void Rift.tooltip: Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage. After a delay, it deals an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage. Both hits add a stack of Organic Deconstruction.

Void Rush.description: Rek'Sai travels at incredible speed to a targeted Tunnel Entrance.
Void Rush.name: Void Rush
Void Rush.tooltip:
Passive: Grants {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed.

Active: After channeling for 1.5 seconds, Rek'Sai becomes untargetable while travelling to target Tunnel Entrance. Taking damage from a champion or tower will interrupt the channel.

Void Spike.description: Kha'Zix fires exploding spikes that slow and deal physical damage to all nearby enemies. Kha'Zix is healed if he is also within the explosion radius. If he chooses to Evolve Spike Racks, Void Spike fires three spikes in a cone and Void Spike's slow effect is increased.
Void Spike.name: Void Spike
Void Spike.tooltip:
Fires exploding spikes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to all nearby enemies ({{ e6 }}% bonus damage to monsters) and slowing them for {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. Heals Kha'Zix for {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) if he is within the explosion radius.

Evolved Spike Racks: Void Spike fires three spikes in a cone, slowing enemies hit by {{ e5 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. If the target is a champion, Kha'Zix gains vision of them for 2 seconds (does not affect stealthed units).

Volatile Spiderling / Skittering Frenzy.description:
Human Form: Releases a venom-gorged Spiderling that explodes when it nears a target.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings gain Attack Speed.
Volatile Spiderling / Skittering Frenzy.name: Volatile Spiderling / Skittering Frenzy
Volatile Spiderling / Skittering Frenzy.tooltip: Summons a venom-gorged Spiderling that moves to target location and explodes, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage when it nears an enemy or after 3 seconds.

Volley.description: Ashe fires 9 arrows in a cone for increased damage. Also applies Frost Shot.
Volley.name: Volley
Volley.tooltip:
Fires arrows in a cone, each dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

Enemies can block multiple arrows from Volley, but will only take damage from the first.

Vorpal Blade.description: Damages and life taps a target unit, healing allies that attack the target.
Vorpal Blade.name: Vorpal Blade
Vorpal Blade.tooltip:
Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to target unit and marks them for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Allied spells and attacks against this target heal the attackers {{ f1 }} ({{ e2 }} + {{ f2 }} [{{ e3 }}% of Shen's max Health]) over {{ e5 }} seconds.

Killing an enemy with Vorpal Blade restores {{ f3 }} Health instantly instead.

Vorpal Spikes.description: Cho'Gath's attacks passively release deadly spikes, dealing damage to all enemy units in front of him.
Vorpal Spikes.name: Vorpal Spikes
Vorpal Spikes.tooltip: Toggle: Basic attacks launch spikes that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Spikes grow wider as Cho'Gath gains Feast stacks.

Wall of Pain.description: Karthus creates a passable screen of leeching energy. Any enemy units that walk through the screen have their Movement Speed and Magic Resist reduced for a period.
Wall of Pain.name: Wall of Pain
Wall of Pain.tooltip: Creates a wall at target location that lasts for {{ e4 }} seconds. Enemies that pass through the wall have their Magic Resist reduced by {{ e1 }}% and Movement Speed reduced by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds (their Movement Speed gradually recovers over the duration).

Whimsy.description: If cast on an ally, grants them Movement Speed for a short time. If cast on an enemy, turns them into an adorable critter that can't attack or cast spells.
Whimsy.name: Whimsy
Whimsy.tooltip:
On Ally Cast: Target ally gains {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }})% Movement Speed for {{ e5 }} seconds.

On Enemy Cast: Polymorphs an enemy champion for {{ e3 }} seconds, disabling their ability to attack or cast spells and reducing their base Movement Speed by {{ e4 }}.

Whirling Death.description: Draven hurls two massive axes to deal physical damage to each unit struck. Whirling Death slowly reverses direction and returns to Draven after striking an enemy champion. Draven may also activate this ability while the axes are in flight to cause it to return early. Deals less damage for each unit hit and resets when the axes reverse direction.
Whirling Death.name: Whirling Death
Whirling Death.tooltip:
Draven hurls two massive axes to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to each unit struck.

Whirling Death slowly reverses direction and returns to Draven after striking an enemy champion. Draven may also activate this ability while the axes are in flight to cause it to return early. Deals 8% less damage for each unit hit (Minimum {{ e2 }}%) and resets when the axes reverse direction.

Wild Cards.description: Twisted Fate throws three cards, dealing damage to each enemy unit they pass through.
Wild Cards.name: Wild Cards
Wild Cards.tooltip: Throws three cards that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to each enemy unit they pass through.

Wild Growth.description: Lulu enlarges an ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air and granting the ally a large amount of bonus health. For the next few seconds, that ally gains an aura that slows nearby enemies.
Wild Growth.name: Wild Growth
Wild Growth.tooltip: Lulu enlarges her ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air. For {{ e4 }} seconds, her ally gains {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus health and slows nearby enemies by {{ e2 }}%.

Wind Wall.description: Creates a moving wall that blocks enemy projectiles.
Wind Wall.name: Wind Wall
Wind Wall.tooltip: Creates a moving wall that blocks all enemy projectiles for 4 seconds.

Winter's Bite.description:
Braum propels freezing ice from his shield, slowing and dealing magic damage.

Applies a stack of Concussive Blows.
Winter's Bite.name: Winter's Bite
Winter's Bite.tooltip:
Braum propels freezing ice from his shield dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) [2.5% of Braum's Max Health] magic damage to the first target hit and slowing them by {{ e2 }}%, decaying over the next {{ e5 }} seconds.

Applies a stack of Concussive Blows.

Wish.description: Soraka fills her allies with hope, instantly restoring health to herself and all friendly champions.
Wish.name: Wish
Wish.tooltip: Calls upon divine powers to restore {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health to all allied Champions, removing all instances of Grievous Wounds beforehand. Wish's power is increased by 50% on each Champion below 40% Health.

Wither.description: Nasus ages an enemy champion, decelerating their Movement and Attack Speeds over time.
Wither.name: Wither
Wither.tooltip: Nasus ages target champion over {{ e3 }} seconds, initially slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and increasing to {{ e1 }}% over the duration. The target's Attack Speed is reduced by half the amount.

Wolf's Frenzy.description: Wolf enrages and attacks enemies around him.
Wolf's Frenzy.name: Wolf's Frenzy
Wolf's Frenzy.tooltip:
Passive: As Kindred move they build stacks of Hunter's Vigor, up to a maximum of 100. At full stacks Lamb's next basic attack drains {{ f1 }} health from the target.

Active: Wolf claims a territory, attacking nearby enemies inside it for {{ e4 }} seconds. Lamb can direct him to targets by attacking them. If Lamb leaves Wolf's territory he will cease attacking and join her.

Wolf's attacks deal physical damage equal to {{ e5 }} (+{{ f2 }}) plus {{ e3 }}% of the damage from Mark of the Kindred.

Wuju Style.description: Master Yi becomes skilled in the art of Wuju, passively increasing his Attack Damage. Activating Wuju Style grants bonus true damage on basic attacks, but the passive bonus is then lost while on cooldown.
Wuju Style.name: Wuju Style
Wuju Style.tooltip:
Passive: Grants {{ e1 }}% ({{ f1 }}) Attack Damage.

Active: Basic attacks deal bonus {{ e3 }} (+{{ f2 }}) true damage for {{ e5 }} seconds. Afterwards the passive bonus is lost while Wuju Style is on cooldown.

Yordle Snap Trap.description: Caitlyn sets a trap to find sneaky yordles. When sprung, the trap immobilizes the champion, reveals them for a short duration, and deals magic damage over 1.5 seconds.
Yordle Snap Trap.name: Yordle Snap Trap
Yordle Snap Trap.tooltip: Sets a trap that an enemy Champion can spring immobilizing and revealing them for a short duration. The trap deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds, and lasts for {{ e4 }} minutes. Only 3 traps may be active at once.

Zap!.description: Jinx uses Zapper, her shock pistol, to fire a blast that deals damage to the first enemy hit, slowing and revealing it if it is not stealthed.
Zap!.name: Zap!
Zap!.tooltip: Jinx fires a shock blast that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Physical Damage to the first enemy hit, revealing it if it is not stealthed and slowing it by {{ e2 }}% for 2 seconds.

Zenith Blade.description: Leona projects a solar image of her sword, dealing magic damage to all enemies in a line. When the image fades, the last enemy champion struck will be briefly immobilized and Leona will dash to them.
Zenith Blade.name: Zenith Blade
Zenith Blade.tooltip: Strikes all enemies in a line dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The last enemy Champion struck will be briefly rooted and Leona will dash to them.

Zephyr.description: Janna summons an air elemental that passively increases her Movement Speed and enables her to pass through units. She may also activate this ability to deal damage and slow an enemy's Movement Speed. The passive is lost while this ability is on cooldown.
Zephyr.name: Zephyr
Zephyr.tooltip:
Passive: Increases Movement Speed by {{ e1 }}% (+{{ f1 }}%) and allows movement through units.

Active: Deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to an enemy and slows their Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}% (+{{ f2 }}%) for {{ e4 }} seconds. Passive benefit is lost while Zephyr is on cooldown.
